1a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra satwA nA ma sA dA rau//
1b2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabaso zhes pa
2a1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor pa dbang rnam pa bzhi tshul bzhin du thob cing / dam
2a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnams srog gi phyir yang mi gtong bas/ ri sul dang brag phug dang / chu klung dang / dur khrod la sogs par gnas la/ nang
2a3(rgyud 'grel): par dang po ra Da ma ru'i sgras ldang bar bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yas pa khro bo'i sdigs mdzub snying gar bstan la/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hu~M hUM
2b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya huM huM phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha gra bAn badz+ra bid+yA rA dza huM huM phaT/ de nas gdong bkra ba la sogs pas khrus byas nas stan 'jam pa/
2b2(rgyud 'grel): la 'dug la/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom par bya ste/ bde ba ma thob pa'i sems can rnams bde ba dpag tu med pa la dgod par bya'o// de ltar gzhan gyi sems can thad gsal ba'i sems
2b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi snying rje bskyed par bya'o// de ltar gzhan gyi don bya ba'i sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i dga' ba bsgom par bya'o// phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa la btang snyems bsgom par
2b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas rang gi bdag po'i sa bon las 'od byung nas na mkhar 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o// smon pa'i sems
3a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi.oM bdag he rak+Shar bsgyur/ sems can thams cad he ru kar gyur cig ces pas smon lam bya'o// smyon pa'i sems kyis de nas g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba'i chos thams cad gcig dang dum dang pram+b+ha
3a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ngo bor rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom mo// / sems brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'ang brjod par bya'o// oM shu n+ya two dz+nyA na badz+rI swa b+hA ba at+ma ko ho zhes brjod do// de nas bdag gi sdom pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
3a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis bgegs bslang par bya ste/ mdun gyi na mkha' la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba sams la/ de'i steng du hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i ra ba dang bla bre dang phur bu rnams
3a4(rgyud 'grel): kyigyis phyogs bcing ngo // de nas 'jug pa'i sems kyis shin tu yang ma phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo mi dmigs so// a A i I u A e ai o o a aHa k+Sha tsaT d+hU pa ya ta kA d+h+waM/ de dag gyur pa las d+hA/ de chos
3a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i phyag brgya gru gsum rtseg mar bsams la/ de'i dbus su shrI he ru ka/ bA rA hI dang gnyis su med par bsgom par bya ste/ dpal he ru ka zhal bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar
3a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon ljang / dbus mthing nag/ rgyab ser ljang / zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum dang ldan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bzung bas 'khyud pa// g.yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na kha T+wAM ga g.yon gyi gnyis pa na ka pA la bsnams pa/ thod pa'i
3b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas dbus brgyan pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan pa/ zla ba phyed pa'i gzugs can/ spyi bor mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba se ral khar thogs pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ ska rags
3b2(rgyud 'grel): sil sil 'khrol ba/ spyi bor nor bu dang / rna tsha dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / tshangs po'i skud pa dang thal ba ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can/ yum
3b3(rgyud 'grel): bA rA hI mdog mthing nag zhol gcig phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ gtsor bu skra grol ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs can phyag gnyis na gri gug dang kA pA la thogs te/ gtso bo la 'khyud pa/ zhabs g.yon gyis 'khyud
3b4(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas brkyang ba'o// brgya byin gyi phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/ nor bdag phyogasu lA ma/ chu bdag phyogs su dum skyes ma/ ge shen rje'i phyogs su gzugs can ma/ lha mo de rnams kyang kha dog nag mo da
3b5(rgyud 'grel): ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu'o// spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag dang po na gr-i gug/ gnyis pa na thod pa/ g.yon pa na ka pA la/ gnyis pa na kha T+wAM ga/ gcer bu skra bshig pa/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs
3b6(rgyud 'grel): can ma/ tshangs pa dang / biSh+Nu dang / brgya byin dngo / srin po gdon du bting bas g.yon brkyang ba g.yas bskum pas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ thod pa se ril khar 'phyang ba'o// de rnams kyis rnam par dag pa ni
4a1(rgyud 'grel): haka'i zhal bzhi ni/ bde ba dang / shin tu bde ba dang / rnam par bde ba dang / bde ba chen po'o// yang rnam par thar pa bzhi ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od
4a2(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'o// phyag rgya bzhi ste/ phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ la la mU dang / ra sanA dang / a bad+hU tI dang / dam rgya na'o// phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar ba'o//
4a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka'i bzhugs gnas dbus kyi lte ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o// gru gsum gyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis sems dang / mAM sa dang / me tog gis bgrang ba'i
4a4(rgyud 'grel): du chen dang po gnyis bzhag go/ bdag nyid ni mgon po he ru ka s+ye byang chub sems kyi gzugs can no// de nas bdag gi ye shes sems dpa' bsgom mo// de nas DA ki la sogs pa'i rigs lnga sogs pa nA mkha' la bzhugs pa'i ye
4a5(rgyud 'grel): shashes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas bdag gi khar bzhugs te/ snying gi'i ye shes sems dpa' la thim ste/ gnyis su med par bsam mo// de nyid las he ru ka'i sku phra mo 'phros pas/ de rnams kyi dpal gyis reg pa'i sems can thams
4a6(rgyud 'grel): tsi shrI he rak+sha'i bdag nyid du bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas go madrug gis lus bsrung / oM ha badz+re sa d+ha/ na ma hi bi ro tsa ni swA hA/ swA hU pap+pa sha ri// go Shapra he he ru ka/ d+hU hU~M ts+tsha badz+ra s+'ur+ya/ phaT hi a moH/ oM bo badz+ra bAnA nA/ d+hi
4b1(rgyud 'grel): xxx/ xxx
4b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bzlas pa'o// bde ba chen po'i gnas 'di la zhal cig lha nyi ma phyed dmaM/ snga dro'am de'i phyed la sogs par bsgoms par bya'o// de nas ljang por 'dod na gtor ma btang bar bya'o// oM a ra li ho// badz+ra DA ki ni su mo ya ts+tsha
4b3(rgyud 'grel): ho// rdo rje snyim pa kha phye ste/ mtshan phyed na gdor ma sbyin no// oM kha kha~M khA hi khA hi/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha rak+Shi se b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsin+na da/ oM pasmA ra/ badz+rI nA ka DA ki n+ya da ya/ i daM ba liM/ gr-ih+Na du sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sarba sid+d+hi m+meSh+ma ts+tshan+tu/
4b4(rgyud 'grel): thai baM ya theSh+TaM/ b+hUn+d+ha tha/ pI ba tha dza~M grA tha/ swA trI kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba kaR+Sha ta yA/ sa ta su khaM ba~M shud+d+ha ye/ sit+ta wi ka b+ha ban+d+ha d+h+yaM hU~M Ta/ ces brjod la bat+tAng ngo // 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog nyid kyis// rnal 'byor ma yi ma khi la
4b5(rgyud 'grel): byung // rtag tu sems ni bzang po yis// sbyor ba'i mchog ni bsgom par bya'o// 'dir ni rab tu gsang ba che// gzhan du bstan par mi byi ste// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba dang // mchog gi bsgom pa sbyar bar bya// rtag tu dam tshig
4b6(rgyud 'grel): srung bar bya// bza' dang bza' min gnyis mi bya// bgrod dang bgrod min mi bya ste// mthung dang mthung min sbyor ba'i las// 'di ltar ye shes goms pa las// sngags pa dngos grub myur ga 'grub// bla ma'i zhal nas rnyod pa ni// rab tu
5a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dngos grub ni// gzhan gyis gsol btab gsal bar byas// thams cad ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// 'di byas bsod nams gang thob pa// des na sems can ma lus pa// don rtogs stobs dang ye shes
5a2(rgyud 'grel): ni// bsam gyis mi khyab thob par shog/ bde mchog gi sgrubs thabs// slob dpon chen po lU yis pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bcom ldan phyogs kyi zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis// bcu gnyis phyag gis glang chen lpags
5a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs bsnams// bde gshegs drug 'gyur phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// rdo rje phag mo sku brgyan bde ba mchog la rol// mkha' gro la sogs tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// mkha' 'gro sogs dang ri bzhin sa 'og bcas// 'jig rten gsum
5a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'khor bcas bzhugaso 'tshal// ye shes rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol// thog ma med nas skye ba 'di bar du// shin tu mi bzang 'khor bar bdag 'khyams pas// bskal pa'i dus mtha' bstan pa'i snyigs ma la// khyed kyi zhal gyi 'od zer
5a5(rgyud 'grel): glog tsam mthong // sngon gyi 'phro dang khyed kyi thugs rje yos// theg pa mchog gyur bla na med pa dang // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i don chen 'di // blo ngan bdag gis spyad cing bsgrub pa'i phyir// bdag gis khas blangs dam bcas tshun chad du// bsgrub
5a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // dam tshig mi 'da' bde gshegs bka' mi bslu// mngon sum zhal bzhin rtag tu khyed la dgongs// nyon mongs rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs pa// khyed kyi sku gsung thugs ni ma mthong yang //
5b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi bka' las bdag ni mi 'da' na// bka' yi byin brlabs bdag la grub par mdzod// bdag gi rang bzhin khyed dang yongs su mnyam// ma lus 'gro tshogs rnams kyang de bzhin lags// bdag gis lus kyis nyes pa ci spyad par// sku'i
5b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor tshogs la bzod par gsol// bag med tshul gyis ngag gis nyes smras pa// rig sngags lha yi snying po phyag rgya dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su spyad pa las// nyams gyur gsung gi tshogs la bzod pa gsol// bdag gi/
5b3(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis gzhan gyis nyes bsams shing // ting 'dzin wa sbyong lha dang slob dpon dang // rig sngags lha yi snying po'i phyag rgya dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par tshogs la bzod par gsol// slob dpon brnyas shing bka' las 'das pa dang // spun
5b4(rgyud 'grel): la nyes smras byams pa chen po spangs// byang chub sems spongs theg pa gsum spangs dmod// skal min gasdang bsgrags bdag nyid phung po da mod// cho sna la yid gnyis sdug la chags bral byams// chos la gnyis 'byed dad pa'i sems
5b5(rgyud 'grel): la dmod // dam tshig ji bzhin bsnyad pa mau bsten pa dang // rtags pa'i rig ma smad par byed pa dang // rna ba 'di nyams khyed la bzod po gsol// dam tshig mi ldan rigs ma bsten par dga'o// dkyil 'khar tshogs rtsod gsang ba'i
5b6(rgyud 'grel): chos ston dang // sems can dang la dam tshig gzhan du stom// nyan thos dag dang lhan cig gnas byed cing // sbyor ba mi byas snod min gsang ba ston// phyag rgya mi shes phyag rgya bsten pa dang // bsnyen pa dag par ma byas dkyil 'khor
6a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs// sdom pa gnyis kyis bcas pa dgos med bzlas// yan lag dam tshig 'di las 'gal bgyis pa'i// bka' chang gnas su gyur pa ci mchis pa// bzod par gsol tshangs par stsal du gsol
6a2(rgyud 'grel): da lta'i dus bstan pa 'jig dus su// nyon mongs shas chen khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen// so sor thugs dam bzhin du nyer dgongs la// ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du phrin las mdzod// ji ltar bu yis rab tu mi shes kyang // pha yis
6a3(rgyud 'grel): brtse bas legs par skyong ba ltar// bdag gis gzhung 'di rab tu ma shes kyang // thugs rje chen pos yongs su bzung du gsol// dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgyun bshags bsdus pa// dpral ur+yan+ya lha mo'i gnas pa/ rgyal
6a4(rgyud 'grel): bo in+d+ra bo d+his mdzad po rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM bA ra gar+b+ha tat+t+wa sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tsha lo// glang
6a5(rgyud 'grel): du thubs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// kun rdzob don dum dbyer med rang bzhin can// bde dang sdod pa 'dus pa'i ros gang ba'i// gnyug ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig goms par gyur pas srid pa yis
6a6(rgyud 'grel): btson ra bkris pa'i 'ching ba kun gcod pa// sems kyi dam po rang ril rin chen mchog/ gang la bsten nas rtogs pa'i thabs bshad bya// drug dang brgyang gnyis bcu phrag gnyi dang lnga// bzhin rgyas mig yangs gzugs
6b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes lang tsho ldan// dad dang thos dang snying rjes yid brgyan ma// skyabs song sems bskyed yang dag dbang bskur ba// nyes bral dben par g.yeng ba kun spangs te// khams dang rjes mthun bza' dang btung ba dang // dri zhim yid
6b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong rgyun madz+nyes spyod dgu ldan// gang+gA dang tha mal 'dzin pa rnams sbyangs te// dbang po'i gzhu ltar snang ba lha yi lus// de la yi ge d+ya ni sna rtse dang // bya ni mtshan gyi lte bar rnam dgod cing // lte bu snying ga kha dang dpral ba ru/
6b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab// 'khyud dang 'i byed sin mo 'debs pa dang // mchu 'jib pa dang nu ma 'chir ba dang // nyid dang rdebs dang sor mo bskyod pa yis// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba
6b4(rgyud 'grel): bye// gang tshe mnyam med rin chen mchog lta bu// sems kyi dam pa radwa rig bde chen po// gang du rtogs pa de tshe sgog rtsol ba// bkag pa'i sbyor bas bde chen ro myang bya/ dngos dang dngos med mtha' gnyis rnams spongs
6b5(rgyud 'grel):  snod dang snying rje med dang bag+h+nAn can// dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu// rang rig byed chen yi shes gcig pu pa// gzhug ma'i dang bzhin gong gang der mtshon par bya// gang du mtshon ma mtshan gyi
6b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis mtshon pa// rnam shes ye shes nyid du mtshon po dang // ye shes gang des shes byar snang ba yi// 'gro ba ma lus de kun der mtshon bya// de tshe dbang po'i yul du snang ba yang // gzugs sgra dri re reg byar gyur to
7a1(rgyud 'grel): yi// dngos po 'di kun ma lus bde chen po// gang du bde las gzhan pa'i dngos med cing // bde chen ye shes zhes bya gcig pu pa// gcig pu'i nyams kyis du mar gar mdzad do// gang gis rang gi ye shes
7a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog bsgoms pas// srid pa 'ching ba mu lus kun bcad de// bdag gzhan nye ba'i 'tsho ba'i 'byung gnas kyis// mnyam med mya dran 'ongs pa'i dbyings la brten// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa// slob
7a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po dz+nyA lan d+hA ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin rnam dug gnyis kyi rgyu byas pas// brgyad po 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ste/ lnga nyid spang byaM lnga nyid lam yang yin/
7a4(rgyud 'grel): dag byed ngo bo sems kyi rang bzhin sku// bsam mi khyab pa'i rtog pa rang la byung // bzhi dang bral te gsum du rtag tu med// dag byang rang bzhin dog pa'i ngang du snang // gnyis po spangs te lnga nyid lam du bya// lnga la
7a5(rgyud 'grel): mi tshogs glang chen smyon pa 'dra// ku sha rlung bskyod spyod 'di bdag la gces// sha 'u sar pa 'dra bar gso ba 'di// kun la gces pa yin zhes ri khrod gsungs// ma rtogs rtogs pa'i spyod pa smyon pa 'dra// rtogs nas mau spyod blun po'i
7a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa yin// gang yang mi rtog de yi ngang la bzhag/ grol bar 'gyur te de nyid the tshom med// gsum po spang bar gyis shing rang la ltos/ zhes gdams so// dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i man ngag/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba ro khrod pa
7b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gsung / rje mi nyag lo tse bas bsgyur ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI sa ha dza sa pa ra swa tiSh+ThA nAn+yA mA/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan cig skyes pa bang ba'i mchog/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba// he ru kA la phyag
7b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// kye ho sgrub pa'i snying po bde chen rang gi sems// 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rkyen dang bcas gyur kyang // rgya mtsho'i chu ni dngas ma'i rang bzhin yin// rnyog mi'i rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung // ma bcos rang sar bzhag na rgyal ba'i thugs//
7b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di na bla ma'i dus tha bas bstan las byung ba ste/ thabs kyi rgyal po thams cad gtang bar bya ba'o// zhes ri khrod pa chen pos gsungs so// phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so// / @#rgya gar skad du/ shrI sa hA dza
7b4(rgyud 'grel): saM pa ra swa tiSh+Tha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ bdag byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba// he ru ka la phyag 'tsha lo// rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste// byin gyis brlab dang rang rtags dang // rdzogs pa'i
7b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan bsam med do// sna tshogs gzugs can yid du 'ong // yid bzhin nor bu'i gzugs 'chang ma// zin+da na dngos grub chen po 'byung // chos bshad nas ni dbang du bya// yang nr-i ri ba'i rin gyis blu// shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa pos// dbang gis
7b6(rgyud 'grel): yongs su smin pa dang // lha ltar bltas la dngos grub blang // me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar// gsal la 'dzin med bde ba'i sku// nyi shu rtsa lnga yul rnams rdzogs// bltas dang rgod dang 'khrig pa yis// mkha' sbyor bde ba'i pho brang du// dbang
8a1(rgyud 'grel): gi rgyal pos gar byas pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dgyes pa'i glu// oM da hi gis sgra brjod pas// tshangs pa'i ri bo ci nas nyil// rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bltams pa dang/
8a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa bzhi yi rim pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// dbang phyug dam pa'i gsang gtam 'dis// na mkha' rdo rje grong du 'jug/ bde chen dag pa'i zhing ma khams mthong // thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i sku// shes rab rdo rje rnal
8a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma// gnyis med pa'i rnam pa can// ma ning zhes byar brjod pa ste// kha cig zung 'jug ces byar brjod// sgrib pa dang bral chos sku 'dir// rak+ta la sogs byang sems rnams// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor thams
8a4(rgyud 'grel): cad 'di nyid do// dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i sbubs thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba// rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi 'bring pos mdzad pa'o// rje mi nyag chen pos bsgyur ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ saM bar byag
8a5(rgyud 'grel): khyA/ bod skad du/ sdom pa bshad pa// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'brel las// bde mchog bshad pa 'byu nga ba ste// in+d+ra bo d+hi'i gzhung nyid dang // kun spyod dA ri ka gzhung gis// dpa' bo
8a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni rnal 'byor ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ru gsung // dpal ldan 'bar ba 'dzin zhags sam// ka tso ta yi gzhung rnams kyis// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// zhal cig phyag gnyis pa ru grags// mkha' 'gro ma sogs dpa' 'dir
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dpyad bar zhu bor bcas// sgo skyong ma dang yang dag ldan// khro bo'i gzugs ni hUM dang bcas// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// lha mo rab tu gtum sogs ma bzhin// sku mdog sna tshogs khyad par ro// brtul bzhugs zhal sta nas kyis gzhung //
8b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig po// sgeg sogs ro ni thams cad kyis// de rnams 'gying pas rol par 'gyur// yang na sems ni rnam dag pa// sku mdog sngon po rnam pa'i dbyibs// dpa' bo lha mor yang dag ldan// kha cig gi ni gzhung
8b3(rgyud 'grel): du brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha dog gsum du yang dag gnas// gang phyir 'khor lo gsum gsungs pa// de phyir kha dog gsum du 'gyur// 'di rnams nang nas gang 'dod pa// de kun rnal 'byor pas gus bya// phyag gnyi
8b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs brtsams nas ni// ji srid phyag ni 'bum de bzhin// phyag dang zhal ni grub phyir min// bsam yas sbyor bas bsam par bya// de ltar blo bzang shes nas ni// gnyis med ye shes bsgom par bya// dad pa tsam gyis 'jug bya ba//
8b5(rgyud 'grel): dpyad pa nyid du sbyar mi bya// mchog tu dga' bas 'di dag rnam kun// gang bsgoms 'bras bu mchog phan te// lhan cig skyes par thim pa yis// he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom// bla ma'i bka' lung blangs nas ni// dang por gus pa'i
8b6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis su// brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom byed na// dam pa'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar sdom par min// slob dpon kha cig smra bar byed// he ru ka 'byung rgyud gsungs yin// bde mchog nyid du ma yin
9a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// de phyir bdag gis ma bris te// dpal ldan rdo rjes bzod pa mdzod// man ngag gis ni phag mo yi// rgyud du nges par rab tu grags// 'bar ba yi ni phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i don dang nI// da
9a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gtor ma'i las rnams kyang // he ru ka ni 'byung rgyud du// he ru ka phyag la gnas pa// he ru ka'i rgyud du gsungs// na bza' dag gi khyad par ni// stegs gi pags pa bsnams pa ste// bdag gis bla mas gsungs pa yang // lhan cig skyes
9a3(rgyud 'grel): pas smad dkris na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi ni gzugs// rtag tu ngu ba mchog gi mchog/ dkar ba dang ni khrag gi mdog/ khams drug gis ni bsdus pa yi// kha dog la sogs mtshungs pa'i gzugs// dang po nyi ma lta bu'i zhal// lha mo skra ni grol
9a4(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid// gzhung ni 'di gnyis bgros nas ni// snying ga ru ni bsgom bya zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i de nyid bya// gzhan yang khrag gA rtsi rgyud du// shin tu dmar ba 'bab pa yang // bud med me tog g.yas naso// g.yon du khu ba 'bab pa ni// chu yi rgya mtsho
9a5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ste// de ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin no// rkang dang rus pa rtsa brgyud rlung // lnga pa khu ba dang ldan pa// pha las gyur pa 'di rnams yin// ma yi sha lpags khrag dang ni// chu dang me dang bcas pa nyid// de nyid kyis ni gang grub pa// 'di ni mgon po haM
9a6(rgyud 'grel): ru ka/ bskyed dang skyed par byed pa po// pha ma gnyis ni dbyer med pas// dpal ldan bde mchog bshad pa 'di// yon tan kun gyis gter gyur pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no// de ltar shes nas de yi gzugs// srid gsum bde ba
9b1(rgyud 'grel): ster ba ni// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms// sgra yi tshul la nges 'byung ba// zhes bya ba la sogs gang 'dod de// de don bdag gis bshad par bya// 'jug pa yi yang mtshan nyid ni// rab tu 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor sogs// phyi rol
9b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams cig mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// ldog pa bdag gis brjod par bya// 'khor lo sdom par yang dag gnas// lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyi gzugs// de ni snying gor
9b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gnas// phyi rol nang du mnyam pa nyid// dkyil 'khor gyi yang sems kyis ni// rnam par dgod pa bshad nas so// de ni lus gnas bshad par bya// he ru ka yi rol par brjod// rnam dag dang ni he ru ka/ yan lag dag dang nying lag
9b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / lhan cig skyes pas mnyam gzhag pas// phyis ni rnal 'byor pa yi bsgoms// go rim bzhin du lus skyes ni// rdo rje phur bu lhan cig skyes// bcings pa thig skud rab tu ldan// shin tu mtshams med bstan par bcings// gur ni rus
9b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phreng ba nyid// mchod pa'i cho ga khyad par bzang // yan la lo phyag rgyas brgyan pa dang // go cha mtshamaso med bcings po ni// de ni go cha chen por ldan// gang zhig mi dmigs pa yi rtsa// sems can kun la phan mdzad ma// lha dang lha
9b6(rgyud 'grel): min+d+ra rnams la// 'di dag thams cad de yis khyab// rkang pa'i mthil du rtsom pa'i rlung // yang dag gnas shing lter son pa// me yi dkyil 'khor bzi brjid 'bar// lto bar ches ni dkar ba yis// chu ni mdzes pa nyid kyi gzugs// brang
10a1(rgyud 'grel): du lang ni nga can ma// kha ngos ser pos rnam par spyas// mthun pa'i steng du brtan pa 'o// ni brgyang ldan nari rab po// bdum na ta ma A l-i Ta// nang du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang // chu skyes 'dabam sum su
10a2(rgyud 'grel): drug/ ldan par rdo rje'i dbus son par// A li kA li las byung grub// mdzes pa'i spyi bor hUM byas te// der gnas gser gyi gnas su ni// sna tshogs dbus su dang po'i ming // zhes bya lhan cig skyes pa yang // dri med zla ba'i gzi brjid nyid/
10a3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag kun gyis mtshams su ni// rim gyi 'gro bar byed pad+ma// sna n+ye dbus kyi gnas su yang // rim pas skyed par byed pa ni// sum cu rtsa drug ror ldan pa'i// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsa rnams kyis// spyi skyes thog ma med pa yi// sangs rgyas nying ni
10a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya// mkha' 'gro bya bzhin rnam dag khams// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba zhes// 'di yi don ni yang dag grags// rgya mtsho shim tu sna tshogs pa'i// 'gram dang ri yi dbang por ldan// zab mo sna tshogs snying po yang // gdod nas grub pa'i
10a5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod nyid// rgyal mtshan ba ngan sna tshogs dang // dril bu do shal shin tu mdzes// gsum gyis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor nyid// srang bu mchog gis shin tu spras// rnga yab kyis ni g.yob pa dang // so phag rnam
10a6(rgyud 'grel): par ngas pa yi// rdul mtshon dri ma med pa dang // bum pa la sogs bzhag pa dang // de byung ldan par gang bas ni// lhan cig skyes gnas dris par bya// thal ba ro bsregs byung ba// pang gnas khro ba med pa yis// sbyor ba'i ye shes shin tu
10b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// phag mo gnyis su med pa'i gzugs// he ru ka de sems su brjod// rgyu lnga zhes bya'i rig pa ni// rdo rje zhes ni mngon par rdzogs// der gnas sa bon rdzogs pa ni// de ni he ru ka dpal brjod// gnyis med don gyis shrI yi sgra// he ni rgyu ni rnams
10b2(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa// ru yi gzugs ni 'jigs pa'i don// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dkar zhing dmar ba'i rang bzhin can// shrI ni yang dag bshad pa ni// thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rgyu// shrI ni kla klo'i skad
10b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// b+ha ba'i don du mngon par brjod// sems ni he ru ka nyid de// dpal he ru kar rab tu bsgrags// b+ha ga'i sgra ni ngag lam 'das// rA ni dri ma rnam par spangs// hI ni rgyu ni rnam 'jig pa// phog mo'i sgor ni rab tu grags// skyed par byed
10b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyu yi phyir// ral pa'i rtsa ba zhes byar bshad// sna tshogs sems can don byed phyir// sna tshogs rdo rjer rnam par gnas// byang chub sems ni zla bar gsungs// dpal ldan bde chen 'khor lor gnas// der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ni// rdo
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rje pad+mar ya dag gnas// cha kun du ni yongs gang bas// rgya mtsho yi ni lam rnams su// 'dzag pa yi ni lam pa ste// lto ba'i 'gram gnas bdud rtsi ni// sngar gsungs rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams skyes// stong pa'i rnam par sbyor ba las// lha
10b6(rgyud 'grel): dang lha min mi rnams ni// rang bzhin gcig pas dag pa ni// shin tu dag pas sdig par byed// byang chub sems byung thal ba yis// yan lag kun la rnam par gnas// thal ba'i dag par rtag tu brjod// phyi rol nang du yongs pag
11a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// yan lag bcu gnyis las byung phyir// phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan// zhal bzhi yang dag gsungs pa ni// rnam thar bzhi ni dag pa'o// lha mo gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma// dum skyes ma dang lA ma nyid// grub
11a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnam bzhi// rgyu dang mi rgyu skyong bar mdzad// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang tshe dbang sogs 'thung ba ni// de tshe bza' ba zhes byar brjod// phyag rnams nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// rtse gsum sku gsum dag pa'i phyir// glang
11a3(rgyud 'grel): bo gti mug rnam par 'jig/ lus ngag yid gsum dang byung ba'i// skyon ni dgra stas gcod par byed// gri gug rnon pos sems can don// brtson 'grus yang dag ldan phyir 'phyar// rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis// sgra ni cang hor brtag
11a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// rdo rje stong pa'i mes bsregs pa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyi// kha T+wAM ga ni yan lag gnas// thod 'gro skyong ba thod pa'i sku// des na de ni thod par brjod// snying rje ro yI gang ba ni// 'thungs pa he ru
11a5(rgyud 'grel): ka nyid rgya la// zhags pas skyon ni rnam par bcings// lus can ma lus gzhan yang 'gyur// mgo bo tshangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// dril bu shes rab rang bzhin phyir// yig 'bru lnga bcu'i mgo bo rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par mdzes//
11a6(rgyud 'grel): mgu la gyi nor bu phreng ba'i rgyan// grub pa'i gnas ni kun gyi bdag/ mche ba bzhi dang rab ldan pas// bdud ba'i rnam par dral bar mdzad// choms phreng rtag tu gnyis med pa// me stag tshogs dang yang dag ldan// pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pa/
11b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya drug gis legs par brgyan// na mkha'i gos kyi rang bzhin gyis// stag gi lpags pa cha med par// kun gyis 'gro ba thams cad ni// stong pa'i sbyor bas g.yas brkyang ba// he ru ka'i khyad par las// de nas g.yas brkyang ba zhes bshad//
11b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i yan lag bskum pa zhes// tshig tu brjod pas g.yas brkyang ba// mtshan nyid yang dag thob pa yin// dpal ldan he ru ka 'byung ba// 'khor lo tshogs ni kun tu'o// slob dpon gzhan gyi lugs ngag gi// g.yas pa'i zhabs ni bskum
11b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod// blo bzang khe T+wAMg gar yang byed// gnyis ka 'dod pa ma min te// g.yon ma g.yon pa skye bos mdzes// don mchog thams cad sbyin par nus// g.yon gyis rtag tu rnal 'byor pa'i// gnod pa kun las 'jigs rgyal byed// gang phyir sde
11b4(rgyud 'grel): ba gtso bor yis// nges par thams cad g.yon las 'byung // de phyir tsho gas nus pa kun// los ni g.yon pas rtag tu bya// sems dang sems min 'gog pa'i laM// mtsho skye su nI bus gang mtshon// rdo rje mthar ni rnam 'byung ba'i// ro mnyam
11b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig de yin te// phag mo sbyor mchos skyes 'dzin rig/ gang phyir gtso bor gnas pa ni// lha mo mchog gnas sdom po ste// de phyir g.yon pa'i cho gas brgyan// nyi zla rnam ngag srid las skyes// rang bzhin gyis ni ro mnyam de// pad+ma mchog gi
11b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su lhung // ri skyes rang byung yang dag ldan// De ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya// sangs rgyas khams su rab tu brtags// na mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya bar brjod// de las skyes pa gzugs ji bzhin// gzugs can ma
12a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes mngon par brjod// gzugs las rim pas skyes pa nyid// mtshon par yang ni dum skyes ma// gang yang mdzes pas yongs gang ba// skyes pa bud med las byung ba// mtshan ma kun gyi yongs su rdzogs// des na lnga
12a2(rgyud 'grel): mar rab tu grags// nga rgyal la sogs kun bral ba// des na bla re ru ni grags// pad+mo chos kyi dbyings yin te// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas// 'dod chags skyon dang bral ba ni// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs dang ldan pas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/
12a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni dpa' bo zhes byar brjod// de nas thams cad yang dag thob// stong pa nyid rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig skyes dga'i ngo bo gang // de ni dpa' mo'i dbang phyug yin// 'di ni dga' ba'i brjod med pa// 'khor lo sdom pa sde mtshan mtha'// rtag tu kha ni 'og
12a4(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// yan lag kun gyi yid 'phrog 'dzag/ 'dod chags la sogs rtsa dang mtshungs// ye shes srin bus zos pa ni// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyis// kun rdzob tu ni de myong ngo // na mkha' pad+ma'i mkha' dbus su// mkha' spyod du ni bgo bar 'dod// der
12a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas shin tu rnam spros pa// mkha' spyod 'khor los yang dag bshad// sa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas// lte ba'i pad+mar skye dang 'chi// der gnas shin tu legs par bya// sa spyod 'khor lor yang dag bshad// sa 'og zhes ni gang gsungs pa// pad+mar byang chub
12a6(rgyud 'grel): sems lhung ba// dri med yid kyi pha rol tu// sa yi 'og tu gnas pa'i sems// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis// he ru ka yi rnam par gnas// A li kA lI mnyam ldan pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas mdzes// A dpe gzhan na a bya 'dug brtag go//
12b1(rgyud 'grel): khyu sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni// pad+ma'i nang du dag gnas// lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa ste// 'jig rten gsum gyis rgyas par brjod// oM traM hri khaM pad+ma phyogs phyogs 'dab ma la// laM maM paM taM mtshams cha la// dbus su he ru ka sa bon// lte ba mchog tu pad rang
12b2(rgyud 'grel): gni sa// chos kyi lte ba pad chen por// stong pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba gnas// der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun grub par byed// de ster longs spyod 'khor lo la// oM gyi yi ges mtshan pa yis// kha ni rtag tu gyen du blta// a i lhan cig
12b3(rgyud 'grel): u e ni// rnal 'byor ma mchog dpa' bor ldan// de steng mgrin pa'i gnas su ni// de ru mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa// der ni rtag tu gnas pa yi// mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'dod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor hUM// zla ba'i 'od zer ltar 'dzag 'dod// der ni
12b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro dang 'ong bar ni// mig gis kyang ni mthong mi 'gyur// myur ba steng du rnam par bshad// rlangs pa ngos su rnam par gnas// 'ching ba dbus su yang dag gnas// ngal ba rtag tu rab tu grags// rgyu mthun dang ni rnam smin dang // skyes bu de bzhin mtshan
12b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid med// 'dir ni 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi// dga' ba rnams su rab tu grags// chung ngu 'bring dang chen po dang // chen po las kyang chen po sde// sems kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// mi la sogs pa rnam par 'khrul// lus la sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni// nges
12b6(rgyud 'grel): par lte ba las skyes te// de ni sna tshogs skad cig bshad// chos kyi rang bzhin skye ba ni// rtag tu sdug bsngal zhi ba'o// rnam par smin nyid snying ga las// rtag pa ru ni skyong bar byed// longs spyod ces ni bya ba la// du ma rnams kyi cha shes bya// de ni rnam
13a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid rang bzhin no// spyi bor shes dang shos byi gnas// yod lo rnam par spangs po ste// de ni mtshan nyod rang bzhin no// lhan cig skyes sogs dga' ba thon// lhan cog skad cog dag las skyes// 'khor lor gtso bor skad cig na//
13a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ni// phreng ba tsan dan bud med sogs// gang tshe mthong bas bde 'dzin pa// de tshe dga' bar yang dag bshad// sems can kun la yang dag gnas// rdo rje pad+mar mnyam sbyor bas// ji ltar sems ni rnam par gnas// de yi sems
13a3(rgyud 'grel): gang mtshon pa ni// de tshe mchog tu dga' bar brjod// sbyor ba las ni dga' bral sems// bde ba'i mthar ni yang dag gnas// de ni dga' bral zhes byar gsungs// skye dang 'jig par rab tu grags// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // dga' bral dang ni
13a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum mo// lhan cig skyes pa rang bzhin 'di // brtan g.yo kun sogs rang bzhin te// lhan cig skyes pas thams cad gang // bsam yas su ni rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir brjod med kun 'gro ba// ye shes he ru ka ru brjod// shes rab gzhan gyi
13a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su brjod// gang gi gnas 'di thabs gnyis de// 'di dag gnyis su med pas ni// sbyor ba'i gnas su gnas pa yin// de las byung ba de nyid gnas// de dang bral bar gang gnas pa// lhan cig skyes zhes yang dag brjod// ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul
13a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid// bdag gi de nyid rtag sngags dang // dkyil 'khor de nyid yang dag ldan// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa 'di// 'di yi sku la rnam par gnas// dmigs pa las ni sangs rgyas yin// dmigs pa med pa rdo rje 'dzin// gnas gnyis dag tu ma brtan por// she
13b1(rgyud 'grel): rab gnyis med nye bar gsungs// gnas bcul sogs dag ni// pha rol tu phyin mchog bcu po de// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yis// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// bad rnams rim pa ji lta bar// spyi bo spyi btsug la sogs dang // ji srid bus mo gnyis/
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag tu// 'di rnams kyi ni gnas dag tu// dpa' bo la sogs blta bar bya// bskyed pa dang ni gnas pa dang // rab tu thim pa zhes bya ba// pu li ra ni bdag po ste// babar ba 'dzin par longs spyod gnas// ur+yAn du ni thim par gsungs// gnas
13b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs zhing dang dur khrod du// yan lag kun la thim par 'gyur// sdom po zhes bya'i mtshan nyid do// sprul pa yis ni gang du skyes// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu yi gnas// chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis// thim par gyur par the tshom med// de
13b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar sku yi cha rnams kyis// dbang dang longs spyod dag dang thim// ji ltar gnas su de bzhin du// dbab pi rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// skye ba dang ni gnas pa dang // rim pa yis ni rab thim 'gyur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bskul bas// gnad kyi sgo nas
13b5(rgyud 'grel): dbye bar bya// dpal ldan pa bar ba 'dzin bu gar ni// de yi skad gcig bde 'byung bas// bde bas thig le skye 'gyur zhing // thig le brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag/ de ni phag mo de sangs rgyas// dpa' bo gnyis med ldan pa yin// phung sogs sangs
13b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas de rnams dang // khams kyi'ang 'byung khungs rnam par brjod// bud med skyes pa gnyis su brtags// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// thams cad yul du brjod pa ni// nam mkhar thim pas bdud rtsir 'gyur// de la gang dag spyod pa ni// thams
14a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkha' la spyod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro kun gyi dra ba yis// bde ba dag gi snying po'o// 'dir ni phreng med sngags bzlas med// lhan cig skyes pas thams cad gnas// de phyir rnam rtog med pa yis//
14a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas gus pa bskyed par bya// 'jigs dang ngo tshe rtag tu spungs// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya// 'di ldan bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang // mchod sbyin bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sogs// bum pa rdul tshon thig cho ga/ lus la lhan cig skyes
14a3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa// bsrub dang bsrub po'i sbyor ba las// ye shes me ni shin tu 'bar// las kyi rlung gis bskul nas ni// lte ba'i pad mar rnam par gnas// du ba thul ba 'bar ba dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gsal// ye shes 'khor lor son pa yi//
14a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs nas ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor bzhugs// thabs la mchod pa byas nas ni// mdzod spur yid ni zhugs gyur pas// oMr+yan zhes ni bya ba yi// gnad kyi sgo nas 'thon nas kyang // dzA lan d+ha rar rab tu zhugs//
14a5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs thams cad bsregs nas ni// lha mo yid kyi shugs ldan ni// dmigs kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul nas ni// bdud rtsi phung por byas nas kyang // 'o ma'i rgyun ltar 'dzag par 'gyur// gser gyi
14a6(rgyud 'grel): sgor ni zhugs par 'gyur// longs spyod 'khor lor gnas nas kyang // so yi gar 'dzag par 'gyur// zo chun brgyud mo lta bu ni// sems kyi ngo bor ngal bso nas// rgyun mi 'chad par bsregs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams ni mnyes par byed//
14b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pas ni rab tu 'byung // ts+tsha ba'i pad+ma yang dag gnas// kun nas yang ni 'gro ba dang // de bzhin du na rgyun mo nyid// mkha' 'gro tsam kun spang ni// bde chen 'khor lor bshad pa'o// / sdos pa bshad pa zhes bya ba// sgo
14b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la zhugs pa nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dzAM gau ta yar khor ston chos 'byung gi bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ sap+te a k+Sha ra sA d+hA na/ bod skad du/
14b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// byis pa bud med phal cher ni// rgyas par gzung dkar 'gyur bas na// mdor bsdus pa'i yang mdor bsdus nas// yi ge bdun pa bsdu bar bya// mchod sogs
14b4(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid byang chub kyi// sngags kyi mthar thugs 'og tu ni// brtser ldan lus kyi dbus son pa'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub bya// yaM raM baM la 'byung ba bzhi'i// dkyil 'khor stong du sum las byung // lhun po rin chen sna bdun dang //
14b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya// oM me di ni badz+rI b+hA ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM paM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pi tA na hUM khang hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wA la trAM saM traM/ oM badz+ra la a na lArka hUM hUM hUM// rdo rje sa sogs drug byas
14b6(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rjer gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor// rtsibs drug pa ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni hUM las byung ba yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde chen po// phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum po// mtshan kun gyis mtshan
15a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// dpe byad brgyad baM tsu yang ngag ldan// khyab bdag A li kA lis byung // rdo rje dril bus snyoms par zhugs// mi yi pags pa rlon pa 'chang // g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ phyag g.yas na ni mdung rtse
15a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum// thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang // ral pas sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang // zla ba phyed pa'i thod dang ni// phyag rgya drug gis sku la klubs// mthing dang ser dang ljang gu'i zhal// stegs gi pags pa'i na bza' gsol// 'jigs byed dang ni
15a3(rgyud 'grel): dus mtshan mo// g.yas brkyang ba yis nyi mar mnan/ mgon po ji lta de bzhin du// rdo rje phag mo'ang phyug la sogs// lha mo byon pa yang dag 'khyud// mchog tu dga' bas myos mo// dzaHhUM baM hoHyi ge 'dis// ye shes dgug pa la
15a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// rnal 'byor ma drug rtsibs drug la// g.yon du bskor bas rnams bskor bas// dang por lha mo khrag 'thung ma// gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma// gsum pa drag gtus ma dang ni// bzhi pardo rje sku byed ma// lnga pa rdo rje drag mo yin// drug brdo rje
15a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro yin// sngon po ser po ljang gu dang // dmar po bdud kha de bzhin dkar// skra bshig ma la drag chen mo// spyan gsum ma ste phyogs kyi gos// phyag ni cig shos phyag gnyis ni// sgra sgrog Dom ru dril bus mtshan// mi yaM pags pa bcwa
15a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ yi dgas nyi ma'i steng na gnas// thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can// g.yas brkyang gang na la yang dag bzhugs// lha rnams thams cad gau rim bzhin// yaM baM drug las byung ba bsgom// laM ma pra ti khaM zhes pas// khams lnga po ni byin gyis brlab//
15b1(rgyud 'grel): oM hU~M ha~M hU~M hrI zhes// gzugs sogs phung po la yang ngo // b+h+yo hU~M kha A ho ha~M gaus// skye mchod rnams ni sbyang bar bya// oM ha na ma hi// swA hA hu/ bau ShaT he/ hUM hU~M ha~M/ phaT ha~M/ brang mgo spyi gtsug phrag pa dang // mig la sogs pa sbyar bar bya// oM ba~M ha~M l-i hU~M
15b2(rgyud 'grel): mo hri hUM hUM hU~M phaT phaT// lte ba snying ga kha dang ni// spyi bo spyi gtsug gzhan la dgod// lus dang ngag lam sems kyi ni// oM AHhUM ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo bsgyur drug 'khor lor gonas// lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag gnas pa'o// bdud rtsi lnga yi khu bas
15b3(rgyud 'grel): gang // thong pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bya// mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi myang // byas par gyur pas spyad par bya// ngogs paM sems kyis ni// gsang snga tshogs yi ge bdun pa bzlas// oM hrIHha ha hUM hUM phaT/ bsam gtan bzlas pa gang tshe
15b4(rgyud 'grel): skyo/ de tshangs pa rjes dran bya// dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan+d+ra log ni dpal ho ru ka'o chos rang tu rnam por 'byed pa yang dgi byang chub kyi yan lag ni khrag 'thung ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o//
15b5(rgyud 'grel): dngoga'ab dang ngag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum me+e// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dA / khyung chub kyi yan lag+sa ni rdo rje snang byed ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byung chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drug ma'o// mo ku mu ga du ba nin chen dang // rnam gdu
15b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs srung de// ri dag pha rol phyin pa phyo// phyag rgya'i gzugs sbyor ba yin// mi go 'dun pa'i sku ba slob pon rgyam dga' blangs btus pa rdzogs so// rgyag srid du/ hrIHkris par hU~M D+yan oM
16a1(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi 'dzag pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po dgag dka' glang po mchog/ nus pa'i stobs kyis lcags
16a2(rgyud 'grel): kyus 'gugs// thig stong sangs rgyas nyid myu gu// zla ba'i 'od zer ltar 'phro ba// rang snying pad snang dbus gnas pa'i// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nang dmigs pa// sa chu me rlung mkha' rang bzhin// bskyod med thig le la phyag 'tshal// brda 'ba'
16a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig ni gtso gyur pa// tshig gi sdebs dang 'brel pa dang // rtag rang rnams dga' ba yi rgyud // dpal ldan 'khor lo sngon pa mchog/ yun rings pa ru rtogs dka' ba// 'brel med skad ni ma lus gsungs// de zab rgya mtsho ltar gnas pa// zab mo su
16a4(rgyud 'grel): yis shes pa yin// de phyir bdag gi rtsa ba yis// bshad pa phyi ma yongs shes pas// 'khor lo dag pa de ring brtsams// ri dang nag tshal phug rnams dang // chu bo'i 'gram dang bzhi mdo dang // rgya mtsho chen po nyams dga'i 'gram// shing gcig
16a5(rgyud 'grel): drung dang bde ba'i gnas// gnas ni nye bar bstan pa yin// yang na yid dang mthun pa te// de ru rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu thob// snying ga chu skyes dbus gnas par// nyi mthong ba bsgom par bya// de ru de nyid mchog lnga
16a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin zhi// 'od zer sna tshogs rang bzhin mchog/ kun nas rnam par 'phro gyur pa// sems tsam nyid du gnas pa ste// byang chub mchog ni sgrub par byed// nam mkha'i dbyings su bsgom par bya ba// dkyil 'khor mchog dga'
16b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bsgom par bya// dz+wa la gang gtams 'dra 'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchong par bya// 'gro 'drug gi sems can rnams// bla mo gau 'byung 'tho bya'i phyir// ngo ru gsum la skyabs 'gro byas// dam brgya' yongs su gzung byam+b+ha
16b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// sangs rgyas he ru ka ru shog/ de nas tshangs pa yi ni gnas// bzhi po rnams ni bsgom par bya// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa dmigaso// sems ni mchog ste gcig gyur pas// phyi rol nang gi chos rnams ni//
16b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad stong par blta bar bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ata ma ko haM// rnam shes so sor snang ba tsam// sems tsam rnam par brtag par bya// sa yi 'og gi mthar thug pa// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// yi ge yaM las yang
16b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag byung // kha dog sngon po gzhu rnam pa// du ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs kyis bskor// ba dan mtshan pa de bsgom bya// de steng yi ge raM las ni// me yi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa// gru gsum kha dog dmar po ni// 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i
16b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs chen po// nyi ma bye ba dang mtshungs bsams// rdo rjes mtshan pa de bsgom bya// de yi steng du chu nyid ni// zlum po 'od zer phreng ba can// ba mo dang ni mtshungs pa nyid// baM skyes bum pas mtshan pa'o// de yi steng du sa bsgom pa// yi ge
16b6(rgyud 'grel): lam las byung ba mchog/ gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa la// ser po 'od kyi tshogs kyis bskor// de steng bsgom par bya ba nyid// ri yi rgyal po ri rab mchog/ rin chen bdun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan//
17a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge sum las yang dag byung // 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu 'khrig// de rur 'dra ba dang // rdo rje sa gzhi bla re dang // mnga' yi dra ba byin gyis brlabs// me yi dra ba phyi rol nyid// oM me di ni badz+ri b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM/
17a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM aM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wa la traM saM tAM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM hUM hUM// dpal he ru ka 'khor lo// rtsibs brgyad rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od // 'dir nyi'i gzugs brnyan la
17a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas blta/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// de nas lugs byung lugs min pas// khro bo brgyad ni bri bar bya// rdo rje sa gtum mo nyi ma me// rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// rdo rje gnod sbyin bdud rtsi 'khyil// rdo rje dus dang stob
17a4(rgyud 'grel): po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba// khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod// sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang gu dung kha'i mdog 'dra dang // dkar po nag po dmar 'dra ba// 'jigs byed thod pa dang ldan gtsigs// de bzhin zhal gsum phag drug
17a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// thams cad mi rus rgyan gyis mdzes// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dkyil bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po rnams// zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par bsgom// thod pa kha T+wAM ga dag bsnams// zhigs
17a6(rgyud 'grel): pa lcags kyu bsnams pa mchog/ dril bu cang te'u thams cad la// shes rab 'khyud pa dam pa ba // skra ser gyi na rdzas zhal 'gyur zhing // mche ba gtsigs ldan 'jigs byed pa// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams// sbrul gyi rgyan
17b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'dzags mdzad pa// de gyur pa yi bdag nyid las// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom// drag pa khro bo 'bar bas bskor// nal 'gyur gtsigs shing 'jigs mdzad pa// rgyan kun gyis ni kun tu mtshan// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang /
17b2(rgyud 'grel): del bu thong pa kha T+wAM ga/ mgo bo'i phreng bas lus drag po// mag bo'i skye rags drag pos bcings// gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// shes rab dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom pa
17b3(rgyud 'grel): bya// steng dang 'og tu gnas bsam pa// khro bo gnyi sa ni rnam par bsgom// gtsugu tor rdo rje sa 'og ste// dkar po mig sngon 'dra ba'i 'ong // thong mtshan khA thA gA bsnams pa// phyag na 'khor lo mdung zhugs pa// lcags kyu rdo rje dril bu bsnam
17b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// khro bo'i rnam pa'i phur bu ni/ phyogs bcu po 'dir dgod par bya// oM suM b+hu nI suM b+hA hUM hUM phaT phaT/ shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM huM phaT phaT/ byang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT phaT/ nub
17b5(rgyud 'grel): tu'o// oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn badz+ra rA dza huM huM phaT phaT/ lho ru'o// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bgegs rnams kun gyis mge bai ru// lugs su 'byung dang lugs mi na pas// khro bo'i phur bu dgod
17b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hU~M phaT/ oM hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nAM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra/
18a1(rgyud 'grel): kI lA ko TA ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje blo mchog khro tshig gis// phyis ni gsang sngags 'di bzlas bya// oM kha badz+ra d+h+r-ig badz+ra d+hU ka ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra an+da lArka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM phaT
18a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra kut+tA li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bI shwa na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+roSh+NI Sha tsakra ben+ti badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pa to la badz+ra hUM phaT/ de ltar nga rgyal nyid kyis grub// skad
18a3(rgyud 'grel): cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur// sngon po ser po ljang gu ni// rdo rje hUM ka ra ru bshad// ser po dang ni nag po ljang // dudadu kha ser po dang ljang gu/ dkar po dang ni sor po ljang // dmar po dang ni ser ljang gu/ ljang gu ser po dang nag po// gzhan rnams
18a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni bdag po bzhin// mi bskyod cod pan dam tshig tu// bsgoms pas rdo rje 'chang ba dgyes// de ltar sgom pa byed gyur pas// gal te skyo ba skyes gyur na// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// dran bya dad pas mnyam par bzhug/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sA d+hA ba
18a5(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM oM A ni mi tA dz+nyA no badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM a pra Ni hi tA dz+nyA na badz+rA swa b+hA ba A hU~M ki ha~M/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag yongs su gyur pa mkha' dbyings te/ mkha' dbyings de ru bsgom bya ba// yi ge oM ni rnam par ze sgom// ngas
18a6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'khor lo gnyis ka las// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya// dkar po phyag bzhi rig mas 'khyud// g.yas dang g.yon la 'khor lo dang // thod pa dang ni cang te'u dang // kha T+wAM pa yang de bzhin no// de gyur 'khor lor bcas pa yi/
18b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rgyan byas pa// dra ba dra phyed dag gis mdzes// ngar dbyangs phreng ba dag gis brgyan// zur kun gyi ni cha rnams su// rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa// phyi yi
18b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi nang du 'khor lo la// re'u mig dgu ste phyir bcu drug/ nang gi re mig dbus su ni// shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma ltar// lte ba ge sar nye bar brgyan// kha dog sna tshogs 'dab brgyad pa// re mig rnams la rdo rje ldan// sa
18b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje yis// phreng bas 'khor lo gsum yongs bskor// rin chen phreng bas par de bzhin// rin chen 'bar 'o ba'i 'od gsal ba'o// sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba yis// dam tshig gi ni 'khor lo bris// yi
18b4(rgyud 'grel): dgas kha dog lha rnams kyi// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor// rdo rje phyed pas sgo zur gyi// ka ba'i rtse mo dbus nas mtshan// phyi ru dur khrod 'jigs pa yi// kha dog sna tshogs ma tshig gi mchog/ sna tshogs shing rnams nyams dgras mtshan// khyi dang ce
18b5(rgyud 'grel): spang dag gis 'jigs// khwa dang bug pa bya rgod khra// wa dang rtsi li ka de bzhin// keng rus gdung gis phug pa dang // 'phyang ba dang ni phyed bsregs dang // spyi bo kos ko pus mo dang // lag pa mgo bo rnams kyis brgyan// sgra sgrogs de bzhin glang mgo dang /
18b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs sbrul gyis dga'// seng+ge stog dang phag rgod dang // de bzhin dom dang rwa rnams dang // dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// rnam pa sna tshogs 'dus pa mchog/ thod pa khwa T+wAM ga ni bsnams// gri gug cang te'u de bzhin no// gnod sbyin ro langs srin/
19a1(rgyud 'grel): po rnams// de ltar sna tshogs dur khrod do// de ru nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor blta// A li kA yi rang sa bon// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha'// stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ bya ba grub pa
19a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa dang // shin tu rnam par dag pa dmigs// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang rig bcas// rim pa 'di yis rnam par bsam// dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dang ni zhal rnams bzhi// rdo rje
19a3(rgyud 'grel): dril bus yang dag 'khyud// mdung dang dgra sta cang te'u dang / gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ tshangs pa'i pags pa na bzar bsnams// zhags pa tshangs pa mgo de bzhin// phyag bcu gnyis kyis brgyan byas pa// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis
19a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa// thod pa'i cong pan gyis mi bzang // rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag rdzogs// mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan// snying ga ye shes ngam pacho ga ste// rdo rje 'chang ba'i cong po ma can// thabs ji bzhin du shes rab ste/
19a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas pa// bde chen thabs kyis sbyor ba yis// sku gnyis yang dag zhu bar gyur// 'od zer de las lha mo rnams// langs nas sna tshogs glu yis bskul// khams gsum bde thob kyi gtso bo// a la la la ho//
19a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i bdag po yongs rdo rje// bde chen rgyal ba'i cho gas spro ba// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i gtso// rab yongs a la la la ho// gtso bo drug pa sems dpa' snying // btsun mo rol sbyor srid gsum bdag/ a la lal to//
19b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bdag spong zhing rab spong ba// bde ba chen rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gtso// glu 'di yis ni sbyor ba yis// pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma yi blangs// pad+ma'i tshogs kyis bzhengs pa ni// rdo rje'i sbyor ba de bas so// mgon po la ni 'di yis bskul// bde ba
19b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'di gnas la// bzhengs nas sangs rgyas thams cad de// ma lus pa yi rgyal po spros// zhal bzhi phyag ni bo cu gnyis pa// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa gnas// zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang // spyan gsum zhal ni rnam par
19b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan// sku la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo bo dang ni nu ma mnan// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs// rdo rje ro yis rnam par khyab// rdo rje phag mo la ni
19b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud// 'khyud pa yi ni phyag gnyis la// rtse dgu kho bye rdor dril bu// phyag gzhan gnyis po dag la ni// glang chen pags pa'i na ba chung // g.yas kyi phyag ni gsum pa la// rdo rjes mtshan pa mdung 'dzin pa'o// bzhi pa la ni lcags kyu
19b5(rgyud 'grel): ste// lnga pa la ni gri gug stau// drug pa la ni cang te'u'o// g.yon pa'i phyag ni gsum pa la// thod pa rkang gis bkang ba'o// mchod phyir thogs pa'i sbyor bo yis// kha T+wAM ga ni bsnams pa'o// sna tshogs 'phan ni rab tu 'phyang // de steng kha
19b6(rgyud 'grel): bye rtse lnga pa'i// rdo rje dang ni dril bus mtshan// dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan// 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa// bzhi pa la ni rdo rje zhags// lnga pa la ni tshangs pa'i ma go/ drug pa la ni sta re'o// sngo ser dmar dang ljang gu'i zhal// drag po
20a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhad sgeg dpa' bo dang // rngam dang ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal// de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// kha dog dkar po ske rags ni// dum bus mtshan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das zhal kha dog
20a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar// lha mo'i phyag gi kha dog de// dmar po ljang gu ser po dang // shin tu sngo mdog zhal gyi 'od// skra grol gcer bu g.yon pa yi// phyag 'khyud pa la ma rungs pa'i// bdud kyi khrag bkang thod pa'o// g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub phyogs kun
20a3(rgyud 'grel): du// gdug pa sngogs shing gri gug 'chang // cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams phyag/ zhal nas khrag ni 'dzag pa ste// zhabs gnyis kyis ni yang dag dkris// bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid ma// snying ga'i lcags kyus sbyor ba yis// ye
20a4(rgyud 'grel): shes 'khor lo dgug par bya// ye shes 'khor lo legs bkug ste// mchod bstod byas nas bzhugs par bya// 'di nyid kyis ni gnas tshogs rim// dgod bya nang gi sbyor ba mchog/ pu li ra ma la yar te// spyi bor thod pa'i dum bu dang
20a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gtum ma'o// dzA lan+d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug tu keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// oM D+yan te rna ba g.yas par keng rus chen po dang 'od can ma'o// an+d+ra da s+t+wa~M rgyab kyi char mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ste gnas so// gau dA pa ri
20a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rna ba g.yon pa su raM be raM dang // dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o// rA me shwari ste smin ma'i dbus su 'od dpag med dang // mi thung ma'o// de bi ko Ti te mig gnyi su rdo rje 'ang dang // lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// mA lA ya ste/ dpung mgor rdo rje sru dang
20b1(rgyud 'grel): shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so// 'di dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// nam mkha' la spyod pa'o// kA ma ru pa ste/ mchan khung dag la myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// oM dr-i ste/ nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed
20b2(rgyud 'grel): chen mo ste zhing ngo // tri sha ku ne ste/ lte bar dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// ko sa la ste/ sna rtsar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ nye ba'i zhing ngo // ka ling ka ste/ khar ni rab tu bzang po dang / lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o// lam pa ka ste/
20b3(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang / rab bzangs ma ste/ tshan do ha'o// kany+dzi ste/ snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o// hi ma la ste/ 'joms su mig bzang dang / kha ga na ste/ nye ba'i tshan+do ha ste/ gsung gi 'khor lo spyod ma'o// pre ta pu ri ste/ mtshan
20b4(rgyud 'grel): la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o// gri ha de ba ta ste/ bshang ba'i lam du ni rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma ste/ 'dus pa'o// sau rASh+Ta ste/ brla gnyis su rta mgrin dang mchu can ma'o// su baR+Sha dI pa ste/ byin pa gnyis la na mkha'i
20b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ nye ba'i 'dus pa'o// nA ga ra ste/ sor mo rnams la dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo'o// sin+d+hu'i yul te/ rkang pa'i bol dag la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste/ dur khrod do// ma ru'i
20b6(rgyud 'grel): yul te/ mthe bong gnyis la rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// ku lu ta ste/ pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ nye ba'i dur khrod ngo // 'di dag ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma ni rje
21a1(rgyud 'grel): la'o// lA ma ni dril bu la'o// dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i lpags pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshur ma'o// khwa gdong ma ni rdo rje mdung ma'o// thug pa'i gdong can ma ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o// khyi'i gdod
21a2(rgyud 'grel): can ma ni rdo rje gri gug ma'o// phag gi gdong canA ma ni cang te'u ma'o// gshin rje brtanA ma ni thong mtshan kha T+wAM ga la'o// gshen rje pho nya ma ni zhags pa la'o// gshin rje mche ba can ni tshangs pa'i mgo la'o// ga shin rje 'joms ma ni sta re
21a3(rgyud 'grel): la'o// byang chub kyi sems kyi snod rnams ni zhal bzhi la'o// pu dza o a/ gau rA de mA/ kA o tri ko/ ka la ka ha/ pra gr-i sau su/ nA si ma ku/ 'khor lo gsum ni yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yi ges zhi// phung po
21a4(rgyud 'grel): khams dang skye mched rnams// byin gyis brlang par bya ba ste// gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad kha dog dkar po oM las byung ba'o// tshor ba la ni rin chen rgyal po gsor bsregs pa'i mdog lta bu A las byung ba'o//
21a5(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug kha dog dmar po hrIHlas 'byung ba'o// 'du byed la rdo rje rgyal po kha dog ljang gu ho las byung ba'o// rnam shes nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' kha dog dkar po hUM las byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
21a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nyid dpal he ru ka kha deg nag po hi las byung ba'o// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa/ nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan dbus su bzhugs// glang po myur 'gro rma bya dang // rta dang seng+ga mkha' lding ste// yi dgas la bzhugs rim pa bzhin
21b1(rgyud 'grel): rig drug bdag po bsam par bya// snying gar rdo rjes gnon yin// gzhan rnams kyis pi bzhin// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas na'o// g.yon na gri gug nga rgyal bcas// thams cad la yang spyan gsum nyid// mig ngag la dru ga ti
21b2(rgyud 'grel): mug rdo rje dkar po'o// rna ba dag la hUM zhe sdang rdo rje nag po'o// sna la khaM ser sna rdo rje ser po'o// kha la AH'dod chags rdo rje dmar po'o// lus la ho phrag dog rdo rje ljang gu'o// skye mched thams cad la haM// dbang phyug rdo rje kho dog dkar po'o// sa'i khams la laM
21b3(rgyud 'grel): ltung byed ma ser po'o// chu'i khams laM mo 'ching byed ma nag po'o// me'i khams la haM 'gug byed ma// gser gyi mdog can no// rlung gi khams la yaM pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mo dmar mo'o// na mkha'i khams la khaM pang 'bar ma sto nag go// ltung byed ma
21b4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'ching byed ma// 'gugs byed gar dang ldan de bzhin// rang rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma ral gri dang // gri gug g.yas kyi phyag na'o// thod pa nyid dang kha T+wAM ga/ 'di rnams kyis ni g.yon pa mtshan//
21b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug lha mo ni// pad+ma yi ni 'bar ma yang // thod pa de dran kha T+wAM gA/ zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang ni// tshangs pa'i mgo dang gri gug ni// 'di yi lag pa rnams la bsam// oM ha snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po// na ma hi spyi bor rnam par
21b6(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad sor po'o// smyu du spyi gtsug tu bad+ma bar gyi dbang phyug dmar po ni// gau raT he dpung pa gnyis du shrI hi ru ka nag po'o// hUM hUM ho mig gnyisu rdo rje nyi ma dmar po'o// phaT haM lus thams cad la rta mchog ljang gu'o// oM baM lte bar rdo rje phag ma dmar mo//
22a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ sgyu rgyu sa nan tshu rgyu na /
22a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje can// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje dril bu thong pa bsnams// kha~M T+wA~M ga pa cang ti'u mgo/ 'khor lo la sogs mtshan pa rnams// dril bu thod pa nyid dang ni// kha T+wAM ga tsang te'u nyid// gzhan gyi phyag gis mtshon
22a3(rgyud 'grel): cha yin// phag mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// dmar po sngon po ljang gu zhal// gri gugs thod pa nyid dang ni// zhags pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ lcags kyu de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ lag pa rnams la 'di bsam bya// gzhan ni phyag bzhir bsgom par bya//
22a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal cig phyag ni gsum pa yi// phyag ni gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM dang // cang te'u dril bu de bzhin no// phag mo rdo rje sems dpa' yin// rnam snang ya mi ni dran bya// pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed ma// skyong byed ma ni he ru ka/ rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma/
22a5(rgyud 'grel): rta yi mchog ni gtum byed ma// thugs la hUM yig rdo rje yin// A ni ngag gi lam du gnas// yi ge oM ni sku rdo rje// nag po dmar po dkar po rim// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// na mkha'i kun tu khyab bltas te// bdud rtsi lnga yis
22a6(rgyud 'grel): yongs gang ba'i// thod pas dbang bskur tshig 'di yis// dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// oM
22b1(rgyud 'grel): sarba twa thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma yA shrI ye hUM// phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod// zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma nga bzhin// rigs skyes ma mo skyes de bzhin// mi snang mkha'
22b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod de bzhin no// dma' bar skyes dang mchog de bzhin// bar ma rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sa spyod mkha' spyod de bzhin no// sa yi 'og na gnas pa dang // gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo dang // dr-i za mo 'amo mi 'am ci// rig pa 'dzin pa
22b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon grub pa// gang yang bde gshegs brten pa dang // dkon mchog gsum la mos gang dang // de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor lo// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa// glu dang gar gyi mchod pa dang // sna tshogs gang dang 'dod mchog
22b4(rgyud 'grel): gis// he ru ka la mchod pa byed// rlung dang me yi dkyil stengs su// a las grub pa'i thod pa la// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis bkang // yi ge bcu drug ba dang ni// oM sogs yi ge gsum byin brlabs// 'khor gsum yang dag
22b5(rgyud 'grel): spros bsgom bya// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon du bskor zhing rab bskor bas// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin lA ma byang du yin// nub tu
22b6(rgyud 'grel): dum skyes ma nyid // lho ru gzugs can ma nyid do// mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog nag/ lA ma kha dog ser por bshad// dum skyes ma ni dmar mo yin// gzugs can ma ni ljang gu'o// zhal cig phyag rgya lnga yis mtshon// bozhi po kun kyang phyag
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ma// spyan gsum skra ni grol ba dang // gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis mnan pa'o// mtshams su gser dang dngul sogs kyi// bum pa'i steng du bzhag bya ba
23a2(rgyud 'grel): kun da lta du bdud rtsi bzhi// byang chubo sems kyi thod pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// pu li ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang // rab tu gtum mo dkar mo dang / bang du dzA lan+d+ha rar keng rus chen po dang / gtum pa'i mig can
23a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ser mo// nub tu u r+yan du keng rus dang 'od can ma dmar mo// lhor arbu dang mche ba gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma ljang gu'o// me'i phyogasu gau dA ba rir lha dgra dang // brtan ma'i blo can ma sngo sgyu ma'o// bden bral rA me shwa rar/ 'od dpag med
23a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi thung ma dkar ser ro// rlung gi phyogs su re bi ko Ti ra/ rdo rje 'od dang lang ga'i dbang phyug ma ljang gu'o// dbang ldan du mA la ba ro/ rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma pad+ma'i kha dog ste/ thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// skra grol spyan ni
23a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'o// 'khyud pA yis ni thod pa 'dzin// gdug pa'i sdig mdzub rdo rje 'chang // gtsug rgyan rna rgyan myugul rgyan dang // rkang rgyan tshangs pa'i srad bu can// mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul du brgyan// ske rags sil sil sgra sgrogs nyid//
23a6(rgyud 'grel): thong pa'i dus bu la sogs pa'i// dpa' bonal gcig phyag bzhi pa// rang mtshan ral pa'i cong pa na can// snying rjes grags shing 'jigs par mdzad// 'khyung ba yi ni phyag gnyis kyis// cang te'u kha tsA lag gzhan la// phyag rgya lnga
23b1(rgyud 'grel): yis brgyan byas pa// g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas pas gnas// thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod yin// gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar kA ma ru par myu gu can dang sa srungs ma dkar me'o// byang oM Ter rdo rje ral pa can dang // 'jigs byed chen mo dmar mo
23b2(rgyud 'grel): nu'u tu d+h+r-i sha ku ner/ dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs canA ma nag mo'o// lho ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thungs ljang gu ma'o// me'i phyogs ka lIng kar/ rab tu bzang po dang / lha mo sngo bsangs ma ser mo'o// bde ni bral lam pa kar
23b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzang po dang / shin tu bzang mo dkar mo'o// rlung gi phyogs kany+tsir/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma ljang gu'o// dbang ldan du hi ma la bar/ mig mi bzang dang / khwa gdong ma na mkha'i sngo bsangs ma'o// dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams
23b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni// rdo rje phyag la pad+ma nyid// gsung gi 'khor lo sa spyod do// sku'i 'khor lo'i shar pre ta pu rir/ stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag mo'o// byang gri ha de ba tAr rin chen rdo rje dang / dum skyes ma ser mo'o// nub so sor
23b5(rgyud 'grel): rASh+Tar/ mgrin dang / mchu can mA dmyur mo'o// lho s+phu baN+Di dI par nam lo'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha dmar mo'o// mI'i phyogs nA ga rAng / dpal he ru k+Sha dang / shin tu dpa' mo mar mo'o// bden bral gyi phyogs sin+d+har/ pad+ma gAr gyi
23b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo zla ba'i mdog can mo'o// rlung gi mchog ma rung / rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyu me du ba'i mdog can ma'o// dbang ldan ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson che ni ma dkar mo'o//
24a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dang po'i phyag na 'khor lo'o// sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og gnas// 'khor lo kun gyi dpa' bo dang // dpa' mo rnams kyi rim ji bzhin// dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang // pad+ma'i 'khor lo phreng bas
24a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan// yang na rang gi 'khor lo yi// kha dog gis ni lha rnams kyi// kha dog rab tu brtags par bya// shar dang byang phyogs sgo rnamasu// sgo srungs bzhi ni gnas pa ste// khwa gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma// khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma'o// /
24a3(rgyud 'grel): me dang bden bral la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ gshin rje brtan ma dang / ga shIn+da r+N+Ne pho nyam+b+ha dang / gashrI rdo rje mo che ba can dang / gshin rje 'joms ma'o// mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo dang // dpa' bo nyid kyang phyag bzhi pa'o// phyogs sgo
24a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams nas lha mo rnams// yi dgas kyi ni gdan la bzhugs// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi sbyor ba yis// pad+ma'i steng na sgro srungs rnams// mtshams kyi lha mo'ang de kun la// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// de bzhin mtshams nas lham
24a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// gzugs nyid kyis ni yid 'drog ma// g.yas na gri gug lpags kyu zhags// lcags sgrog dang ni dril pa'o// g.yon na me long bI ljang dang // dri ro thod pa kha T+wAM g+h+ra/ khA gdong la sogs ma bzla 'gro ma// ming dang mthun pa bzhal dran bya/
24a6(rgyud 'grel): ma he bong bu rnga mo rta// mtshams kyi btsun mo rnams kyi zhal// sing+ge stag dang glang po rta// mkha' 'gro me la sogs pa'i zhal// sgo'i rtsa ba'i zur dag tu// ma chod pa'i snam bur gnas pa ni// pi wang ma dang gling bu ma// rnga dung mo dang
24b1(rgyud 'grel): rdza rnga ma// bzhad mo sgeg mo glu gar ma// me tog ma dang spos 'chang ma// mar me ma dang dri 'chang ma// me long ma dang ro 'dzin ma// reg bya ma dang chos ldan ma// pi wang ma dang sgegs sngo// gling bu ma dang glu ma ser// gar mkhan rnga dung ma ni ljang // rnga rnga bzhang
24b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dkar dang dmar// pi wang gling sogs lha mo yi// pi wang sogs yangs phyag rnams la// rdo dril de las gzhan pa la// kha T+wAM ga dang thong ba'o// rdo dril nga rgyal bcas sgeg mo// glu mkhan ma dang rol bcas ma// pad+ma bskor bcas gar mkhan ma// de ltar
24b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad phyag bzhi'o// me tog ma dkar spos du dka'o// mar me ma ni mar me bzhin// dri ma me long ma dmar dkar// ro 'dzin ma dmar reg bya ljang // chos ni dkar por shes par bya// rang rig phyag rgya'i sbyor dang ldan// me long la sogs mtshan pa rnams// nga la
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa'i log rnams la// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ cang te ng+ka sgron gnas pa yi// khwa gdong la sogs bzhi yi'o// gri gug kyang ni de bzhin no// dang po'i phyag na mtshan ma'o// dkyil 'khor dpa' bo dpa'o mo yis// sna tshogs pa yi lta stangs kyi// rnam par
24b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng bas bcom ldan bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa yi ni lam bya// gtso bo ma lus bde chen thob// dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'o// a la la lo ho// srid las shin tu grol ba yis// de bzhin gshegs mchog dga' ba yis// glu 'di dag ni
24b6(rgyud 'grel): blangs pa yis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni brtags pa yin// sku yi 'khor lo mngal nas skyes// gsung ni sgo nga las skyes te// thugs ni rdzus te byung ba'o// thugs ka'i yi ge dam tshig ni// bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba rab tu brtag/ mkha' 'gro
25a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tshogs mchog gis// nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba'o// dpa' ngo'i lus dgod sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya// dbang bskur yang dag sbyor ba las// sgrub pa yang dag chen po bstan pa yin// cho
25a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya shud d+haHsarba d+harmAHsa ma ya shud+d+ho haM// tshes kun ro gcig mnyam pa las// sems kyis gnas par bya ba yi ni// ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung bya// oM badz+ra a mr-i to da ka hUM ba Tha traMHhUM phaT phaT
25a3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sku yi 'khor lo rnams par bsgom// chu gnas gsung gi 'khor lo ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// ma yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// thugs kyi 'khor lo bde chen po// sa yi
25a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog bsgom bya// de ru ye shes dkyil 'khor yang // de bzhin bsgom bya rnam par bsgom// mchod bstod yang dag mnyes byas te// dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba yin// ji srid
25a5(rgyud 'grel): skyo bar ma gyur pa// de srid rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom// skyo gyur rnam par dag dran bya// gang chos rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni/ dkyil 'khor lha'i 'khor lo ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag nyid brtan par bya'o// de la
25a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa dang bde ba dang / rtag pa dang bdag rnams kyi phyin ci log bzhi rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni// 'di lta ste/ lus dran pa nye bar bzhog pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar
25b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// dran pa ni nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la sems kyis ma brjed pa'o// de'i nye ba 'jogs pa ni dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'o// de yang rjed ngas pa'i gnyen por gyur pa ste/ sngon nyams su myong ba'i dngos po la
25b2(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'jog pa ni 'dris pa'i yon tan no// 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs ni lus so// bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni chos so// so sor snang ba tsam gyis rnam par shes pa ni sems so// de rnam
25b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjes su dran pa ni nye bar bzhag pa ste/ lus la sogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par yang yang 'byung ba mi dge ba'i rjesu mthun pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa dge ba'i mi mthun par gyur pa/ le lo dang ma dad pa la sogs
25b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ 'dun pa la sogs pa 'di dag dmigs pas spong ba ni// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa
25b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams yang dag par bsrung ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs 'phel ba'o// de'i yan lag ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
25b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// de la spong bar 'du byed dang ldan pa// rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / rten pa med pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / yongs su gyur pa nyid shes pa ni 'dun pa'o// de
26a1(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par 'byed pa ni lam mo// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spong ba ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'gog pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po kun tu mi sbyor ba'o// de rnams mi rten
26a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gogs pa la brten pa med pa'o// kun tu sbyor ba ni 'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos po la yang dag par sbyor ba'o// de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'o// lta bar byed
26a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes pa 'di dag ni mig la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po bstan par bya'o// de yang rnam pa lnga ste/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
26a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// de la dad pa ni/ 'jigs rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa lnga yang dge pa'i lta ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa la sems yid ches pa'o// sems kyis kun tu sbyor
26a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni brtson 'grus so// dad pa'i dbang po la brten nas chos gang ma brjed pa ni brtson 'grus bstan to// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ma brjod cing don ma brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// dran pa'i dbang pos chos rnams ma brjed pa gang mngon du
26a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por bstan to// ting nge 'dzin gyis rtse gcig par byas pa'i chos gang khyad par du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// ma dad pa dang le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / bag med pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba
26b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa mi mthun pa zad pa las khyad par thob pa'i dbang po nyid stobs su bstan te/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyis stobs so// rang nyid kyis yang dag par khong
26b2(rgyud 'grel): du chud pa 'di ni byang chub ste sems gnyis dang bral ba'o// de'i rgyu ni byang chub kyi yan lag go// de rnams kyang bdun te/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi la yan lag dang / dga' ba
26b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyad pa yang dag bya nga chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go//
26b4(rgyud 'grel): de la sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / thos shing khrod du chud pa ma brjed po ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ bad ga la sogs pa'i chos rnams mi mthun pa'i phyir/ phung la sogs pa 'byed
26b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan log gi/ chos rnams ro gcig pa'i sem+ba sa ni dga' ba yang dge byang chub kyi yon lag go// dga' ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdag dang bdag gi bgo chags bcom pa las/ spos
26b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ngag dang sems las su rung ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / stong pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings te/ tshad med bzhi la sems rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub
27a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag go// so so'i skye bo'i sa las nges par byung ba ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i snying po ma yin pa lus dang ngag dang sems kyi 'du byung la ltos pa meng pa ni btang snyams
27a2(rgyud 'grel): dag byang chub kyi yan lag go// sdig pa 'ba' zhig dang rjes su mthun pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir/ 'pha gas pa'i laM yan lag brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do// shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba'i sgom pas
27a3(rgyud 'grel): tshol ba ni lam mo// de'i phyir 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad du bstan te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i
27a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i tingange 'dzin no// de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni thams cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'jig rten pha rol la blta ba'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni blang ba dang dor ba dag spong ba dang /
27a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon du byed pa yid kyi byed pa dang / dge ba 'bar zhig la sems pa'o// yang dag pa'i ngag ni bden pa mthong ba'i don ston par byed do// yang dag pa'i las kyis mtha' ni/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang gong na med pa'o// yang dag
27a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'tsho ba ni rigs pas bskyed pa'i don to// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la rjes su sbyor ba lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams
27b1(rgyud 'grel): ma brjed pa'o// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni da migs pa'i rnam pa mngon du byed pa'i sems so// rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan ni// rnam ngag ye shes lnga nyid do// dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags nyid ni// tshangs pa'i srang bur rab tu
27b2(rgyud 'grel): brtag/ rdo rje phag mo'i sngags kyis ni// mgul gyis mgul rgyan mtshan pa'o// lha yoM snying po gsang sngags ni// brgya phyed phreng bas brgyan pa'o// yi ge bdun gyi gsang sngags ni// rna ba'i rna cha mdzes pa yin// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma
27b3(rgyud 'grel): yi sngags// pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa'o// rnal 'byor ni drug gis sngags// rked pa ske rags brgyan pa'o// dpa' bo'i go cha drug nyid ni// phyag rgya sku la brgyan pa'o// 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'o// sngags ni thod pa'i btung ba'o// rnam
27b4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad ma'i sngags gang yin// mgo bor brgyan pa'i thod pa'o// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // lus kyi khams su brtags pa yin// lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o// chos dran pa nye bar gzhag
27b5(rgyud 'grel): pa pa ni du ma skyes ma'o// sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o// ye shes kyi pad+ma'i rnam par dag pa'o// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum mo'o// brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
27b6(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o// dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan ma'i blo can ma'o// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi thung ma'o// dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma ste/ thugs
28a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi dbang ba ni sa srungs ma'o// dang stobs ni 'jigs byang man ma'o// brtson 'grus kyis stob ni rlung gi shugs ma// dran dpa' stobs na chang 'thung ma/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni lngam lnga
28a2(rgyud 'grel): bsangs ma// shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub yan lag ni rta rna ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni kha ga na ste/ gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor
28a3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i shugs can ma/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi lan
28a4(rgyud 'grel): lag ni shin tu dpa' mo// yang dog pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los bsgyur ma// yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson chen ste// sku'i 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa'o// yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' khwa gdong ma/ yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba ni
28a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi'i gdong can ma/ yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdo nga can ma/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dpal he ru ka'o// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni
28a6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni/ gshin rje'i pho nya ma'o// mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba mo'o// mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms
