147a1(rgyud 'grel): na dngos grub ste// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung cig/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// dkyil 'khor ma zhugs ston 'gyur ram// skye bo tshegs kyi nang du ni// ma dang dgod par brjod mi bya// deng phyin chad khyed kyi rdo rje
147a2(rgyud 'grel): drag po nga yin gyis// ngas 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba khyod kyis bya dgos so// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ ya ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ yang slob mas 'di skad ces brjod par bya/
147a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlobs la// rdo rje drag po bdag la dbab tu gsol// de nas dam tshig rdo rje 'di// rdo rje drag po zhes su brjod// ye shes rdo rje bla na med// de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol// de ltar
147a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang ba ces bya// de rnams rtag tu brjod par bya// gal te babs par ma gyur na// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de snying zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje drag po kha sbyor bsgom// rdo rje pad+ma'i ting 'dzin gyis// de yis bskul bskyod las byung
147a5(rgyud 'grel): ba// a yig dmar po'i 'od zer gyis// de yis lus kun yongs bkang ste// de nyid yang dgra brjod pa yis// sngar bzhin du ni gzhug par bya// slob dpon rjes su bzung ba ni// rig dang bcas pas bsam byas na// de nas
147a6(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'bab pa yi// yang dag byin rlabs 'byung ba'o// ye shes de nyid de la ni// de nyid du ni brjod par bya// yang ni lce la bsam bye ba// a yig dmar po dgod pa ste// spros shig rdo rje can nyid kyis// dog dang mi dge smra
147b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// de nas 'bab par gyur nA ni// brgya phyed yi ges brtan bya la// de rjes yang dag byin brlabs brtan// tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ hri da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+he me pra yats+tsha// sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shre yang / ku ru hUM
147b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha ha hoHzhes bya'o// yang dag dkyil 'khor 'ang+ga ru ni// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi rim// ji ltar bsod nams de bzhin shog/ gang zhig dngos grub gyur pa yi// de yi rigs kyi snod
147b3(rgyud 'grel): yin na// ji ltar bsod nams mthu yis su// dkyil 'khor 'di yang de bzhin shog/ sAR+sha pA yi tshig gis ni// me tog phreng ba dor bar bya// 'phangs pa'i me tog phreng ba ni// lha yi gnas la bab shes bya// oM pra bi sha
147b4(rgyud 'grel): ya ku laM shaSh+TAM ma hA ba laM/ 'di brjod nas ni phreng ba blang // bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di ni// sngabyas pa mkhas pa yis ni bya// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du// gzugs
147b5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan lta bu mo slob ma ni// gsal zhing sdig med mthong bar shog/ dau nas mig gnyis zla ba la// oM gyis byin brlabs bsgom par bya// snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag po yang dag dmigs nas su// de yi
147b6(rgyud 'grel): mig gis 'od zer gyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams kyi// spyan dang dbyer med ngo bo nyid// yang dag dmigs nas phyi nas ni// mig gnyis la ni yang dag bsdung // yang ni 'jug pa'i rnam pa yis// de yi bcings
148a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dgrol bar bya// mig 'byed pa yi tshig 'di ni// ji lta ba bzhin brjod bya ste// oM rdo rje drag po rang nyid ni// mig 'byed pa la brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de// rdo rje'i
148a2(rgyud 'grel): mig ni bla na med// 'di brjod bcings pa bkrol nas su// de la lan cig dri bar bya// khyod kyis mig gis ci mthong 'gyur// ji bzhin du ni smra bar gyis// dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang gu nag po nyid dang sngo// /
148a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dngos grub shes byas la// dkyil 'khor bstan phyir 'di brjod bya// kyi rdo rje ltos shog pa'o// de ltar brjod nus 'dir brjod bya// da ni dad pa rab tu rab bskyed// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la bltos// sngags dang phyag
148a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byin brlabs pas// sangs rgyas rnam kyi rigs su skye// mthing bar dngos grub sbyor ba dang // phun sum tshogs kun mAchog tu 'gyur// dam tshogs bskyabs pa dngos grub dang // sngags bsgrub pa la brtson
148a5(rgyud 'grel): par gyis// bsod nams dad pa'i stobs bzhin du// dkyil 'khor mthong ba de nas ni// sna tshogs 'od zer 'phro ba yis// dkyil 'khor mthong bar the tshom med// de nas he ru ka dpal sogs// kun tu dkyil 'khor pa
148a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi// de nas lha yi de nyid ni// gus pa yis ni brjod par bya// shrI gang bla na med pa'o// he ni rgyu dang bral ba ste// ru ni brjod dang bral ba'o// ka ni gang du mi gnas pa// he ru ka dpal zhes brjod do// rdo rje ye shes
148b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med phyir// rtag tu sdig pa 'joms pa dang // gang zhig 'dod chags dman sbyong ba// rdo rje sngon sang phag mo'o// mkha' 'gro ma yi ngang tshul gang // mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// gang zhig gdug pa rtag za
148b2(rgyud 'grel): ba// de ni lA mar rab tu bshad// nyon mongs dum bur 'joms pas na// dum skyes ma zhes rab tu brjod// sna tshogs gzugs su 'chang bas na// de ni gzugs can ma zhes brjod// gdug pa'i thod pa du ma byed pas// thong pa'i
148b3(rgyud 'grel): dum bu zhes su brjod// gang zhig gdug drag tshar gcod pas// gtum mo zhes ni rab tu brjod// yi dgas chen po 'dra ba gang // de ni keng rus chen por brjod// gang phyir mig gnyis gtum 'bar bos// de phyir gtum
148b4(rgyud 'grel): mig ma zhes brjod// dur khrod chen po'i rang bzhin phyir// de ni keng rus chen por brjod// bla med 'od ldan pas gang // ming ni 'od ldan ma zhes bya// mche ba gcig par ston pa gang // ming gis 'jigs par byed pa'o//
148b5(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa sdigs mdzubs byed pas na// de nas sna chenA ma zhes brjod// lha rnams yid 'dod pa bzhin phyir// lha dgra zhes ni bya bar brjod// ba mad 'odi dang len pas// dpa' rnams blo yi rang bzhin pas// 'dir ni dpa' bo'i
148b6(rgyud 'grel): blo mar brjod// gang zhig 'od ni dpag med pas// 'dir ni 'od dpag med par brjod// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde sgrub gang // de ming bde byed ma zhes brjod// gang gis dbyer med 'ong byed pas// de ni rdo rje'i 'od du brjod//
149a1(rgyud 'grel): lang ka ru ni skyes pas na// lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ru brjod// lha rnams kun gyis mi phyed pas// rdo rje lus zhes brjod par bya// gang gi shring gi gri ba mtshungs pas// shing grib ma zhes bya bar
149a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub myug 'byung bas// de ni dpa' bo'i myu gur brjed// mkha' 'gro glang po zhon 'gro bso// sa srungs ma zhes bya bar brjod// rdo rje ral pas 'jigs byed pas// rdo rje ral pa zhes su brjod// gang
149a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig gdug rnams rab ston pas// 'jigs byed chen po zhes byar brjod// dpa' rnams nang nas rang bzhin dpa'// de ni dpa' bo chen por brjod// rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs pas na// rlung shugs ma zhes bya bar brjod//
149a4(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs thams cad 'jigs mdzad pas// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces ni brjod// dam tshig srung la ched byed pas// chang 'thung ma zhes brjod par bya// dpa' bo rnams kyi gzugs bzang phyir// de ni shin tu bzang zhes brjod// rnal
149a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rnams rtsa'i rang bzhin can// de ni sngo bsang mo zhes brjod// rtag tu bzang po'i rang bzhin phyir// rdo rje bzang po zhes su brjod// kun tu dpal dang ldan pa'i phyir// de yang shin tu bzang zhes brjod// mu stegs ngan pa
149a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrog byed pas// 'jigs byed pa chen po zhes su grags// tshigs rnams nyan par byed pas na// rta rnam zhes rab tu grags// gang phyir blta bar dka'i dus phyir// mig mi bzang zhes bya bar brjod// zhal dang zhal du
149b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas na// de ni bya gdong ma zhes brjod// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'i phyir// de ni stobs ma zhes brjod// gdug can 'khor lo bzhin bskor bas// 'khor lo shugs ma zhes ni brjod// shin tu gzi brjir rang bzhin phyir//
149b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'dod// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'phrogs pas nus// de ni rin chen rdo rje brjod// dum bur byed cing gcod pas na// phyis ni dum skyes yid 'ongs ma// rta mchog ngag gi rang bzhin phyir// de ni rta mgri
149b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni brjod// rnal 'byor kun la mdzes pa'i phyir// de ni chang 'tshong ma zhes brjod// shin tu gzi brjid rang bzhin phyir// de ni na mkha'i snying po brjod// 'khor lo lta bur chos 'dra bas// de ni 'khor lo go cha ma
149b4(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal 'dra bstan pas// de yi ming yang brjod pas ni// dpa' rnams mchog gi rang bzhin phyir// shin tu dbang po mchog gi mchog/ gar dang bstod pa'i rang bzhin phyir// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'dod//
149b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu nyin re bden byeng gang // de yang stobs po che zhes brjod// snang dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin phyir// de ni rnam par snang mdzad brjod// rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'khor lor gnas// 'khor los bsgyur ma zhes ni
149b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod// sems can dbyer med ston pas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod// gang la brtson 'grus che mnga' bas// brtson 'grus chen mo zhes ni brjod// bya rog lta bu gdong ldan mas// khwa gdong ma zhes bya bar
150a1(rgyud 'grel): glags// thug pa'i gdong dang yang dgra ldan// de ni 'ug gdong ma zhes grags// khyi gdong ma dang phrag gdong ma// de bzhin gzugs ni 'dzin par brjod// gshin rje brta nA ma pho nya mo// gzhan ni gshin

152a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nyer longs spyod// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// ji srid 'khor bar gnas pa ru// dpa' bo mchog tu gyur pa ste// de srid sems
152a2(rgyud 'grel): can dpag med don// mi ldog par ni nus par gyis// gsang mchog dam tshig gi ni thabs// bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub pa dang // dngos grub kyi ni dbang phyug 'grub// sems can don ni brtan par byed // phyag

152a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi dga' bde yang dag 'char// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun// bkra shis glu la sogs pa yis// de dag yang dag bskul bar ni// bdag gis rnam par bsams bya ste// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsu
152a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// de ltar brjod nas slob ma'i khar// rdo rje nas lhung bar gnas pa'o// a ho su khaM zhes kyang brjod// des kyang gang zhig
152b1(rgyud 'grel): bkug pa rnams// rdo rje ye shes byung don de// shin tu gsang ba chen po'i don// dbang bskur ba ni ngo mtshar che// rdo rje dril bu yi ni sgra// mchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pas// de nyid 'dir ni brjod pa yis// dbang bskur rang gis sbyin par bya//

153b6(rgyud 'grel): tA ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pa ti tAM TI D+ho mo b+ha bo sing d+hu na ma ste/ b+ha ga bAn ma hA ba dz+ra d+ha ra su ra ta s+t+waM ma hA badz+ra satwa/ oM AHhUM/ badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro dpa' bo yi// dbang ni de
154a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar bskur bzhin par// rjes su mthun par bsams nas ni// dbang bskur bar ni 'dod pa yin// 'dir ni bkra shis tshig bcang ni// med pa'i phyir na rgyud gzhan las// rjes su mthun pa yang dag
154a2(rgyud 'grel): blangs// mkhas pa yis ni cho ga bya// de nas dbu rgyan dar dpyangs sogs// gsang ba'i mthar thug dang ldan pa'i// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// de ltar go cha yis ni sbyin// de nas stan la gzhag nas su// phra zhing
154a3(rgyud 'grel): smin tshig 'di brjod do// 'di ni khyod kyi bzung ba mchog/ rtag tu khyod kyis brtan par bya// sngags pa rang gi byin brlabs pa'i// slob ma la ni phyag rgya gtang // de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// slob ma yon tan gtso bor
154a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// brtan pa dang ni g.yo kun gyi// 'di ni slob dpon du ni 'gyur// de nas brtsams te de yi ni// gsang ba mchog gi bshad par bya// rgyud kun tu ni gang cung zad// sbas shing bris pa'i phyag rgya ni// dbang po gnyis
154a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyor ba yis// de nas stan la ra bA 'dug go/ phyi dang gsang sogs mchod pa yis// mchod pa yang dgu mchod nas su// gzugs la so gas pa'i mchod pa rnams// de ltar yang dag rim pas mchod// de nas nga rgyal
154a6(rgyud 'grel): me long ni// ji bzhin bstan pa 'di bzhin brjod// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// srid pa'i mtsho la mngon par brgal// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// khyod kyi sems can rnams la bshod// sgra yi
154b1(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal ldan pa yis// de ltar pi wang sgra brjod bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sgra yi rjes su 'gro ba yi// shes rab mngon du rtogs gyur cig/ gang gis 'jig rten thams cad du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
154b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// kun tu sgra brnyan lta bu yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// dri ying rgyal ldan pa yis// snying gar dri sku 'di skad brjod// de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi// skye med lhag par mos gyur cig/ gang gis sangs
154b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyus zhing kun skye// 'jig rten pa ni kun gyis kyang // rang gI lul bla med pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab dri bro shog+sa/ ro yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis// legs par sbyangs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga// yang dag gom par bya ba'i phyir//
154b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis 'di skad brjod par bya// ro kun rang bzhin med pa'i ngorI// rnam par mngon du rtogs gyur cig/ gang gis sangs rgyas byang sems kun// sems can du gyur thams cad la// lha rdzas dpe med ro yau mchog/
154b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul la dbul bar bgyid par shog/ reg pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor brtson// rang rig reg bya mngon byas nas// reg bya'i de nyid brjod par bya// khyod kyis reg bya mi dmigs par// lhag par
154b6(rgyud 'grel): mo ngon du rtogs gyur cig/ khyod kyis reg pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyad par rang gis rnam rtog byung // sna tshogs bla na med pa yi// reg bya'i khyad par mngon rtogs shog/ rang gi sems ni yongs gyur pa'i// lha rnams dag ni
155a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sogs// yang dag 'byor pa reg bya yi// bde ba dag ni 'byor pa shog/ de ltar mchod pa byis nas su// gser gyi thur
155a2(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs la// yang ni sngags 'di yis ni sngags// oM badz+ra Ne tra a pa ha ra pa To l-i hU~M/ zhes so// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis ni// 'dug pa la yang 'di skad brjod// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig
155a3(rgyud 'grel): rten ling thog gsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// ling thog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// de nas slob ma'i mig la ni// mig sman skud pa'i tshul bya ste// sngags pas mi long bstan byas la// chos kyi mtshan nyid brjod
155a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// bzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang lasna las kun tu byung // rang bzhin med cing brjod du med// de ltar chos 'di shes bya ste// sems can
155a5(rgyud 'grel): don ni bla med kyis// skyo pa yi ni rigs skyes so// de nas sarba ta thA ga ta A nu rU gA ya se zhes brjod// hUM yis mAng 'i gzhu sbyin par bya// de nas de yis gzhan yang ni// de bzhin phyogs bzhir mnga' ba ni 'phangad+ma// steng du
155a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang 'og tu ni// mnyam par gzhag pas 'phang bar bya// badz+ra satwa Abarjod nas// de nas de nas me long sbyin par bya// rnal 'byor lhur len slob dpon gyis// de la de nyid 'di ltar brjod// rdo rje sems pa'i rang bzhin nyid//
155b1(rgyud 'grel): dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni// bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas// hUM gIs chos kyi 'khor lo ni// de mdun de yi stan du bzhag/ AHdang ldan pas lag g.yas su// dung sbyin nas ni 'di skad brjod
155b2(rgyud 'grel): deng nas brtsams nas 'jig rten du// skyob pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor// dri med 'khor los dgung bar bgyi// the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di las yid gnyis med par mdzod// chos kyi tshul
155b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog spyod pa ni// mtshungs me de kun du bstan par gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la byas bzo bar// 'dug pa nyid du brjod pa yin// de nas rdo rje 'chang kun gyis// khyod ni bsrung bar rtag tu gnas// de nas de bzhin gzhan
155b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis// blo ldan dam tshig mnyam par gyis// thabs dang shes rab sems kyis ni// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// dog po med par rtags byed pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod// ji lnga ji ltar sems can kun// rang bzhin
155b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags sogs kyis dag par byas// gang yang dam tshig la sdang ba// skyo bo dam tshig nyams pa dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsang
155b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sems can kun la phan don du// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis// pha rol sems ni 'phrog gyur yang // sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod chags lta bu bde med pas// de ni skye 'gro la rtag sbyin// sems
156a1(rgyud 'grel): can don du gzhan bud med// bsten pa la ni bsod nams 'thob// sangs rgyas la sogs smong pa la// rin chen 'byung ldan rnal 'byor gyis// chog rtsub sbyor ba byas nas ni// bla na med pa'i dngos grub med// 'od
156a2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa'i brdzun tshig smra// don po ni grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rlung gsungs mog rje ldan gyis// dam tshig dgi pa bsten b+ha Sh+Ta// dri nas skye lce nas// sogs po yang ni rang gis bstod// khal mo sbyar ni phyag byas m+b+ha
156a3(rgyud 'grel): yang ni slob ma nyid la brjod// sems can kun la phan don du// sems can kun la thams cad du// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje chos 'khor bskor bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas rgyal// kun gyi
156a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag po zhes bya ba'i// rdo rje 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// zhes pas rjes su gnang ba yis// dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i// de ltar byas nas de rjes su// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs// dkyil 'khor dag ni bltas nas su//
156a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bskul ba brjod par bya// tIng 'dzin gsang sngags rgyal po yis// gsang ba sbyin pa bsam bya ste// rgyud 'dir brjod pa'i ngam b+hA sa ni// mkhas pa yis ni bza' bar bya// de nas 'di ltar byung ba dang // sangs
156a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor brtson// rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan bya// de 'dir rim pa shes bya ste// rdo rje drag dpal gzugs su ni// de bzhin slob ma nyid kyang gnas// rang ni bdag po
156b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ldan// lag pa g.yon pa chos gos ni// de bzhin 'dzin pa yi ni tshul// mchog sbyin pa yi tshul gyi g.yas// mnyam par gzhag pas 'di skad brjod// nga yis deng khyod lung bstan yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
156b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'gro srid pa dag la bton// srid pa shin tu ngag phyir ro// kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes pa'o// phyag rgya chen po 'di dang ni// gang gis cho ga 'di yis ni// lung bstan par ni
156b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa gang // he ru ka la sogs lha dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor gnas pa'i// dam tshig spyod pas mgrin gcig gis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub brtan zung bstan// gsang
156b4(rgyud 'grel): tshon mchog gis dam pa yi// 'di ltar phyag rgya chen po yis// 'dri yis byin gyis brlabs dang ni// stobs nyid dag ni 'di dag la// de la dang pa ru ni gyis// de ltar brjod nas de rjes su// yang dag dbug dbyung sbyin par bya//
156b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// de ring khyod ni legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te// mi mtshungs pa dang
156b6(rgyud 'grel): mi shigs par// 'jigs pa med par dga' bar rol// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das// srid pa shin tu dag phyir ro// dngos grub dam tshig sdom par ni// khyod kyis 'dir ni rtag tu bzung // sangs rgyas kun gyi
157a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin brjod// bka' 'di rtag pa mchog yin no// rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya gang // byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// dam pa'i chos
157a2(rgyud 'grel): ni mi spang zhing // nam yang btang bar ma bya'o// ma shes pa'am rmongs pa yis// de yis nongs na bshags par bya// rang gi bdag nyid mi spongs zhing // dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya// ji ltar bde bas bde ba bzung // 'di
157a3(rgyud 'grel): ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams// nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// gang zhig slob dpon smod pa ni// sangs rgyas kun la smad pas na// 'di/
157a4(rgyud 'grel): yis rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// rims dang dug dang dbyig dugu dang // mkha' 'gro gzu' yis 'tshe ba dang // bge gas dang log 'dren drag po yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir 'bad po thams cad kyis// rdo
157a5(rgyud 'grel): rje slob dpon blo ma che// dge ba rab tu mi spyod pa// nam du yang ni mi smad do// bla ma la ni rjes mthun yon// gus dang bcas pas dbul bar bya// de nas rims sogs gnod pa rnams// slar yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
157a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni// rang so sos gis kyang brten byan// sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang // longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos// bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// grangs meng par yang rnyed dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas
157b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang brtson ldan la// tshe 'di nyid la ster bar bya// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung // rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// de sbyin sangs rgyas thams cad la// rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur
157b2(rgyud 'grel): de las bsod nams tshog sa te// tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// da ring bdag skyes 'bras bur bcas// de ring bdag ni legs par gnas// lha dang ngom tshig mnyam pa ru// gyur par bdag ni the tshom med//
157b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe ldan de ring dbang bskur bas// rdo rje 'chang bcas sangs rgyas kun// khams gsum gyis ni rgyal sring che// bdag po rgyal por gnas pa'o// grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yis// de ring bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// de ring sangs rgyas
157b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid thob par// khyi da ni the tshom med pa yin// rang gi dam tshig mi zad par 'gyur thar pa ni// bsten bya yid kyi drin gyi rdo rje skye bar gyis// shin tu skye sla'i bai de bA sangs rgyas kun gzugs sku// rtag pa de ni khyod kyis rtog par
157b5(rgyud 'grel): rab gyur cig/ ces bya'o// bla ma yi ni zhabs gnyis la// slob ma yis ni phyag bcwal te// ji ltar gsungs pa la sogs kun// rjes su 'gyid ces ngag gis brjod// de ltar dam be ces byas pa yis// slob ma la
157b6(rgyud 'grel): ni phani nyid dang // sngar brjod pa yis rim pa yis// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs sbyin// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje dartul
158a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA gA ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha tAM d+hA ra yA mi badz+ra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes bya'o// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// 'di brjod pas na dril bu sbyin// 'di de
158a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bsrung // byang chub mchog te rgyal ba bzhed// de nas spos dang me tog sogs// bkra shis spyod pas ba rgyan byas te/
158a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo bor gdugs ni bzung nas su// de nus bla ma rang nyid kyis// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi// slob ma de la skor byed gzhug/ sngags pas 'di ltar ru ni brjod// dkyil 'khor kun gyis bskor ba yis// mnga' bdag mdog
158a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon rgyal gyur cig/ dmar pos ji ltar mdzes byas rgyal gyur cig/ de ma tshig gis brgyan bzhis pa rgyal gyur cig/ zla phyed mgo bor brgyan pa rgyal gyur cig/ lha mo'i khor los brgyan pa rgyal gyur cig/ dang po sangs rgyas
158a5(rgyud 'grel): sku mchog gnas pa rgyal gyur cig/ 'dod dang thar pa nor dang chos sbyin rgyal gyur cig/ rnam pa lnga la dag 'a rol rang sbyin rgyal gyur cig/ phyag na rdo rje bde ba'i mgon po rgyal gyur cig/ de nas sgo yi mdun du nI// gdug
158a6(rgyud 'grel): de nga bcas pas phyag bya'o// bla ma yong// la pos rgyas// rdo ltar brjed nas de yi tshe// sprob dpon lag gis ga dugs gsal nas// slob ma de nyid bskrad nas su// de nang 'di ni nyan du gzhug/ de ring dkyil
158b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor slob dpon dang // sngags dang rgyud ni khyod kyi bzung // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lha rnams kyis kyang mthun par 'dod// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// 'bad pa yid ni bri byas lnga// sgrub pa po
158b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams sngags la sbyor// de la bu khyod kyis bya bas// dka' las chen po b+h+yong gyur kyang // sems can rnams la mi phan pa'i// byA kun ser sna'o mi bya kun// zhi ba'i don du mkhas pa yis// sbyin srog gi ni cho ga bya//
158b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas sbyin sreg so rdzogs nas su// bla ma yis ni yon blangs te// gser dang dngul dang rin chen sogs// rta dang glang po rgyal srong ngo // slob mas kyang ni de rjes su// bcom ldan dam tshig nyid kyis ni// he ru ka dpal
158b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab tshe// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spros// zhes bya sems la rjes gnas nas// skor ba lan gsum byas nas su// lus kun yin lag gtub byas te// ji ltar sngar bzhin phyag bya'o// bdag rang bla ma la phu
158b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// mchod pa yis ni mchod par bya// ji srid bla ma dgyes par du// de srid ma bla ma mnyes par bya// gang gang cung zhig yid 'ong ba// shin tu khyad par can de nyid// de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis// de dang de ni bla ma dbul//
158b6(rgyud 'grel): gang gis shin tu btang dka' ba// de byin dpag med yin par 'dod// de ltar gang zhig dbang bskur ba// de ni slob dpon yin par brjod// de la gsang sngags byin pa yis// dngos grub 'dir ni the tshom med// de nas oM badz+ra
159a1(rgyud 'grel): satwa sogs// rdo rje glu ni brjod par bya// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// sgeg mo sogs kyis mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lhas kyang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rab mchod de// ci bde bar ni slob ma kun// mchod pa byas nas
159a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen par gsol// ji ltar rang gi 'dod pa yis// spros la sogs par mchod par bya// ji ltar 'byor par gyur pa yis// zhugs pa'i slob mas bza' bca' dang // rnam pa sna tshogs ro dang zas// gzi bar nus pa'i chang dang ni//
159a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rgyud gzhan grags pa yis// glu dang sgra yi mchod pa rnams// mchod pa'i sgo ni dbul bar bya// bla ma yang dag bde bar mchod// de bzhin du yang gsungs pa ni// ching bcas chang min btung ba dang // ji ltar 'dod pas
159a4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod par// ji bzhin rim pas bsgom par bya// de nyid gsang ba'i glu chen po// bde ba'i sgra dang gar kyang bya// dga' rol pa sna tshogs kyis// gtso bo la sogs kun mchod nas// de nas mang po bsam bya zhing // sngar
159a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ni brjod par bya// kun la dam tshig byin nas nI// ji ltar dgar 'os der ni btang // de nas phyi rol mchod pa dang // yid kyis mchod pa gtso bo ni// sngags pa gus pa yis ni mchod// yang ni nyi ma shar dus
159a6(rgyud 'grel): su/ he ru ka dpal ye shes che// zhes bya la sogs tshig gis ni// ji ltar yang dag bstod nas phyis// rgyal ba rnams la mkhyen par gsol// so so skye bor gyur gang dang // rnal 'byor ma thob gang gis dang // nye bar
159b1(rgyud 'grel): mtho bar med pa dang // brjod dang shes bzhin ma yin pas// zung zhig cho gnyer ma tshang // de dag bkru zhing bzod pa 'os// de ltar gsol bya btab nas ni// de nas 'dis ni gshegs su gsol/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun
159b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzud/ rjes su mthun pA'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // sgrar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// oM A/ hUM badz+ra muHde nas tshogs pa rtogs byas la// ye shes kyi ni dkyil 'khor
159b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso// zhal ni dgod cing tshim pa yis// slob dpon slob ma'i yon tan brjod// rang gi 'od kyis sems can kun// rang rang phyogs su brten nas su// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yis// rang gi 'od kyis gsal bar bsam/
159b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas ji ltar spros pa yis// gus pas lha yi dkyil 'khor ni// rang gi lus la gzhug par bya// de nas mkhas pas phur bu gdon// sngags nI/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi d+yAn badz+ra d+hA ra A dz+nyA ya hUM hUM phaT/ zhes
159b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de la byin gyis rlabs pa yi// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul tshon cha// de la spos la sogs pa yis// yang ni yang dag mchod nas ni// blo ldan gyis ni gshegs su gsol// A kA ro mu khaM la sogs pa// brjod nas
159b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo don mngon du bya// mnyam par bzhag pa mi dmigs bya// gtso bo rang gi snying kar gnas// mchod nas de bzhin bstod byas la// de nas rnal 'byor nye bar bsdu// tshon rtsi chu bo 'am rgya mtsho 'am// de nyid du ni dor bar bya//
160a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sa ni yang dag par// ba yi lci bas byugs byas te/ bdag dang slob ma de bzhin sogs// phan pa'i phyir na sbyin sreg bya// de nas kyang ni sngags pas kyang // de bzhin du ni phur bu gdon//
160a2(rgyud 'grel): legs par khrus ni byas nas su// bdag med par ni bsgom par bya// de nas phyis ni slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun// rab nyid kyis longs spyod bya// slob ma la ni mi bgo'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni
160a3(rgyud 'grel): yo byad kun// slob dpon gyi ni rig pa yin// dam tshig can grong ca slob gyur na// slob ma la ni cung zhig sbyin// rgyud gang lo ni sngon gyis slob dpon gyis// 'khor lo rgyas pa ru ni ma byas sems// des na de la bdag
160a4(rgyud 'grel): sems zhugs gyur pas// lhag dang chad don mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// blo ni dman yang gus par gyur pa yis// 'di dag mdzes par rab tu byas pa yin// rang gi yul la skyon dang yon tan na// mi bya dad pa yis ni
160a5(rgyud 'grel): phye ba yin// 'dir ni mchog gi khur chen dpa' bo dang // yang ni dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' bo yang // de phyir legs bstan dam tshig bcas pa yis// mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la bzod par 'os// don dang gzhung 'di
160a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par byas 'di yis// bsod nams kyis ni 'gro ba rnams la ni// yun rings 'jigs pa med por dga' ba dang // bdag gzhan bde ba mchog ni bsgying gyur cing // de nyid gsal skye rmongs pa rab 'joms
160b1(rgyud 'grel): nga / mchog tu mi 'jigs ster ba'i mnga' bdag shog/ nor ni mya lus bskyed pa'i gzhi// skyed pa'i sa ni lang ka ste// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyis byas pa la// mtha' ni bzang po'i ming gsal byas// nyon mongs tshogs

168b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin mthe bo dang // pus mo dag la rim bzhin gnas// pul+lI ri dang dzA lan+d+ra// u D+yan de bzhin aR+ShA da// gtso bo'i gnas su gyur pa yin// nga yis sngar bshad bzhi po gzhan// mtshams su gnas par gyur pa yang // nye ba'i
168b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi steng na bzhugs// go dA ba rir gyur pa cig/ rA me shwa rar gnas gnyis pa// de bi ko Ta ma la ber// lha mo gzhan gnyis gnas pa yin// kA me rU pa o dr-ir ni// zhing gi gtso mo gnyis gnas so// ko sa tri shA ku
168b4(rgyud 'grel): nar bcas// nye ba'i zhing gtogs gzhan dag gnas// ka ling+ga dang l+yAm+ba kA/ tshAn+do ha ra shad pa ru gzhan// kany+tsi dang ni gsang can du'ang // nye ba'i tshan+di ha ra gtogs nas// gr-i ha de ba ta de bzhin// pre tA pu rir bcas par ni/
168b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus par gtogs pa gzhan gnas so// su bar+Na dI par bcas pa'o// sauR+ShaSh+Ta ni nye ba yi// 'dus par bshad de gzhan dag gnas// nA ga ra sid+d+ha'i yul dag ni// dur khrod yin te gnyis rtag gnas// ma ro nyid dang ku lu ta// gang
168b6(rgyud 'grel): yang lha mo gzhan gnas der// nye ba'i dur khrod yin zhes bya// des 'di sa yi dbang phyug ma// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// 'khor lo'i rnam par rtag du bzhugs// thugs gsung sku yi dbye ba yi// 'jig rten gsum na rnam
169a1(rgyud 'grel): \u0f7f/ rnam par grol// mtho ras sA thA sa 'og tA// skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur// pud+d+ha oM a gau de m+b+ha// k+ShA oM tri ko kA la ka hi// thA gro so su nA sa ma su// gzugs ni rnam snang yin nas m+b+ha/
169a2(rgyud 'grel): tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po'o// rnam shes phung por gyur pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu bzhugs// he ru ka dpal mgon rang nyid// gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na// thams
169a3(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni dag par rab tu bshad// mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer 'gyur// rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje 'dzin// sna ni phrag dog rdo rje ste// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje 'dzin// reg pa ser sna rdo rje ste// yid ni rdo rje 'dzin dbang
169a4(rgyud 'grel):  he ru ka dpal bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bzhugs// sa ni ltung byed ma zhes bya// gsod ma chu yi khams phyin te// me nI 'dugs ma yin par bshad// gar dbang rlung dri bshad pa yin// na mkha'i
169a5(rgyud 'grel): khams ni rnal 'byor ma// pad+ma'i dra ba yin par bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched kyai// dag po yin par 'di bshad do// rdo rje gsum la yid gsum dgod// ye shes yi ge he ba dza// mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo sbyar// mthe
169a6(rgyud 'grel): bo rdo rje brtan por sbyar// de ni dpral ba'i dbus gzhag nas// gcu zhing bskor bas bskor bar bya// rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta'o// gyen du phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo rnal
169b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma rnams 'gugs// phyags rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// kun spyod cho ga las bshad de// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor mas// 'jig rten gsum yang sgrub par byed// oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha
169b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma badz+ra shu d+hi ra haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho&haM// oM ha dpal rdo rje sems dpa'// snying gar rnam par dgod par bya// nI ma hi nau rnam snang mdzad// mgo bor gnas par rnam par bsam// swA hA hu ni pad gar
169b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang // spyi gtsug tu ni yongs sa sgomo// bauSha Ta ha~M ni phrag pa ru// dpal ldan he ru kar bsam bya// hUM hUM ho ni rdo rje nyi// mig tu rnam par dgod par bya// phaT haM yan lag thams cad du// mtshon char rta mchog rnam par bsam//
169b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo thams cad 'di nyid kyis/ yan lag dug gis rab tu dgang // oM baM rdo rje phag mo ni// lte ba'i phyogs su bsam par bya// haM yoM ya mi ni snying gar// hU~M moM rmongs byed ma kha la// hUM hrI skyong byed ma spyi bor// hUM hUM skrag
169b5(rgyud 'grel): byed ma spyi gtsug/ phaT phaT yan lag kun mtshon char// gtum mo yongs su bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad kyi// cho ga 'di nyid yin par bshad// de nas dngos grub kun stsol ba'o// bde gshegs rnams la dbang
169b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur gsol// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol po// de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu// dag pa yis ni khrus bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta e b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ya hUM// rnal 'byor
170a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni dbang bskur 'gyur// dpal ldan mi bskyod cong pan can// snying ga'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus// sangs rgyas bkug nas zhu tshul du/ bdag gnas pa spu'i bu ga las// mchod pa'i lha mor bdag
170a2(rgyud 'grel): cag spro// de nas rkang pa brgyad sngags kyis// dbye ba rnam par spangs te bstod// bdag nyid lha yi gzugs can te// chos kun de yi bdag nyid can// de nas rlung me pad+mar ni// rang 'byung dang ni bzhi mnyam dang // gla rtsi dang ni ga pu
170a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // rta mchog gis ni yang dge brgyan// hUM gau rdo rje dkar legs dpyang // A yis rab tu rtogs byas shing // oM gyi 'od kyi 'bar gyur par// byin gyis brlabi nas mngon par bza'// rang lce pad+ma'i 'dabu ma la// hUM byung
170a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dkar po dgod// phyi nang bdag nyid can gyi gzugs// 'khor lo de yis rab tshim bya// 'khor lo bzhir ni rab brtags pa// 'khor lo ma lus kun dpyad bya// dpa' bo sa bon lce ru bsam// oM ba d+hU tI'i gnasna dwe la/
170a5(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyi phyogs su lce sbyar lo// byas nas rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom// rkan gyi phyogs su gyur lha mo// bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la// brgyud pa'i dang po bcu drug pa// dang po'i 'og ma sa bon yin// man ngag dag ni 'di nyid kyis//
170a6(rgyud 'grel): spros pa med pa'i gnas rtogs 'gyur// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gsang sngags ni// cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bya// mgon po'i snying po 'am yang na ni// de pi nye ba'i snying po 'am// lha mo'i snying po gnyis ka ni// ji srid
170b1(rgyud 'grel): mi skyo bar du bzlas// de nas rnal 'byor mas lha yis// rnam pa byang chub phyogs su bsgom// lus dang tshor ba chos dang sems// dran pa nyer gzhag dngos las byung // mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // dun skyes gzugs
170b2(rgyud 'grel): can mo rnams yin// bdun dang brtson 'grus dpyod pa dang // sems nyid bzhi par gyur pa ste// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po las// rab gtum la sogs gzhir 'gyur ro// dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan// de las
170b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa bzhi yin no// dbang po lnga po las 'dir ni// sa srungs mar yang 'gyur ba yin// dad dang portson 'grus de bzhin dran// ting 'dzin shes rab bcas pa yis// stobs lnga yis ni gsung can gyi// rnal 'byor pa ni lA
170b4(rgyud 'grel): ru 'gyur// ting 'dzin brtson 'grus yang dag dga'// shin tu sbyangs dang chos rnams 'byed// dran dang btang snyoms rnams las ni// de las gzhan pa'i lha mo bdun// yang dag lta ba stobs chen ma// 'khor los bsgyur ma
170b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ngag ni brtson chen ma// yang dag las ni khwa gdong ma// yang dag 'tsho ba 'ug gdong 'gyur// yang dag stsol ba khyi gdong can// yang dag dran pa phag gdong yin// ting nge 'dzin du bcom ldan bzhugs// dge ba'i chos so ni
170b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa la// gshin rje brtan ma yang dag bzhugs/ dge ba'i chos rnams skyes pa rnams// gshin rje po nya srung bar byed// sdig pa'i las rnams bskyed pa de// spong ba gshin rje pho nya mo// sdig pa rnams ni mi 'byung phyir// gshin
171a1(rgyud 'grel): rje 'joms ma bzhugs pa yin// de ltar bsgom pa dag gyur nas// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas brjod bya// ci nus par ni bzlas byas na// de yi 'og tu gtor ma dbulta// sbyar bA ba yi chog gis/
171a2(rgyud 'grel): d+harnams dgos pa sngon 'gro can// dpa' bos khams rnams rnam sbyang nas// sngar bshad pa yi phyag rgya bcings// sen mo so dang sku ba spu// phigs pa dri ma sha nyid dang // rtsa dang rgyus pa mkhal ma dang // snying dang de bzhin mig dgra dang /
171a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhris pa glo ba rgyu me dang // gnye ma de bzhin lto ba dang // bshang ba mtshan ma bde kan dang // rnog dang de bzhin khrag dang ni// rdul dang de bzhin mchi ma dang // mchil ma dang ni ngar snabs nyid// khams rnams go rim ji bzhin du//
171a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnams kyis yang dag sbyar// sngar 'i shad pa yi go rims las// de rnams gzhan ni mi bya'o// rkang pa brgyad kyis mgon po mchod// mkha' 'gro ma sogs rang ming lus// oM dang hUM gnyis ming spel la// mthar yang hU~M phaT
171a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo gsum gnas rnal 'byor ma// ka ra ka ra sogs pas mchod// 'dir ni tshig ni thams cad kyapa// snga ma'i tshul gyis spel bar bya// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti d+hA ri shA ya dang por bri// ma hA ka wA ga ni'i sgra dang // sar+b+ba
171a6(rgyud 'grel): b+h+rUM ba de rjes bri// de nas paTA ma kuT// uH TA li s+tha bri bya// daMSh+Ta karA lo gra dang // b+hI ba Na mu khA la bri// sa ha sra b+hu dza'i sgra rjes la// b+hA su rA ya bri bar bya// bai rU pA sho bya ta deng // shU ma kha T+wA~M ga d+ha riH// byA d+ha'i sgra
171b1(rgyud 'grel): da rngan tshig/ AM ba ra d+ha rA yA bri// ma hA d+hum+b+han+ta kar// de rjes ba s+phu Sh+TA ya bri// thog mAr oM dang tha mar phaT// bAr du r+b+ha hUM d+hes par sbyar// sngags ni rkang pa// rgyad ces bya// la la tshig ra'i mtha' rwa sbyar// ka ra'i sgra dang na
171b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// ku rurI sgra yang gnyis su b+ha/ na d+hA trA sa ya~M gas// k+Sho d+ha ya gnyis de bzhin du// hU~M dzaha pho dang / @Ta deng ti'i tshig gnyis bya// patsa b+hak+Sha'i tshig gnyis pany+tsis+t+wa~M// bas thu rungs par
171b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar// ru d+hir d+hA'i tshig gnyis dang // mA l+yA ba lam+b+hi ne dang // gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na de bzhin du// sap+ta pA tA la ga ta// b+hu dza ga sar+b+baM bA brjod// tam+ba dz+nyA ya yang lan gnyis brjod// A kaD+D+h+ya A kaR+ShA dang // hr-i hr-i d+h+r-i dz+nyo ngas par sbyar// b+h+yAM ts+tsha
171b4(rgyud 'grel): da / hU~MtrU~M ka li~M kI li dang // si li ma sa~M lI hi li gAnyis/ d+h+r-i lI d+ha~M la~M hUM g+hany+tsis phaT// bcas pas rtsa ba'i sngags smra bshad// oM shrI badz+ra he he dang // ru ru kaM yad+ma da~M nas brjod// hU~MDA kau ni dzAl so// ba rau ni sa
171b5(rgyud 'grel): yang bri// swAhA'i mthar bcas mgon po yi// snying po'i yi ge nyi shu ga nyis// de dang nye ba'i yi ge bdun// go bzlog pa yi bzung bar bya// Ta pa hUM hUM ha hA hU~M/ oM// phag mo rig snang sngags gnyis ka yang // lug/
171b6(rgyud 'grel): las bzlog par shes par bya// hA sA dza pa hUM hUM yo nIN+Da wa dz+wa ba ye nI kI Ta d+ha dbu rdzas oM// 'bum bzlas pa yi 'grub 'gyur te/ 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ mtshams kun du ni gtor ma dag/ kun spyod rgyud las
172a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad bzhin bya// oM a ra li ho dzaHhUM daM ho badz+ra DA ki ni sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho// oM kha ga khA hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+ShA ra b+hU tA pre ta pi shwA tsan+ma dA pasmA ra badz+ra DA ki n+yA da ya// i maM ba li gr-ih+Na tu/ sa ma yaM
172a2(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha tu/ sa ma sArba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha tu/ yoH/ ya then+d+ra/ b+huny+dzan+tu/ pi ban+d+ha/ mA ti kra man+tha/ ma ma sarba ka ra ta ya/ sat+su su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye sa ha yi ka b+haM ban+d+hi hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags la legs gnas chos
172a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid// 'jigs pa thams cad rnams spangs te// rtag tu tshangs par spyo du gyur pa// he ru ka dpal gnyis pa 'dra// 'di dag thams cad rab bcad pa// de yi 'grub 'gyur tshe tshom med// bdag gis sdom med
172a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzor ni// rnal 'byor cung zad ci yang med// sngon gyi slob dpon gyi bshad las// sgrub pa'i thabs su bzhag pa yin// 'on kyang 'di las bdag gis ni// bsod nams dri ming gang thob des// 'gro ba 'di kun rtang
172a5(rgyud 'grel): tu ni// sangs rgyas ye shos nyid thob shog/ mun nag 'dra ba'i sku 'dzin 'gro ba kun gyi mun pa la shin tu 'joms// 'jigs pa'i skur mdzad 'jigs pa ma lus myur du sel dwar mdzad// 'khor bar rgyu bar mdzad cing 'khor
172a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nang du gnas mi bzod// de ltar ngo mtshar spyod yul bcom ldan gtum chen skur ldan phyag 'tshal bstod // dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i tha bas zhes bya ba// slob dpon rin tshon rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
172b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po Ats+tshar+ya d+har+m+ma shrI b+hU dra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM pa ra maN+Dal maM ga la g+hA thA/ dod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo
172b2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis gang zhig chos kyi dbyings las nges byung zhing // he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar ba'i sku// shes rab phag
172b3(rgyud 'grel): memi'i pad+mor rdo rje rol mdzad pa'i// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig phyogs kyi pad+mo'i 'dab ma la// rigs kyi yum bzhi dpa' bo'i phyogs bzhi'i zhal la gzigs// ped+mo mu 'khyud gri gug
172b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas rnam par mdzes// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig mtshams kyi pad+mo'i 'dab ma la// byang chub sems dang tsan da ni dri chen gur kumu chus// gang ba'i snod bzhi dpa' bo'i zhal
172b5(rgyud 'grel): la reg par spyod// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig na mkha'i gnas nas legs spyod pa'i// 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud rdo rje'i phyung // gnas la sogs par dpa
172b6(rgyud 'grel): bo dpa' bo gnyis med rol// bden pa des kyang mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig sa steng gnas nas legs spyong pa'i// 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud pad+mo'i phreng // zhing la sogs par dpa'
173a1(rgyud 'grel): bo dang dpa' mo gnyis med rol// bden pa ngas kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig sa 'og gnas nas legs spyod pa'i// 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud 'khor le'i phreng
173a2(rgyud 'grel): 'du la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhing dkyil 'khor sgro bzhi mtshams rnams su// khwa gdong la sogs ma mo yid 'phrog gzugs gnyis
173a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra ba shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams dang // yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang
173a4(rgyud 'grel): bai stobs// byang chub mchog chos sum cu so bdun yongs rdzogs pa'i// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shing gang zhig rin chen pha gus mdzes pa'i zhal yas khang // 'dod pa'i yon tan
173a5(rgyud 'grel): sngas ni rab tu brgyan gyur pa'i// mu tig phreng ba gser gyi dril bu rnga yab legs dpyangs 'phyar// bden pa nges kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig rta babs pad+ma chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs//
173a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i ri dgos dang bcas pa dan 'bru drug legs 'phyar zhing // rlung gis spyod pa'i dril bu dag la chos kyi sgra 'byung ba// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig yongs su bskor ba
173b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod brgyang rnamasu// phyogs skyong shing chen mchod rten brgyad ni gnas pa la// gdong brnyan ldan zhing zhing skyong brgyad ni kun nas gnas gyur pa// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig
173b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar gyur pa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sprin chen brgyad ni 'dus pa gyur pa// dga' bo la sogs klu chen brgyad ni kun nas gnas gyur pa// bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi
173b3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis shog/ bkra shi sa gang zhig thugs rje'i rang bzhin chu chen brgyad 'bab cing // dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi gang // 'dra dang sha za gnod sbyin 'byung po nye bar bsten pa yi// bden
173b4(rgyud 'grel): pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkre shis shog/ bkra shis gang zhig rdo rje'i sa gaN+DI rab gur// rdo rje bla bre kun nas bres shing mnga' yi ra bar ldan// ye shes mo raM phre ba'i sa kun nas yongs bskor ba'i/
173b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ kha che'i yul du byung zhing / dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad
173b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// / bod kyi la tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// 'di'i zhu dag dang bsgreng ba'i 'khor lo'i khe bskyong rnams 'phags pas
174a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyis legs so// / rgya klur skad du/ tat+ta gar+b+ha nA ma sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ de kho na snying po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa
174a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs ro cha gcig snang ba'i byang chub zla ba rdo rje nor bu'i mthar 'dzin cing // phyogs zhal dga' ba rnam dag nyi zla'i spyan dang nyi ma'i phyag mnga' na mkha' 'dra// rgyu ma'i mgo dang rgyu gdub glang chen lpags ni skyed
174a3(rgyud 'grel): mthor phyin pa btsun mor bcas// mchog dang bral ba'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang gnyis sbyor khro bo'i tshul la phyag 'tshal lo// rang byung bde ba rtags pa las// 'byung ba mang po nyams myong zhing // rigs kyi phyag rgya'i spyod
174a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// bde ba dang 'brel yongs dag blo// dbugs ldan dur khrod gnas su ni// brtse ba gzhan gyis dbang byas te// dmar la sogs pa'i ri lu lnga// khar bcug nas ni smon lam gdon// sems can don phyir byed pa che//
174a5(rgyud 'grel): he ru klu bdag dran par shog/ ye shes gcig bdag mnyam gzhag pas// bla ma la sogs mchod par bya// gnod mdzes sngags spros lha mo yi// khro mo khwa gdong sogs brgyad kyis// bgegs gtar nas ni mi thong du
174a6(rgyud 'grel): dron mo'i khrag ni gsol bar mdzad// tshangs sogs lha dang mi 'am ci// mkha' las rgyal bar gyur pa dag/ sa gzhi 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// thal bar gyur nas dengs par 'gyur// mgo rdum gar byed dum sgong can// mi bzang
174b1(rgyud 'grel): ha'i sgras 'khrugs shing // ro bsregs dung pa 'khyil ba dang // pheT sgra'i dbugs kyis khyad gyur pa// myos bcas dag pa'i gzugs kyis ni// sgyu 'phrul rgyu phreng gis brgyan pa// hUM spros rdo rje dra ba yis// nang gi rang gi sa bon gyi//
174b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer spros pas sa yi steng // ma lus sbyang ba byas pa yis// phung po'i sgrib pa kun rtog ni// log par shes 'dra rang nyid kyi// rnam par lhag mi blo yis blta// mig yor bdag nyid dga' ba yis// sgra tsam las ni nges
174b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'o// chos dbyings nang du chud de bzhin// dang por rlung sogs 'byung ba'i mthar// ri bong che stengs pad+ma las// yig gsum las mtha' 'khor lo gsum// bsdoms nas sgyu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur// ma rig sgo
174b4(rgyud 'grel): nga'i sbubs 'joms pa'i// che ma tshim 'jigs su rungs pa yi// sgra yis khams gsum 'khrug pa ni// zad byed 'gro drug 'jigs mdzad cing // mtshan mo 'jigs byed sgo de'i cha// g.yo nyis la g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhug/
174b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu dga' ba bzhi pa yi// zhal drug chu bo las rgyal ba// yan lag bcu gnyis mthar phyin 'chang // gzungs dang sa yi phyag gis mtshan// sbyin pa la sogs mthar phyin phyir// sku chen phyag rgya drug dang ldan// mi yi phreng
174b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang po dang // khams gsum tha dad med pa nyid// gnas ngan len sogs ma rungs dag/ bcom phyir sngags lpagaso na bza' bsnams// zhal spyad chos kyi phyag rgya ste// las kyi nang du bskul mdzad cing // dam tshig
175a1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig phag mo dang // 'khyud pas phyag rgya chen por ldan// ye shes chen po sdom mdzad pas// ral pa zla bas mtshan pa 'chang // la la nA sogs kyis brgyan pa// steng 'og 'jal ba'i spyan dang ldan// mthar
175a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom na mkha' lding dang ni// thod pa yis ni thod kyis mtshan// rgyu 'bras mnyam par sbyor bas na// dbus ma rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can// byang chub phyogs dang bdud rtsi'i khams// gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyod yul nyid//
175a3(rgyud 'grel): myangon shes go cha dam pa yi// snying sogs yan lag rnam drug mtshan// rtse gsum gri gug dgA sta sogs// thod pa kha TI zhags pa dapha// tshongs mgo rdor dri laM glang po yi// pags bsnams na mkha' dang 'dra ni//
175a4(rgyud 'grel): tshim dang chad dang 'jigs pa dang // sang dang ye shes bzhi 'dzin phyir// bdud bzhi po ni dkug pa yi// dag pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan// rnam pa kun tu rgya che ba// spro dang bsdu bar mdzad pa'o// zhi gnas rnam par
175a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs med bdag/ dag pa'i blo ni gcig par 'grub// phung po la sogs byin brlabs pa// sems rgyud dgod pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas// rnam rtogs gzugs brnyan yin pa'i phyir// bya min rnal 'byor mthar son
175a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// mgo sogs gnas rnams dgod bya zhing // go cha chen po dang ldan pas// ye shes phyag rgya rab tu bstan// ye shes sku lus spyi tshugs su// mkha' las rab tu 'bab 'gyur ba// zhu
175b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes bdud rtsir ro// he ru ka yi rnam pa ni// 'bab pa gang yin rgyu mi 'gyur// bcas pa'i khams gsum 'di khyab pa// shin tu bsil ba gleng gi sgo// dza lan d+ha ra gnas gzhug bya// gnas su rgyu ba'i sbyor bas ni// bim
175b2(rgyud 'grel): dang longs spyod dbang byas pa'i// rim gyi zla ba mthar rgyus shing // rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i lus// nges rgyas g.yo ba med pa dang // gnyis med gnyis su med pa dang // lhan cig skyes dga' dam pa'i dngos// dngos dang /
175b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos med spyod dang bral// sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang // bde chen 'khor lo rnam par brgyan// a haM ka ras bskyed pa yi// ye shes srad bus rab bslus shing // sprul pa'i lus las yang dag 'byung // dag pa'i
175b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i go la ltar dri med cing // sngags phreng ba rjid med skad cig dang // ldan pa'i sbyor ba bzlas brjod bya// rje srid 'bar bar 'gyur ba na// skad cig 'jig rten gsum sreg byed// mi shigs yi ge'i sgo nas ni//
175b5(rgyud 'grel): bsil byed zhu ba g.yos 'gyur ba// lan stong bdud rtsi'i rgyun sum cu// rtsa gnyis yan lag spros pa che// ma yi mtha' ma'i mthar thug bzhi// gang ba rgyun chen 'gyur ba med// 'khor lo'i mthar thug g.yo zhing 'ba'//
175b6(rgyud 'grel): bde chen na mkha' khyab par byed// skra grol mthon por ra ba 'dug cing // gcer bur gnas pa'i sgrub pa mchog/ lus ni lho ru mngon phyogs te// yi ge phaT sgrogs rkang pa ni// mnan cing gyen du blta ba nas// nam phyed
176a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma btang bar bya// sum cu rtsa drug rnam rig can// ting 'dzin stobs kyis dag pa'i phyir// skad cig ma yis rnal 'byor ba dag/ gnyis po thams cad rnam par spangs// cho ga'i rnam pa 'di
176a2(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ myur du dngos grub 'thob byed cing // rdo rje byang chub myur 'ong byas// kun mkhyem ye shes snying po drang khams blo chen 'jam dpal dang 'dra mkhas pa rnams// mi shes rtsa ba las byung rmongs pa mi mthun byas pa gang
176a3(rgyud 'grel): yin de bzod mdzod// rdo rje mkha' rgyu 'byung ba ma lus 'bar ma dzad cing // pad mchog rgyas dang rtogs pa'i me tog rgyas mdzad pa// nyi ma lta bur gzi brjid dang ldan bram ze mchog/ dpel ldan bla ma shar ba'i dom tshig drin
176a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsdebs// 'di las bdag gis dge ba ni// dri med bsags sgrubs ster byed pa// thob des 'gro ba ma lus 'di// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mthar 'gro ba shog/ de kho na'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon
176a5(rgyud 'grel): dadu byed go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // kha'i tshe'i mkhan po bi na ya ka dang // lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
176a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan rje btsun dpal he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni// yang dag po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can no// yang dag pa ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/
176b1(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos la sogs dang mthun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro// sems so sor rig pa la sogs pa zla ba dang // rdo rje'i rnam pa dang / rigs lnga dang // phung po gcig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir/ de nyid ni mos
176b2(rgyud 'grel): pas spyod pa'i sa yin la// mos pa ni lhag par mos pas te/ khyad par can gyi lha'i rnam pa bsgom pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos ma lus pa ro gcig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi spyod pa ni// ma rig pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro// zhes
176b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don to// yang na dngos po so so'i rnam par dag pa gzhan dang gzhan yin te/ zhal bzhi ni dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin can te/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i dga' ba dang / stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par
176b4(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i sgo'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro// de la phyag bcu gnyis kyi dang po na Da ma ru nI// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam dag pa yin te/ 'di ltar rang gzhan dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
176b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa rtag tu chos kyi sgra nyan pa'i phyir ro// ser sna dang gzhan gyi bde ba 'phrog pa'i gnyen po yin no// de nyid ni sa rab tu dga' ba ste/ bdag dang gzhan dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po'i dga' ba de skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//
176b6(rgyud 'grel): dgra sta ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te/ 'di ltar srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba dang / bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig las 'das pa la sogs pa 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'dus byas gcod par byed pa'i
177a1(rgyud 'grel): byA // dza nyi nis dri ma med pa ste/ sdug thams cad las ldog par byed pa nying yin pa'i byur ro// glai gu nr-i bzung pa'i pha rol tu blun pa rnam par dag pa ste/ pha rol kun nas 'a khrugs pas mngon dang dadrug par
177a2(rgyud 'grel): phag du ma la sogs pas bsnun pas rnam par shes pa 'khrug cing mi bzod pa kun nas gcod par byeng ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de nyid ni sa 'od byed pa yin te/ mi 'khrugs pas sems la gnas shing // gnas pas mi shes pa rnam
177a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'jog la/ de med pas ye shes rnyog pa med pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to// rtse gsum pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te/ snyoms las dang le lo dang brtson 'grus med pa dang /
177a4(rgyud 'grel): spro ba med pas laM ma yin pa la rjes su spyod pa'i phyir ngan 'gro ngan song dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ming dang gzugs 'byung ba de'i gnyen po lus dang ngag dang yid mkhyen pa'i rtse gsum rnon po'i rang bzhin/ bde bar gshegs pa skul
177a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid can no// de nyi ngos 'od 'phro ba yin te/ 'ong ni 'od zer te/ ye shes rnam par 'phro ba'i blo'i/ khyad par shes rab kyi mthu gang gis bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ba zhes bya bar dgongs so// kha
177a6(rgyud 'grel): ga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ltar bsam gtan rtse gcig pas skye mched drug gi rnam par 'phrog yel ba spangs pas// phung po la sogs pa ma lus pa'i mgo bo nas brtsams te/ rkang pa
177b1(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug rnam par bcad na/ nang stong pa nyid du ro gcig cing dbyer med cing g.yo ba med pa nyid ni dung dang kun da dang / zla ba dang shel dag pa dang / 'dra ba yin te/ sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro// de nyid ni sa rab tu sbyang dka'
177b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yin te/ rab tu ste nges par mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdud kyi thub par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro// dril bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang ngag gi tha snyad la sogs
177b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnyen po yin te/ chos kyi gsungs rin po che'i sgra sman pa skye ba med pa'i sbyor bas/ 'gro ba yang dag par ston par byed pa'i phyir ro// de nyid ni sa mngon du gyur pa yin te/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra mngon du
177b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas brjod pa ni/ log pa med pa yin te/ chos nyid des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i don to// rdo rje ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te/ gang gis sbyin pa la sogs
177b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la nye bar spyod cing nan tan du byed pa de ni thabs yin te/ ser sna la sogs pa thabs ma yin pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// de'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni grangs ji lta ba bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga rang bzhin gcig
177b6(rgyud 'grel): zab pa dang / rgya che ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// de nyid ni sa ring du song ba yin te/ gang gi phyir 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po dbyer med pa'i lam gyi sgo nas shin tu bde ba la sogs pa myong ba/ las des sems can thad

178b6(rgyud 'grel): chags kyi rtsa ba can yin la/ 'dod chags ni dbang phyug chen po yin te/ 'das pa zhen pa'i 'dod pas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i nga rgyal can/ bdag 'ching bar byed pa de nyid 'khor ba yin no// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la sogs pas

179a2(rgyud 'grel): nges par ma bzung zhing 'bad rtsol med par g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis gan rgyal du mnan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to// dus mtshan ni 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi rang bzhin yin te/ phung po rnam par 'jig cing stong pa nyid do// 'das
179a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum na yod pa'i phyir dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi 'khor ba'i chos za bar byed pa'i bdag nyid can gcig tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can khong khro ba'i sems kyi rgyun thams cad

179a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rgya che ba'i ye shes thob par byung pa'i rgyu dang 'gal bar byed pa de'i nyon mongs pa'i pags pa bshus te/ phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gnyis gos bzhin du rgyal mtshan gyi bla brar phub pa dang 'dra bar kun nas bgegs med par
179b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang / srid pa dang zhi bas gnyis kyis gdung ba gnyis su med pa'i ro gcig pa chen po'i grib ma bsil ba dang 'dra bar tshim par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to// de dag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis pa yin te/ 'di ltar bdud
179b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i stobs dang ngar 'dzin pa bcom nas/ shin tu rmongs pa chen po la sogs pa'i gnyen po sgom pa'i stobs rtogs pa las skyes pa phyag rgya chen po'i 'dus te reg pa'i kun tu bzang po ro gcig pa dang mtha' gnyis ka ma lus pa'i
179b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa'i g.yo ba med pa/ gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i don to// stag gi pags pa ni zhi khro ba yin te/ yu' drug la dgod pa dang / 'dod pa la chag pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems cher 'khrugs pa las
179b4(rgyud 'grel): khro ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de nyid ni shin tu khro ba nyid kyi phyir dang / sna tshogs pa la mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir// stag ni sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa yin no// de las bshus nas mnangs pa ni tshangs par spyod pa la rjes su spyod pa'i/
179b5(rgyud 'grel): dang tshu lo can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// dbang po'i 'dud pa'i kun nas dregris pa zhi bas khro ba med pa'i skad cig ma'i bdag nyid tsa ni no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go// de nyid ni rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'dra bar dbyer
179b6(rgyud 'grel): med cing mi 'khrugs pa dbang po'i sgo nas bde ba chen po yid la byed pa'i las la mkhas pa/ las ma yin pa'i gnyen po ye shes kyi spyod pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i don to// chags pa ni mi mgo'i phreng ba yin te/ 'di ltar 'gro

180a5(rgyud 'grel): rol te ngogs/ phyag rgya chen po dang phyin cing thob pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de'i rang bzhin ni mi mgo'i phreng ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to// de kho na nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ni ral pa dang cod pan yin te/

180b1(rgyud 'grel): tshang sor lnga pas spras pa dang / g.yon gyi char ye shes 'od gsal ba zla bas mtshan pa/ khams gsum pa ro gcig pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i dbang phyug dang mtshungs par chags pa'i 'khor los rgyas btab ces bya ba'i don to// dgra'i
