361b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dkar min shin tu zhi// g.yon pa dmar zhing 'jigs par byed // rgyab zhal gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje kha T+wAM bsnams pa dang // de bzhin thor pa dril bu bsnams// thod pa la zhugs gar dang ldan//
362a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gnyis dga' ba'i snyoms zhugs shIng // rgyal ba'i 'od zer kun du 'khrug/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyu yi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// shes rab gnas kyi mthar thug par
362a2(rgyud 'grel): smon lam rnam par sbyong byed cing // sems can don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad // rtag tu 'dod pas myos pa yis// lha yi bu 'di rnams dang ni// gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir//
362a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad// bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir// rtog pa rgyas por sbyin par dang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ rtog pa thams cad la sogs bshad// 'das pa'i dus ni ston
362a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba// rtog pa lnga sogs bde ba che// der ni rdo rje sems chen gyis// lhag pa yi ni lha gci go bzhugs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// sems can+da kun don 'byung bya'i phyir// glu dang rol mo so/
362a5(rgyud 'grel): ga rA// srid pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur// sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir// dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa'i nga // de nas sems skye 'gyur ba yi// 'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spongs te// de 'dul bar ni
362a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen ni su// 'dod chags chen po ston par mdzad/ shes rab thibs kyi sbyor ba yis// chos kyi sku yi chos nyid do// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// shes rab dang kun tu 'khyud pa'i rnam par
362b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ri bo ri sul tshang tshing phug/ chu bo chen po'i 'gram rnams dang // gdong nus grub pa'i dur khrod du// dar ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya zhes bya ba la// bde ba chen po mi g.yo bas na ri bo'o// sems can dman
362b2(rgyud 'grel): bapar 'jug par dga' bas ni ri sul te/ phug dang ldan pas tshang tshing ngo // chu bo chen po'i 'gram rnams zhes bya ba ni de dang snyoms par 'jog pa shes rab kyi chu gnas pas na/ chu bo'i 'gram mo// gdod nas grub
362b3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni rtag tu grub ste/ 'char pa dang nub pa spangs shing na mkha' ltar yongs su grub pra rtag tu bong ba chen po'i tshul gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o// dur khrod ces bya ba ni sems can
362b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi rgyud mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnaso// lag gnyis kun tu 'khyud pa mi/ rdo rje lce gu rgyud bcingasde brjod// kha sbyor lu gu rgyud
362b5(rgyud 'grel): du bzhed// sla ri yang rnam par grol ba'i lam// 'bab pa'i tshogs kyi dga' ba'o// rdo rje pad+ma dbye ba dang // sgro chun sbrang rtsi byed par bshad // bskor ba gang phyir bskyod po dang // mi 'khrul rdo rjes dkrug par
362b6(rgyud 'grel): bye der ni gsal shing zhes byar brjod// rdo rje thams cad mid par bya// rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs// de yi chags pa lcags kyu ste// lcags kyu'i sbyor ba cho gos dgug/ rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su// pad+ma'i
363a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzod du gzhug par bya/ dbang bskur bya yi cho ga yis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhu// gsang ba'i yig gsum sngags kyi mchog/ sna tshogs yi ge yang dag spro// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
363a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing gdon pa'o// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing // nam mkha' lci bur bdag med po// dag pa nyid du de nas son// de nas sem
363a3(rgyud 'grel): can sangs rgyas kyi// bla med don ni nus med pa'i// stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas// 'gro kun stong pas bcom nas ni// thams cad dmyal bar lhung mthong ste// slar yang bdag dang gzhan don la// mos pas gus pa nyid
363a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur// de nas 'jig rten khams kun na// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te// bdag la myur du bskul bar mdzod// oM ma hA suM kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ha s+t+waM/ 'dis ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang // dag pa'i
363a5(rgyud 'grel): bang ba kun ster ba// 'dod pa'i don ni kun sgrub byed cing ka/ 'gro kun bde ba bskyed par 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// khu ba'i gtso bo bskul ba'i// de nas mkha' dbyings dbus gyur par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
363a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// phyogs dang phyogs me tshems na mkha' la// dpag med rigs kyi yongs gang ba'o// mkha'i dbyings nyi ma de dbus su// rang gi sa bon mtshan ma ni// nyi ma stong pos lhag pa yi// 'od zer rnon po 'bar zhing
363b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug/ me stag 'phros pas bdud sde bsreg/ gong bur bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis// zhu ba las ni skur bzhengs pa// zhal bzhi pa dang phyag bzhi pa 'am// ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyis bar// gdan dang mdog dang phyag rgya
363b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom// phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga yis// sku gsum chos ni ston par mdzad// ting 'dzin yan lag shes par bya// bsgrub bya bsgrub thabs rigs pas so// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs
363b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin bskyed pa'o// nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs pa// nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor 'phrog cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba tshwa/ 6 ku hU~M9
363b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang
363b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rdo rje can gyi yon tan no// oM suM b+hA ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-Ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa yA gr-ih+NA ya hU~M hUM phaT/ oM A na ya he b+ha gi bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ zhal ba ni byin gyis
363b6(rgyud 'grel): rlob par byed pa'i sngags gsungs te/ lugs las bzlog par bya'o// oM d+harma d+hi tu swa b+hA ba atI ma kaM haM/ bcom ldan 'i ngas kyi zho la dang mdog/ phyag dang bzhugs tshul de bzhin to// sku mdog sngon po tshar grags/
364a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me 'od 'dra// 'bar ba'i sku lus sgyu che ba// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad// lhag ger bzhad chen tshems kyi 'od// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi ni// 'khor
364a2(rgyud 'grel): bla re dbus gnas shing // 'od ldan phyug ni bzhi pa ni dang // thong ka sgyu ma chen mos mdzes// g.yon pa pad+ma rA grwa mtshungs// shin tu khros pas 'jig su rung // sol ba'i phung po 'bar 'dra zhing // dza ba'i ku su mA dang mtshungs
364a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa shel dang mtshungs pa ste// gangs dang kun da zla ba 'dra// rgyab ni gser bsregs lta bur 'bar// nyi ma 'char ka lta bur mdzes// rtsa zhal sngon po chen po ste// spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes par byas// yi dgas chen
364a4(rgyud 'grel): po mnan nas su// nyi ma le bzhugs gar dang bcas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ de bzhin gzhan na mda' dang gzhu// tshe ga'i bya ba de nyid kyis// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// shar ni dkar zhing 'od sngo ste// g.yon na kha T+wAM dril
364a5(rgyud 'grel): bu dang // gzhan na rdo rje thob pa'o// byang phyogs marka ta ser skya'i mdog/ g.yon na kha T+wAM zhags pa dang // g.yas na rnge chung thod pa rnams// nub phyogs dmar zhing ser skya'i 'od// gzhu dang mnga' yi mdog dang ni// sna tshogs pad+ma
364a6(rgyud 'grel): thod pa dag/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag tu dgong // lho ni dkar zhing ser ba'i 'od// g.yon na mdung dang rin chen te// g.yas na ba ngan thed po bsnams// glang chen tsa sbyang mi dang ni// glang gi thod pa cho ga bzhin// dang po lhung
364b1(rgyud 'grel): byed ma yin te/ gnyis pa gsod byed ma yin la/ gsum pa 'gugs pa zhes bya ste// bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug ma// rig pa de dag gyen skra 'bar// rgyan rnams thams cad rnam par klubs// gar dang ldan pas yang dag
364b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// phyogs mtshams dgo ni bzhi po ru// thod pa rnam pa bzhi po dgod// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi rnam brgyan pa// spyi gtsug gsal bar yang dag ldan// bde bar chen po rin chen che// 'byung ba bzhi yi
364b3(rgyud 'grel): tshetshogs dang ljon// skye dang gnas dang 'gag pa rnams// rtag tu lha mo bzhi yi dngos// oM ha ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste snying gar ro// na ma hi nI rnam par snang mdzad de mgo bor ro// swA hA tu ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ste spyi gtsug
364b4(rgyud 'grel): tu'o// bau ShaT he ru ka s+t+waM phrag pa gnyis la'o// hUM hUM ho ni rdo rje nyi ma ste/ mig gnyis su'o// phaT haM dza mgrin ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la thugs rdo rje
364b5(rgyud 'grel): hUMhUM gis bskyed par bya'o// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT kyi sa ni mgrin par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i gsung rdo rje'o// oM badz+ra hwe he ru ru kr-i huM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM pa raM swA hA// zhes bya bas ni dpral ba'i dkyil
364b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas po'i sku rdo rje'o// de dag ni rdo rje sems dpe'i go che dang / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o// lte bar ni aM baM sti rdo rje phe ga mo'o// snying gar haM yau saM gshin rje ma'o// kha ra ni hI ma sta
365a1(rgyud 'grel): rmongs byed ma'o// mgo der ni hreM hAM ste kun du skyong byed ma'o// s+thi gtsug tu nI hUM hUM kun tu skrag byed ma'o// yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon char ni phaT phaT te gtum pa myo// sau sarba bud+d+haH
365a2(rgyud 'grel): ki nI yA badz+ra waN+Da nI ya hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA zhes bya baMs ni lte bar thugs rdo rje lto bu'o// oM badz+ra bo ro tsi nI yo hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA zhes bya bas ni snying gar sku'i rdo rje lta bu'o// oM bau ri hUM hUM phaT TuM sa~M
365a3(rgyud 'grel): byA ba ni khaR+Sha te gsuMng rdo rje lta bya'o// de ltar gang zhig kun bstan pa// sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lus las byung // shes rab zla ba'i stanau la gnas// sna tshogs me ngag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems
365a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' de bzhin gshegs// decom ldan rdo rtswa can gyis gsungs// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi lus te// nye bar sgrub pa'i sgrub thibs so// ye shes dam tshig las byung ba// de ni rdo rje nan du
365a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod ces bya ba la ye shes sems dpa'o// dam tshig nI rdo rje sems dpa'o// de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te/ rang gi sa bon mtshan ma las// snying gar ye shes sems dpa' dgod// de yi
365a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis drongs nas ni// ye shes 'khor le rab mchod ba// rdo rje bsrung ba'i go cha ni// mnyam par gzhag pas thams cad bya// de 'og dngos po thams cad kyis// bdag gi lus la gzhug
365b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje sems rab can gyis gsungs// ye shes sems dpa' gzhag pa'o// dbang bskur go 'phang bsgoms nas ni/ de 'og mchod pa brtag par
365b2(rgyud 'grel): rig pa pos// mdun du rgyal ba bkug nas ni// mchod pa kun gyis mchong nas nI// dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab// gsang gsum gnas las byung ba l-I// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma kun dang // sangs rgyas 'jig
365b3(rgyud 'grel): rten mgon po yis// brtse bas bdag la dbang bskur gsol// des ni sangs rgyas ho ru ka'i// tshul nga na mkhar bzhugs nas ni// bdang rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi// bum pa kha dog ltar ldan pa'i//
365b4(rgyud 'grel): kun nas dbang ni bskur bar mdzad// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// gasbyong gsum gnas les byung ba yi// khyams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// rin chen dbang bskur chen po sbyin// rgyal
365b5(rgyud 'grel): sa dbang ni bskur nas su// spyan mA la sogs klu len cing // mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs k+Sheswa kyang kA/ mchod pa kun g+his rab mchod bong // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje
365b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsungs// dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa'o// mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar bya// de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te// bu mo yi ni sna rtse ru// a zhes pa pa dgod par bya// rang gi rdo rje'i bu gar ni// baM zhes bya
366a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag sbyar// gang yang gzhan dag 'chad pa ni// byA zhes bya ba pad+ma la// byA ni rdo rje'i rtse mor ro// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// shes rab dang
366a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi bdag nyid dga' ba ste sbyor ba dang po zhes bya ba'i tInge 'dzin to// mchog tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje pad+ma phye nas su// lam gyi tshogs kyi rgyan nas ni// slar yang spro zhing btang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma
366a3(rgyud 'grel): yi 'khor lo kum/ pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar// oM byA d+hU tI'i gnas de bzhin// smin+d+ra mya'i bar du bzhag par bya// dbyings yig dang po yang ngag ldan// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar// de nas 'bar 'phreng rgyo mchod/
366a4(rgyud 'grel): ni// kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo bsam// 'gal me 'khor lo la gnas pa// mkha'agro'i tshogs ni de bzhin 'khor// yid shugs chen pos gsal ba'i mngangs// glog lta bur ni gsal ba'i 'od// lha yi rnal 'byor
366a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul grIs mi// sa rnams kun tu spro bar bya// de 'di dbye bas phyi nas su// rtsa rnams thams cad lam du sbyar// sngags pas ring dgar dpe byas te// phrin ci log tu nges par sbyar// char gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'o// /
366a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi mchog tu rnam par ba sgom// sbyor ba yi ni don rnams la// dga' tshan rnyed dka' 'di yis bsgrub// ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas// yul dang yul du ma ngon par skye// mkha 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag
366b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung rang sa la rnam par+ya rAl// mgo bo pul+lI ra yin te// so dang sen mo rab tu 'bab// rab gtum mo dung thod dum gyis// shar gyi rtsibs su yang ngag bzhugs// spyi gtsug dz+nyA lan+d+ha ra ste// sku dang s+phu naM rab tu 'bab// gtum
366b2(rgyud 'grel): mig keng rus chen po yis// lus ngan phyogasu yang dag bzhugs// o D+ya naM zhes bya'i gnas tshun po// rna ba g.yas pa'i bla dgas te// nub tu pagasu paM dri ma los// 'od ldan keng rus tshul gyis bzhugs// an+ma dang
366b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyub kyis phyogs// sha tshan dag ni 'bab pa las// mche ba gtsigs dang sna tshan ma// lho yi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// de dag ni gnas so// gau drA ba ri rna g.yon te// rtag tu rgyus pa 'bab pa las// dpa' bo'i
366b4(rgyud 'grel): b+ho mr-i lha yi dag/ dbang ldan mtshams su bzhugs par bsam// sbyin dbus rA mi shU ri ste// rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa las// mi thung mgon po 'od dpag med// rlung gi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur// mig gnyis
366b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mol-I mkhar yin te// rtag tu mchin pa las// lAng+ka'i dbang mo rdo rje 'od// bdun bral mtshams su bzhugs par gyur// mA la bai ni dpung g.yas te// rtag tu snying 'phrul 'bab pa las// ljon grib ma ni rdo rje sku//
366b6(rgyud 'grel): byin za'i mtshams su bzhugs par gyur// de dag ni nye ba'i gnas so// yul de kun na gnas pa rnams// thugs kyi 'khor lor yang dag bzhugs// mkha' la spyod pa zhes bya ste// snyoms par zhugs pas yang dag
367a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// mchan khung kA ma ru pa ste// rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa las// sa bsrungs ma dang myu gu tsAna?// shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bzhugs// o tre nu ma gnyis yin te// mkhris pa'i khams ni
367a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa las// rdo rje ral can 'jigs byed ma// lus ngan phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur// zhing // lte bar tre shaM ku ni te// rtag tu glo ba 'bab pa las// rlung shugs dpa' bo chen po ni// nub kyi 'dab mar brten ta
367a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhags// ko sa la ni sna rtsa ste// sgra ma'i phreng ba 'bab pa las// chang 'thung rdo rje hUM mdzad du// lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur// nye ba'i zhing ngo // kha ni kaM ling ga yin te// gnye ma'i khams ni rab tu 'bab// sto
367a4(rgyud 'grel): bsangs lha mo shin tu bzang / yi dgas phyogasu bzhugs par gyur// mgron po lam pU kaM yAn te// bong bu'i lha ni 'bab pa las// shin tu bzad mo rdo rje bzang // rlung gi mtshams su bzhugs par gyur// rol sA'o//
367a5(rgyud 'grel): snying ga kany+tsi yul yin te// rtag tu chu so 'bab pa las// rta rna ma dang 'jigs byed de// srin po'i mtshamasu bzhugs par gyur/ kha ba can ni chu so ste// 'tshogs mA'i srungs ni 'bab pa las// byA gdong ma dang mig
367a6(rgyud 'grel): mi bzang // me'i mtsham su bzhugs par gyur// nye ba'i rel sa'o// yul de kun na gang na gnas pa// gsung gi 'khor lo'i yang dag gnas// sa la rgyu ba zhes pa ste// snyoms par zhugs paso yang ngag gnas//
367b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan+da ni yi dgas khyA gnas twe/ pad kan khams ni rtag tu 'bab// 'khor long shugs ma stobs po che// su yi 'jo jog kyis padrug pa napa lam m+b+ha li khyim yi te/ nag gag rta dag 'i chen rdo lus da du/ 'du no// so rba ni 'dra gnyis te// khrag gi ladz+ra ni 'bab pa gzigs
367b2(rgyud 'grel): tenA gyi phyog su du 'gyur khyin pa nyis ni gser gling tswa/ ga tu rdus ni pa p+la/ ga Sh+ra yo go can ni ba'i ste/ la phyog su u bcug 'i du chen Na ma lan kr-i t+ye te/ chu nis tu ma pa la// shin tu dpa' mo he ru ka rA// yi dgas mtshams su bzhugs par gyur ka/ sin d+hu rkang pa'i bo la yin te/
367b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu mchi ma 'bab pa las// stobs chen pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ rlung gi mtshams su dgod par bya// dur khrod do// mya ngan yul ni mthe bo ste/ lub pa dag ni 'beb pa las// 'khor lo sgyur ma rnam snang mdzad//
367b4(rgyud 'grel): bden bral mtshams su dgod par bya'o// ku lu d+h+r-i ni pus mo ste// rtag hU~M s+thA chu 'bab pa las// brtson chen rdo rje sems dpa' ni// me yi mtsham su dpyod bar bya// nye ba'i dur khrod do// yul ni de dag thams cad
367b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid// sku'i 'khor lor yang dag gonas// sa 'og glenas bA zhes bya ste// snyoms par zhugs pas rab tu bzhugs// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pad+mo na// phro nya rnams ni yang dag gnas// khA gdong ma ni sha
367b6(rgyud 'grel): sgor te// byang sgor 'ug pa'i gdong pa can// nur sgor khyi yi gdong pa tsan// phag gi gdong can lho sgor dgod// dbang ldan gshin rje brtan ma ste/ gshin rje pho nya mi mtsham su// bden bral bshin rje mche bcan
368a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje 'joms ma rlung mtshams dgod// ma ning yi ge bzhi las ni// sgro bzhi rnams ste bsgom par bya// sha Sha sa ha las byung gA/ dbang ldan la sogs yang dag gnas// re la bcibs shing ma
368a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'bar// nyi ma la bzhugs gar dang bcas// spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa ste// phyag na khaM dz+nyA thod pa gri// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par grubs// 'od zer sna tshigs rnam par 'phro// gany+dzar rim pa ldan la sogs
368a3(rgyud 'grel): zur mig blta zhing rnam par g.yo// khA gdong la sogs gcer bu ste// mgul ngo spyi gtsug dpung rgyan dang // na che tshangs pa'i skud par bcas// mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul par brgyan// rkang gnyis khrol khrol sgre dang bcas//
368a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis ldan par// dpa' bo rdo rje dril bsnams te// phyag ni gnyis kun 'khyud pa yin/ he ru ka ni sku las byung // mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// sgyu 'phrul chen
368a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i sku las byung // dam tshig ye shes las byung ba'i// de nas rdo rje can du brjed// dbang bskur go 'phang bsgoms nas ni// de nas mchod pa yang dag brtsam// de dag thams cad ston bzhin bya// da ni byang chub kyi phyogs
368a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i sbyor bas rnam par bzhag par bya ste/ ltung byed me ni lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// gsod ma ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// 'gugs byed ma ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o//
368b1(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi dbang phyug ma ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'o// rab tu gtu mo ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// gtum mig ma ni brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// 'od ldan ma ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
368b2(rgyud 'grel): rkad+hA pa'o// sna tshun+ma ma ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dpa' bo'i blo ma nau dang bu'i dbang po'o// mi thung ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// lAng+ka'i dbang phyug ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// ljon grib ma ni ti
368b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// sa srungs mo ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o// 'jigs byed ma ni dang pa'i stob so// rlung shugs ma n+ti brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi stob po// chang 'thung ma ni dran pa'i stobas+ho// s+t+wa~M bsangs lha
368b4(rgyud 'grel): me ni ting 'dzin gyi stobaso// shin tu bzang mo ni shes rab kyi stobaso// rta rna mo ni ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lago/ bya gdong mr-i ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lago/ 'khor lo shugs ma
368b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan la go// dum skyes ma ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chubo kyi yan lag go// gling sna ma ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yong dge byang chub kyi yan lago/ 'khor lo'i go/
368b6(rgyud 'grel): cha ma ni dran pa yang dog byang chub kyi yan la go// shin tu dpa' mo ni btong snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan la go// stobs tshan ma ni yang dag pa'i lta bo'o// 'khor lo sgyur me ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o// brtson
369a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grus chen mo ni yang dag pa'i dgo// khru gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o// 'ug gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba'o// khyi gdong ma ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o// phag gdong ma ni yang
369a2(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa'i dran pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni yang dag pa'i tingange 'dzin to// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams bsrung ba ni gshin rje po nya
369a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o// sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// byang chub kyi
369a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ltos rnam par sbyar ba'o// snying ga'i dbus gyur pad+ma ni// 'dab ma brgyad dang go sar bcas// de yo dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa// mar me lta bu'i gzugs can+da taM// chu shing go ne me tog
369a5(rgyud 'grel): lholtar// rtag tu 'phyang zhing 'uge tu bAm+b+ha// de'i dbus bzugs dpa' bo ni/ yungs kar sbom po'i tshad tsam s+t+waM// hUM gis bon+da mi shigs bya// kha ba lta bu 'bab pa yin// ba san ta zhes bya ba yin// lus can rnams kyi
369a6(rgyud 'grel): snying dga' byed / rgor ma'i khar ni ma yi gzugs// phag mo'i til+la kar ni bzhed// las kyi rlung gis bskyod na su// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas ni 'bar/ ba san ta dang phrad pas mnye so// snyoms par 'jug pas yang
369b1(rgyud 'grel): ya dag bzhugs// 'do ni shrI he ru ka yi// ba san til+la ka ru bzhed/ gzugs sogs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ stong pa nyid du yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis// sgo gsum nas ni yang dag rgyu// 'gro ba
369b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni 'ong ba ru// de dag thams cad lus la gnas// lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni/ thung du zhes bya ni bya bar grags// snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge hUM// ring po che gnyis tshad du gnas// mgrin par gnas pa'i
369b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge oM// cha gsum pu lu ta zhes brjod// dpral bar gnas pa'i yi gau haM/ sgra dang thig la mi shigs pa// 'khor lo bzhi yi bye brag gis// sa sogs 'byung ba chen po yin// mtshams bzhi ru ni lhag par
369b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// pad+ma bzhi las yang dgu byung / dga' ba ba zhi yi tshul gyis ni// sbyor ba bzhi lngas mchog tu gnas/ mchog tu dga' bo'i gzugs kyi sku ni/ bya ba dang ni byed pa'i dngos/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin
369b5(rgyud 'grel): b+his/ 'dir ni dzaM ltar bde bar ro g+haM/ phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la// 'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa bzhi ni/ mar me lta bu'i gzugs can te// mtshams kyi tshe lo gnas nos su// rtswa ni gang dag rgyu ba dag/ bdud rtsi lnga
369b6(rgyud 'grel): nirgyu ba ste/ mtshang po'i gzugs kyis de la brtam// mchod pa bzhi zhes bya bar bshad// 'di ni lus can snying dbus ma/ rtsa brgyad du ni rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag yis// gzham yang nyi shu
370a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bzhir badz+rod// gnas sogs la brten nas su// gnas dang gnas su yang dag brten// mgo bo las ni yang dag byung // rtsa ni mgo las skyes zhes brjod// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa'i
370a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// de dbus sgyu 'phrul chen me'i gtso// rim pa 'dag ni 'di nyid kyis// blo dang ldan pas phyag rgya bya// khwa gdong la sogs sngon ji bzhin// ltung byed la sogs rnam par dag/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
370a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnams kyi maM tshon cha'o// a las skyes pa'i thod par ni// rdzas bcu drug ni bsam par bya// rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyis// spro ba dang nu 'bar bar bya/ dang po yi ge ldan pa ru// bsgoms na skad cig de la
370a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// yi ge go bzlogs sbyor ba yis// rgyad lo sngags ni bsgom par byA// i ni thams cadra 'byor byed de// de nyid gsum ni yang dag brjod// lha mo da ltar bsgoms pa yis// rdzas kyi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// sbyor
370a5(rgyud 'grel): pab 'dri yi dngos grub kyi// yid ches yang dag 'jug par 'gyur// thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing // rnal 'byor cen ni skad cig mthong // lha mchog las skyes bregs nus su// srungs rgyas kun gyi bu mu spyod
370a6(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i klung mnyam sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa// lag tu shing rtog bzhag pa bzhin// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// pang+gA'i klung mnyam zhing rnams ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi
370b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid rnams// sems kyi rol mo las byung bar// rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis mthong // 'di ni mchog tu gsang chen te// sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// bdud rtsi myang
370b2(rgyud 'grel): papa dkyil 'khor rgyal// mchog gi tingange 'dzin to// yi ge pho ny-i la sogs sdug/ sa// mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ sde chen+da brgyad kyis shin tu bskor// sngags
370b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad 'byung ba ste// gzhan yang ci yang rung ba ste// sgra lnga dag ni yang dag ldan// ya re la bas rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed// tshe rnams bzhi po dag
370b4(rgyud 'grel): klus ni// kun+da nas yongs su bskor ba ste// longs spyod 'khor lo zhes bya ba// ro rnams kyi ni rten rang bzhin// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo tsha// byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis// zla bu nyi mo zhes bya ba/ g.yon dang g.yas
370b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngos gnyis su// dpa' po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'gro dang 'ong ba byed pa'i rgyu// gnas gnyis la ni rtag brten na/ 'og dang steng du yang dge brtan// g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis// de bzhin dbyangs yig
370b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis ni// rtag tu steng du bltas par bri// ka sogs 'og tu bltas po ni// ngos gnyis ngag tu spel ba ste// dbus su de ni sbyar bar bya// de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/ rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin no// gnyis med ye
371a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rdo rje ste// mkha' 'gro sgra yi rang bzhin no// des 'byung sangs rgyas thams cad de gang du skye ba zhes byar grags// shin tu rnam dag ye shes tshe// lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang // rdo rje
371a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' zhes bya ste// mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin// rang byung gi ni gzugs 'di nyid// sgo dang sdud par byed pa 'o// yi ge po nya la sogs bsngags// der ni cha dang bral ba gang // b+ha ga'i dbus su gzugs med
371a3(rgyud 'grel): pade ni rtag tu gnos pa yin// smin dbus thig le'i pad+ma ru// bcu drug skud pas bskor ba yin// shes rab thobs kyi mnyam sbyor gyis// kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni// thams
371a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs gang // 'di ni kun mkhyen zhes byi ste// kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o// pad+ma yi ni sna rtse ru// rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas par bsgom// yid kyis bzlas dang yang dag ldan// ngag dang yi ge rnam par spangs/
371a5(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas// brtan pa choso dbyings rong bzhin no// shin tu phra ba rdul dang bral// ye shes sku ste dri ma med// gsal ba mchog gi rang bzhin te// mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig yul// phan tshun
371a6(rgyud 'grel): mdud pa'i gsang sngags ni// yul nyid kyis ni dbye bar bya// sa bon phreng ba de nas bsgom// hUM gi skud pas bcings pa ste// bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur na ni// gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o// sngags dang thig le 'di dag
371b1(rgyud 'grel): ni// kun rdzob byang chub sems bsgom par// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// 'di ye shes rab lhan skyes te// de yi gzugs gyur pas gnas// las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su// lte bya'i dkyil 'khor da/
371b2(rgyud 'grel): nas 'bar// skyo ma chen mo zhes byar bshad// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// prA NAM brgyar gyur pa yi ra// skad cig glog gi 'od zer can// lha yi rnal 'byor lus su ni// lte ba'i sgo s+t+waM bu ga nas// phyogs
371b3(rgyud 'grel): rnanarnams kun+da tA spros nas ni/ lU dong lha min kun bsregs te/ snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// bsre ga ste longs spyod 'khor lor seng // sa bug g.yas nas byung nus ni// slar yang zhugs te smin mtshams kyi/
371b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas ni// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad k+Shi// sna sgo g.yon du zhugs nas ni// spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs nas suM// sngon gyi lam nas
371b5(rgyud 'grel): sguslar b+had+d+hi ste// slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni zhugs// bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba yi// dkyil 'khor du ni stong gyur na// sngo na bzhin du ni gnas par gyur// dga' ba skad cig bya
371b6(rgyud 'grel): brag gis// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i gyang na no// oM na mo b+ha ga wa ta bI re shA ya/ ma hA kalpA g+ni san+ni b+hU
372a1(rgyud 'grel): ya dza Ta ma ku Tot+ka TA ya/ daMSh+NA ka rA lo pra b+hI Sho Na mu khA ya/ sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su DA ya/ pa ra shu pra sho d+yA tA shU lA khA T+wAM gA d+ha ri Ni/ byAg+ha dzi nAM ba ra d+ha DA ya ma hA d+hum+man+na ka ra wa pu ShA ya/ hUM hUM phaT/
372a2(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ k+Sh+ya k+Sh+mAM phaT phaT/ ka ra kA ra/ d+hen+ta ban+d+ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ hiM he/ haM haM/ da ha da ha/ ku ru ku ru/ tA se ye tA sa ya/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ hUM d+h+r-i/ ki li ki lI/ ba sa ru d+hi rIn+na mA lA ba laM bi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-it+taM/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ d+hi d+ha A
372a3(rgyud 'grel): kan+d+ha/ AM kan+thi/ tsa li ts+tshi li/ saM liM si l-i/ sA pai ta pAt+tA la ga ta b+hu dzA ga sarbaHtam+b+ha ya hI hau/ pheM pheM/ d+hi li d+hi le/ sngags kyi tshig nAM kun la yang // oM ni thams cang gsal byed// hUM hU~M phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rab gtum
372a4(rgyud 'grel): l-i sogs mkha' gro ma// rang ming brjod bya'i sngags la ni/ dang b+hor oM dang s+thir bya ste/ d+hU hUM phaT ni mtha' ru gnas// oM shrI badz+re hUM he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA k+ki nI dzA sa ba ro s+yah+na/ ba'o// oM hrIHhaM haM dz+dza hUM phug nyi
372a5(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+hA hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-Ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa yo gr-ih+NA pa yA huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha gage bAn+da bid+yA rA dzi huM hUM pheMT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM s+yarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI yaM badz+ra
372a6(rgyud 'grel): baR+Sha nI ye huM huM phaT phaT swA hI// snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nA ye huM hUM phaT phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM bI raM hUM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// rje btsun ma'i sngags kyi tshig go// oM ha/ na ma hi/ swA hA hu/ @
372b1(rgyud 'grel): slaH g+sa / d+ya kun pa' zla drug bajug/ a gtsu/ 6\u0f7f/ ts+tsha d+d+ha phA pA/ oM rtul sbyin par gyu/ ral 'byor sa dag g+hu / s+yA s+yA m+b+ha/ s+yA g+h+ra s+yA A d+har+m+ma rmA
372b2(rgyud 'grel): A a k+Sha khaM ka~M k+Sh+ma d+hA/ d+d+hany+tsa/ T+Tad+hA T+Tan+na NA/ tA dA d+hAn+da/ pA~M byA Sh+TA m+b+ha/ yA r+yA s+yai zhwa/ hU~M sa k+Sha dz+dza shUn+d+ha ye+e swAH/ ng+ya pa 'gros sa s+yA r+yAdrA ts+tsha kA sa so//
372b3(rgyud 'grel): ba~M tI b+han+na d+h+we AR+sha ba r+N+Na dzA tAhU~M oMk+ShA ma~M d+d+ha hU~M hU~M sa~Mdz+dzad+hatwAr+dz+dza hU~M ba~M swAswAhA d+hIb+h+ya hU~M d+hA rA kar+m+ma binA~M satwA sa
372b4(rgyud 'grel): hrIn s+t+waM b+h+ra na ma~M hAn+te/ badz+ra hrInA~M hU~M mam+b+ha sa kau nA~M kA m+bi shA rI khaM gi dad+he b+he t+ya~M ga pro tA sa na hA nA drA d+hAk+Sha k+sha na Sh+T+r-i nA d+hA n+ya d+ha na g+hu kyA Sha
372b5(rgyud 'grel): sahA ba na ta nA sA ya sa~M nam d+h+ye b+h+ya prA br-id+d+ha swA m+me d+hun bau rAm+b+ha ny+dza thAn+da tASh+T+r-I mA su~M b+h+ya san hA ts+tsha b+hUdz+nyA sarba pA pa~M satwA nA stan pa ts+tshits+tsha sa tshe dak+ko \u0f7fr+b+ba dAn+ti~M kA rA l-i rimad+h+ya sa d+h+ye shrI ha rA kA de ste a g+ni
372b6(rgyud 'grel): sa ha sraM shi ra sa ha sraM thA ha 'i shi zhes ha su~M ng+kA re hU~M hA he ha dz+dza hU~M kyai br-in+ti sho na sa swaswa ka Te t+ye thA ga ta ba re bI ri ti d+ha hUM phaT sa~M ha ru ga kho ga dze n+da ga tre+e le sh+ya u ngi ri sa mr-i dri mi kha lo gro sa gras
373a1(rgyud 'grel): A na nau dzA l-i ta te dza saM dzA la mu kha pr-i ga la lo tsa ni badz+ra A sa ne mi li mi li ti mi li tI mi li he ha hAM hUM kha d+hu d+hA/ du ru/ d+hu ru d+hu R+Ya/ mU ru mu ru/ a dwe te ma hA yo gi ni pa Thi ta sid+d+he/ dr-i d+ha dwe d+h+waM g+ha
373a2(rgyud 'grel): gra he he hA hA/ b+hI me ha sa ha sa b+hi re ha ha ho ho hUM hUM tAM lokya bi nA shA ni sa ha sa ko Ti ta thA ga ta pa rI bA re ti hUM hUM phaT siM ha ru paM khaHga~M dza rU paM gaiHtrai lo kye u da ra sa ma dra me kha l+yA gra sa gra sa hUM hUM phaT di rba
373a3(rgyud 'grel): shA.AyA hu hrI sh+ma d+ha D+Da la lo ts+tsha sam tshu rdzun T+Te NI shI ri phaT phaT hUM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ka ra ka ra~M/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha d+ha ban+d+ha d+ha/ tA swa yu tA s+yA ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+hA ya/ hU~M hU~M/ hAHhraHpheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha
373a4(rgyud 'grel): dAduhU/ pa tsA pA tsa/ b+hak+tA b+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rin+no mI lA ba laM bi ni gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sab+h+yAM pAM tA la gA ta b+huM dzaM pa sarbam+b+ha tAr+N+Na yaM teR+ShI ya/ A kar+d+hA AM D+hA/ hri hri/ d+h+r-i dz+nyo/ NAM k+ShI/ hA hAM/ hiM haM/ hUM hUM/ kri l-i ki li/ sA li si li
373a5(rgyud 'grel): le tsi laM/ d+hi li d+hi la/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ swA hA/ ai shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni rI sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo zhing da nga ni/ khyad par du ni khang stong dang / sems tsin snod dang thang dang ni// khyad par
373a6(rgyud 'grel): du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen mo// lha sbyin ma nyam du bsten pa dang // nag po gcig pa 'jigs byed dang // rga las 'odas dang l-ig 'dren rnams// rgan byang ma dang drag byed mo// 'jigs byed ma
373b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // rgyal dang rum par rgyal ma dang // m-i thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang myo nag chen mo// nag snyom mya dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag tu snang dang 'chang ba dang // 'phrog byed ma dang mar
373b2(rgyud 'grel): me ma/ 'jib byeng grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thong chen mo// tha~Mng phreng phrang can kha dz+nyA ma// sbrul chen ral gI dgra sta ma// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma// nga nyid
373b3(rgyud 'grel): chen mo mkha' 'gro me/ las kun rje su sgrub byed ma/ sgor bya'i dkyil 'khor chen rgyal chen mo/ rdo rje de bzhin dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen to// rdul meng rnal 'byor sbyin pa mAM// rdo rje dbang
373b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' 'di yis/ thams cad kun nas 'dor sbyin cig/ oM ka ka ka D+hAn ba ba ban+d+ha na kha kha khA da na sarba duSh+yaM ha na ha na g+hA ta A g+hA ta ya a mu kA s+yA kad+yaM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dzaHswA hA// bdud rtsi yis naM kha ba
373b5(rgyud 'grel): ste lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mA yaM sau ma/ las rnams thams cad 'gru par bsgomi// oM b+hik+Sha b+hAk+Sha sarba yo gI shwa re hU~M hUM d+hidzaHswA hA// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
373b6(rgyud 'grel): yi' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cod kyi gtor ma'i sngags so// / oM na me nI lAM bA ra d+ha rA ya badz+ra pa Ni ye mahA yak+Sha si nA pa tai ye/ a ne ka gaM gA nA ngi bA lu ko sa sam bar+N+Na ki Ti/
374a1(rgyud 'grel): sha ta sa ha sra pA r-i pr-i tAM ya/ bi kr-i taM dAMSh+Ta ka la rU pA ya ag+ni ra si na yA na yA dz+yA li ta bi lA sa swa ya b+hI ma nA drA ya ba su ki nA gu R+Sha dz+nyA bi b+hU Shi ta ka ra tsa ra tra ya kr-iSh+Na b+hu dza gA ya yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya
374a2(rgyud 'grel): dza la ta b+hu dza ma Ni mu ku TA ya pu ri ta Te pa bA da nA ya sau kru tsi traM b+h+r-i la tA ya/ da sha ni Shar+t+ta ro Sha NA ya kr-i tan+ta rU bA ya bi d+h+ya dza hA ya mai ho ra gai ba k+Sha twA ya ka ra s+pho Ta tAM saM na kaM rA ya su par+NaM kA na
374a3(rgyud 'grel): gA rA ya dza me kha l+yA yau dz+yA ka ra na da tI sa na ka rA ya/ a shI ti yau dza nu sAh+ma sra gAM b+hI ra sA ga ra dza mu ma na nga lAM la/ tsakrA t+ya kaM/ d+ha ba ha nA yA dzaSh+Ta ka r+ye l+yA ya ha sI tAMT+Ten+dza hA sa nA da nA ya/ ma hA saM k+Sho d+ha
374a4(rgyud 'grel): ku rA ya kA lA rU b+hA ya trai li kya b+hUr+thA NA kai ra NA yan+na gAts+tsha mr-i d+hu k+ShI lA yA I maM gaM gA ni bai le/ ka s+yA me th+yAt+te b+ha gr-i bta bi b+hU Shi hU~M/ man+tam+b+ha bA tAM yi Sh+ya maM/ b+h+yo br-i pAn+na gA d+hi pr-i ta yai e daM nI lAM ba re d+ha
374a5(rgyud 'grel): ts+tshi rAM/ badz+nyA pA Ni hr-i drA ya/ yaHsa mA tI krAm+b+ha thAM/ sU ku l+yaMdz+dza da nau b+hU bI Sh+yaM ti/ tad+ya thAM/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi drAts+tshaHbi bud+d+ha/ mah+ni ba lo ka pA li/ nAM dza ha ra dzA ha ra/ nA krI nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ sanaM nAM grA nAM/ ts+tshin+ta
374a6(rgyud 'grel): tsIn+da nA ga tre da yA naM/ b+hin+da b+hir+tha nA ga mar+m+ma Ni/ bi shIHn+tu nAM gau dz+r-i 'di yAM ni s+pho Tu ya nA ga na yaM na yI d+h+r-i naM nir+tha shi ts+yai du nA pa shai rI rA Ni/ tad+ya thA/ hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra d+hA yaM phaT/ nA tshin+da nA ya phaT/ nI la ba si nA
374b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tAM twA ya phaT kr-i tr-i ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha N+Da ya phaT/ kAsmaN+Dot+sA nga na ka rA ya phaT/ pre ta paM shwA tsa bi nA sha kA rA phaT/ yak+ShA bstA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/
374b2(rgyud 'grel): ha sA ha s+ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ye mA rA ya/ nA shaM ya nA sh+ya ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA shA ka rA ya phyaT/ swarbaM shaM t+yAM saM g+ha bi nAM sha kA rA ya phaT/ nI lAm ba ra d+ha ro badz+ra pa NI rA dzI pa yaM ti swAhA/ gnod sbyin dang
374b3(rgyud 'grel): ngadang srin po la sogs pus zin pa lu ni chu la bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyuraro// char bzlog pa ni thal po la bzlas nas sprin la bltas te gtor bar bya'o// chu li bzlas te gtor ni tshwar 'dab par
374b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// rims la ni skud pa sngon po la bzlas te lag pa la gdag so// zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su go ri tsa na la len stong mngon par bzlas te// dpral bar thig le byAs na mi snang bar 'gyur
374b5(rgyud 'grel): ro/ don la dmigs te gtsung me'i go gyon la nyen mtshan mtshan du kun tu bsregs te/ lan brgyad brgya bzlas na rmi lam du dge sdig thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// sa la lan bdun po zlas te/ chom pa
374b6(rgyud 'grel): la bltas nas pus nas chom po bas mi mthong zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro// me tog gam 'bras bu la lan bdun bzlas te gang la gtor ba de dbang du 'gyuraro// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs so// dpa'
375a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po lngas btus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub kyi sems kun du gzugs pa'i phyung ba ras byu ba/ slob dpon chad
375a2(rgyud 'grel): bo ka lA ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgyu gar gyi byAd+d+hi ti chen po kre ka ra dang / lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lnga bcas kyis basbyor cing nus te
375a3(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phang ba / bcom ldan rdo rje ma kha' 'gro'i rgyang la rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs shin tu legs par mkhyen/ ma dzes pa chen po tha ma
375a4(rgyud 'grel): mar pa lo tsas blo ldan bdag la gnang nas bdag gis bris//
376a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa bzhugs
376b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shre tsakra saM pa ra/ sa hA dza tAt+ta A lo ka/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang la brjen nas
376b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rig bde chen po// stong dang snying rje dbyer med mtshon pa'i gzhi// chos dang longs sprul bde ba chen po yi// rang bzhin rtsa yi 'khor lo'i mgon btude nas// 'khor lo bde mchog dpal rim lAs byung las// spyod
376b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang mgon po'i zhal sna las rnyed pa'i// rang rig bde chen ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs// dpying dang thig le bsgom pa'i man dag bshad// bsam gtan khang pa rnam g.yeng skye bo yi// 'du 'dzi deng bral rnam por
376b4(rgyud 'grel): dben pa'i sar// yongs su 'dzin pa ma lus rnams spangs te// mi g.yo rtse gcig ting 'dzin mchog bsgrub bya/ bde pa'i stan gnas rdo rje skyil dkrung dang // lag gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya can// lus
376b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrang nas ni mgrin pa dgug pa dang // mig gnyis sna yi rtse mor mnyam sbyar zhing // gang la rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan dang // mtshon dpe byed ma lus yongs rdzogs pa// rang snang shes rab phag mo dang
376b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i// gnyis med dang ba'i rang bzhin rang lha'i sku// sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang // bar ma'i srid dang chu zla lta bu yi// lus kyi dbus gnas sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang
377a1(rgyud 'grel): snyoms dang // sbyin sogs rIg m+b+ha bzhi yi bdag nyid dang // chos dang longs sprul bde ba che rang bzhin// e bi ma yU rtsa yi 'khor lo la// dbyangs dang gsal byed byang chub yi ger ldan// rdul dang snying
377a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs mun pa'i rang bzhin gyi// rtsa gsum gyis ni yang dag sbrel byas pa// yon tan skyor gyi rang bzhin rtsa gnyis la// brten nas steng dang 'og gi sgo gnyis nas// 'byung dang 'jog pa srog dang rtsol ba yi// gang du
377a3(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo rtse gcig gyur pa las// dang po mi dgas srid bzhin snang po dang // mtshan gnyis pa dang ngu ba'i rnam pa can// gsum pa srin bu me khyer dang 'dra zhing // bzhi pa sgron ma 'byer ba lta bu dang // mtshan ma lnga pa
377a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par ma brtags par// sprin med na mkha' lta bu 'byung 'gyur zhing // de tshe gang du ye shes me 'bar ba// gsang ba glog gi 'od dang mtshungs pa yi// steng du 'phro bas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs shing // bad cheni rang
377a5(rgyud 'grel): rig ye shes sbyor bar byed// gang la brten nas skyes pa'i ye shes dang // rang rig las gzhan brjod par mi nus shing // dngos dang dngos med rtag pa la sa grol pa// bde tshe ni de bzhin nyid la bdag phyug 'tshal//
377a6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig skyes pas thog med 'khor ba nas// bsags pa'i sgrib pa ma lus kun spong gi/ gnyis med bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ gnyug ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal// rtog pa gang gis
377b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa kun gcod cing // sna tshogs snang ba'i dngos kun der mtshon bya// bde chen rang rig ye shes gcig pu pa// gnyis med rtogs pa'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang la bstod dang gang
377b2(rgyud 'grel): gris bstod pa dang // ji ltar bstod cing phyag 'tshal dang bral ba// spros tshogs gu dgas pa'i mtha' las rab 'das pa'i// mnyam nyid de bzhin nyid la bdag phyog 'tshal// gang zhig goms pa mtha
377b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pas// kun tu rtog pa kun spong zhing // rnam par mi rtog ye shes mchog/ tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed// brtul zhugs spyod 'chang bla med pa// 'bar bya'i gtso bo'i bka' drin las// rtogs
377b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i don gang 'dir bsdus pas// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang thob shog/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i// de kho na nyid snang ba slob dpon chen po dpag mung rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhra
377b5(rgyud 'grel): papA dI paM kA rA Dak+ShI ta da A tsar+ya mar paM chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya kar skad du/ shI tsik+kha sam+bA ra tat+ta gar+b+ha saM gra hA/ byod skad du/ dpalnga 'khor lo sdom
377b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tsha lo// gdod nas dag cing gdeng nas grol// gdong nas zhi ba'i bdag nyid tsam/ dngos po kun gyi de bzhin nyid// gzung 'dzim
378a1(rgyud 'grel): bral la phyag 'tshalo// blta bAr dka' zhing rtogs par dka'// brjod 'das tshig gis mtshon min par// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes ni// gnyis med gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// gang
378a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig dri mas bsgribs pa'i sems// yul du snang ba'i rjes 'jug pa// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ste// chags sdang rnam rmongs las la ni// rnam g.yeng sdug bsngal dang bcas pa'i// 'khor ba mngon par
378a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa'o// gang gis bla ma'i drin thob nas// sems kyis de nyid rig pa gang // ri dbang rtse nas lgang ba ltar// grol ba'i thabs ni bla na med// gzhan du dka' thub mi bzad sogs// lus nyon mongs par byed
378a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// thar pa'i 'bras bu mi rnyed par// slar zhing rnam par 'khor bar 'gyur// gang gis sems kyi de nyid rAg/ de lus gzhan du grol ba'i thabs// bzlas dang bsam gtan la sogs pa// pha rol sgrol
378a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bu bzhin 'dor// de bas bzlas med bsam gtan dang // dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor pa med pa// rang rig ye shes gcig pu nyid// rnam thar bzhi yi rang bzhin dang /
378a6(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum mkhyen pa'i bdag nyid can// rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa yis// zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med sku// byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun// gcig pu'i
378b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams ni du ma'i gar// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnam pa'o// gang gis de yongs shes pa yis// rang bzhin de ni rtogs 'gyur na// gzhan du spros pa sna tshogs kyang // grol pa'i rgyu nyid kho na'o// de phyir rang rig
378b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa ya~M// thabs kyi spros pa sna tshogs pa// gaM gA rgya mtsho'i ro bzhin du// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin byed// de bas gang gis thabs rig pas// bsam gtan la ni mngon par gi zhol// gzings lo legs par
378b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba ltar// sems kyi de nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni phung po khams rnams dang // skye mched drug las rnam grol bA// sgyu ma'i gzugs la legs gnas pa'i// e baM rtsa yi 'khor lo la// bcu drug thog mar thig
378b4(rgyud 'grel): lolhor bcas// dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi drug pa dang ldan pa// zla phyed thig los rnam par mdzes// dbyings yige bcu gsum thig les brgyam/ ya tshogs brgyad pa'i mtha' gnas pa// gzhom med bde
378b5(rgyud 'grel): ba che rang bzhin// nI da thig le dang bcas pa'o// srog dang rtsol ba legs bsdams te// sprul par rlung lnga btsodris pa yis// du baM la sogs rtags mthong nas// ye shes maM ni rnam par 'bar// glog gi 'od dang
378b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa yi// gsal ba'i gzugs can gyen 'gro bas// steng nas byang chub sems blangs te// 'o ma'i rgyun gyis rnam par 'ab // lte bar gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug las// ye shes skyes gang rang bzhin
379a1(rgyud 'grel): de/ 'dod chags ma yin chags bral man// dbu mar yang na myi dmyigs byung // chags dang chags med 'dres gyur pa'o// lhun sgyus yang drug byang chub nyipa/ zla zla nyi ma'i dbas
379a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// na mkha' sems gcig gyur pa las// rlung rnams ma lus dir bcings te// yid ni ri dbang ltar gnas byed// nyin dang mtshan mo rnams spangs cing // 'gro dong 'dri ba las grol ba// dus
379a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum mnyam par sbyor bya'o// bsam gyis kyis me khyi bad+me ba ma// rlung bzhin gnyug mya lhan cig skyes// des po kon mr-i khri na// sems kyi de nyid mthong ba po// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dgu go//
379a4(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin bral mngon sta smra rgyus/ dmigs myed snying rje'i bdag nyid can// 'khor ba ji sr-id gnas kyi bar// 'gyur ba med pa'i da bos bzhugs// rin chen sems las gtsun gyur pa/ glu ra
379a5(rgyud 'grel): n+ti 'dus pa med// sems ky-i ng+ge ny-id rig pa lta// khyon nyid mye dran ng+yas par 'gyur// yul lhun mgon po spyong 'chang ba'i// deng+ge b+h+yAMs rtogs pa de nyid gang // gnadu lugs rgyu'i slong ba yis/
379a6(rgyud 'grel): 'is rloms sa su rkye sa /
379b1(rgyud 'grel): u tsar+ya mar ba chos kyi dbang phyug gisu bsgyur bya'o// rgyu gar skad du/ s+yA hudz+nyA dAt+t+wa A lo ka/ zod skang du/ wAn cig skyes pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba/ pal
379b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dbu' la phyag 'tsho'o// sku spyod mngon par 'byung brjod sogs// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa yi// zab mo'i de nyid gi sad ches pa// bla ma'i don gyis rtogs par bshad// brtapa dka' rtog ge'i
379b3(rgyud 'grel): yul min zhing // zab mo spros pazhi ga/ lkugs pa yi ni rmi lam dang // gnon nus myong ba'i bde ba lhur// tshig gis mtshon min rang rig pa// ser sna med sogs tshul ba ni yis// bla ma ny+dzu bar+ya bsten
379b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// drin thob shes rab ye shes kyi// skad cig gsum par gang skyes pa// don mtshungs mi tshon pas dper nyid de// khyim gnas bu ga'i namakha' dang // dmus long gleng chen yan lag ltar// don mthong
379b5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin 'bras zan gyis// sbags pa'i bu ram ro bzhin no// cha shos dang ni rdzogs pa dang // sgrib bcas sgrib pa dang bralo ba'i// dbye ba lus ni rnam rmongs pas// tshes ma thag dang gang ba yi// zla ba sprin gyi
379b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgribs pa dang // gsal ba'i bye brag ma shes so// de ltar na'ang der myong gi/ bla ma'i gsung gis legs mtshon to// rgyud du yang dag goms pa las// dang po'i chu la zla ba dang // mig dag pa la gzugs
380a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// gsal byar 'gyur gyi yid ches kyis// dngos po sna tshogs snang 'di rnams// sems las phyi rol 'gyur med kyang // rang rig bag chags dbang byas nas// yul dang dbang por snang
380a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems// dbang po'i lam na rjes 'gro bas// yul rnams la ni mngon zhugs te/ chags sogs nyon mongs rgyur gyur po// las kyi shing rta'i 'khor lo ltar// yun rings srid par yang dang yang // sdug bsngal dang bcas
380a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'khor// nang du yang dag 'jog pa yi// thabs kyis bye las rnam bzlog nas// rlung bral mar me lta bu yi// rnal 'byor rgyun tu goms byas nas// ma rnyog lteng ka'i chu bzhin du// rang gis de nyid gsal mthong 'gyur//
380a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma// gzugs bzang lang tsho phun tshogs pa/ khro med rjesu brtse ba dang // dang dang thos sogs yon tan tsan/ sgrub las gzhan du mi blta zhing // skal bzang byed pa 'ching ba yi// sbyor ba la ni
380a5(rgyud 'grel): rab goms nas// mi mo dngos grub sa gzhi yin// de dang lhan cig dben par gnas// stobs bzangs myos byed bcas bza' zhing // blta ba dang ni reg pa dang // 'khyud dang ma mchu'i ro myangs pas// rjesu chags par 'gyur ba
380a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mtshan ma'i dbye bas gsal rtogs bya// chags pa chen pos rab rgyas rtsa// 'tsher dang zlos po'i sbyor ba yis// mngon sum lce yi thur mas drangs// nor bu'i nang du legs chud pas// mun pa la ni mar me ltar//
380b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar nges kyis gzhan du mIm+ba/ de nyid du ni ye shes mchog/ sdom bya thun nam nyin gcig gam// zla phyed zla gcig khyud kor dang // bskul pa bskal pa stong dag tu// de goms pa las mi 'gyur ba'i// ye shes
380b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// der ni legs 'du'i dam tshig rdzas// rlung gi stobs kyi thob pa 'am// dman po'i sems kyis dor min pa// phyi rol nas ni lces blangs bya// bla ma'i drin thob dga' ba yis// sems kyis
380b3(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i de kho na// legs bkong gang 'dis 'gro ba rnams// gnyug ma'i lam gyis bgod grub shog/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i lhan cig skyes po'i nga kho na nyid snang ba/ slob dpon ku su lus pas mdzad pa rdzogaso//
380b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM ba ra tat+ta u pa de sha/ bod skud du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i de kho na nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa'i de nyid mtshon pa yi// e ba
380b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba las skyes pa// mkha' mnyam dri ma rnam spangs pa'i// dbyer med chos le phyag 'tshalo// rgyud rnams kun tu ches gsang bya/ bla ma rim brgyad la 'ongs nas// ji bzhin bdag gis ngas rtogs pa// de 'dir
380b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsal bar byas// 'khor lo sdom pa pad ma'i tshal// spyod 'o chang gsung gi nyi zer gyis// tsho bas legs thob snying po mchog/ 'gro rnams tshim par byed pa 'di'o// gang du bskal pa grangs med par//
381a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bad kyang 'dod don mi 'thob pa// de 'dir tshe 'di nyid sogs kyis// dngos grubA go 'phang bla myed 'gyur// lus gdungs sems myi g.yeng byed pa'i// dka' thub la sogs rnam spangs de/
381a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la nye bar brten pa yi// lam gyi bde ba'i 'bras du bsgrub// gang zhig bstan pas yul kun gyi// bde bas yongs su tshim byed cing // spyong dang grol ba'i 'bras ster ba// mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs ldan
381a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// 'jig rten rtog pas brtags pa yi// rigs kyi zhen pa kun spangs nas// dbyibs dang khaM dog lang tsho dang // na tshod la sogs rdzas mthun cing // dam tshige spyong pa sogs brtan pa'i// yon tan rnams
381a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rten gyur pa/ brten pas sgrung po dbang phyug gi/ dngos grub kun gyi gzhi byed po'o// legs brtags shin tu legs rtogs pa/ brten bya de las gzhan du ni// chags sogs 'jig rten dbang gyur pas// /
381a5(rgyud 'grel): brten nas sa spyod sdug bsngal 'gyur// chags can ye shes mngon 'dod pas// tshul 'di nyid kyis bgrong bya yos// de las gzhan pa'i lom gyis ni// nam yang grub la brten mi 'gyur// shin tu dben pa'i
381a6(rgyud 'grel): sar gnas te// 'jig rten g.yeng ba kun spangs pas// bde ba'i ye shes 'phel byed pa'i// rjes mthun longs spyod brtan pa dang // rigs dang yang dag sbyor ba'i sems// mi nyams bde ba'i rten gyur pa//
381b1(rgyud 'grel): de 'dir rang rang gi stobs kyis sam// de bzhin phyag rgya'i stobs kyis kyang // nor bu'i nad son dbyar med pas// bde mchog bla na mang goms bya// de goms pa yi sbyor ba yi// ras dkar la ni snum dang
381b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ zas la bcud kyis phug pa dang // chab ro ma lus ni chu nyid dang // chu rnams las kyang rgya mtsho dong // chu rlabs las ni chu bzhin 'gyur// gang zhig mchog tu goms pa'i mthus// sna tshogs snang ba nge
381b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te// ji ltar bu ram las byas gzugs// sna tshogs mdor ba'i ro bzhin no// gang 'dir thun nu ma nyin gcig gam// zla phyed zla gcig khyung gor du// goms pas bskal mang b+he stong du// mi 'gyur bya
381b4(rgyud 'grel): yaM ye shes thob// 'khor lo sdom dpal gzung lcags las/ bla ma'i drin gyis legs thob pa// de 'dir bdag gis gsal byas pas// dge nges 'gro kun bla med sh+log/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i de kho
381b5(rgyud 'grel): na nyid kyi man ngag ku su lu pas mdzad pa rdzogasaso// / kha che'i mkhas pa b+ha dra bo d+hi dang lo tsa ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi bsgyur ba'o//
381b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsikr-i saM ba ra a dwe te d+h+ye no pa daM sha yo ga tsaN+Da li/ bod skad du// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gnyisu med pa'i bsam gtan gyi man ngag rnal 'byor gyi gtumo// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa
382a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshalo// gang la dmigs pas srid par 'ching pa yi// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog kun spyod cing // rnam par mi rtog ye shes mchog 'char ba'i// gnyis med rtsa yi 'khor
382a2(rgyud 'grel): lo la phyag 'tshal// gang zhig goms pas sa gsum ma lus pa'o// rang bzhin bde ba chen po rtogs 'gyur ba'i// rang rig ye shes bde chen gcig pu pa/ gang la brtan nas rtogs pa'i man ngag bshad/
382a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'o btson rararu gzung 'dzin 'ching ba yi// bcing bas bcings sdug mgon med gyur pa la// snying rje'i rlan gyis nye bar bsgos pa yi// yang dag byang chub sems ldan dbang bskur bas// yid 'ong khang par bde
382a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i stan gnas te// lce yaM bsam gtan mchog la rab gzhol ba'i// lus gnas thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin tsAma?/ spyi bo lta bar gnas pa'i rtsa 'khor lo// gang la bcu drug thog myur yi ge thig ler
382a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan// dro ba'i bzhi pa gzhom med rang bzhin can// a pa d+hA tAM kun nas sbrel ba yi// 'khor lo'i dbus gnas byang chub yi ge thig le lA// rtse gcig yid kyis 'byung dang 'jug spangs te// drod dang du ba 'thul
382a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'bar ba las// rlung bral mar me 'bar ba'i rtse lta bur// glog gi 'od ltar kun nas gsal ba'i gzugs// gyen 'gros steng gi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa'i// gnom mong sa bon hUM yig bzhu byas te/ gang
382b1(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas ye shes skye ba'i mchog/ byang chub rang bzhin 'o ma'i rgyun 'bab pas// gang du thabs dang shes rab 'dres gyur pa// de ru gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ rang gos rang rig pa yi ye shes mchog/ rtog rnams
382b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis brtag pa'i yul mon cing // brjod bra la ye shes lkugs pa'i rmi lam dang // ci ltar gzhon nu ma yi dbang po gnyis// 'dus la myong ba'i bde ba ci bzhin pa// de ru gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gang tshe skyes bu'i
382b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba gom pas// de las gzhan pa'i dngos po mthong med cing // sna tshogs snang ba'i dngos 'di ma lus paM// rang bzhin bde ba tshan por 'char bar 'gyur// de tshe mig sogs dbang po'i yul snang ba'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i
382b4(rgyud 'grel): pongos 'dri ma lus pa// sgyu ma smyig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang // bar mi'i snying dang rgyu'i zla bya dang // snang brnyan seng ge zla ba'i grong bzhin du// ma lus rang bzhin gcig pa mthong bar 'gyur// de tshe thog med srid pa'i brtson ru mu// bas gas
382b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'ching ba maM lus ku nA bcing nas// gnyis mod ye shes byede ba chen po yi// go 'phangs bla na med pa thob par 'gyur// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gnyis myed pa/ bsam+b+ha gtan gyi man drug/ rnal 'byor gyi gtumo//
382b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po dge bo'i mgon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bal po'i paN+Di ta ba bA gI shwa ra dang / lo tsa ba A tser+ya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o//
383a1(rgyud 'grel): le ta ba yi mngon rtogs 'brel pa sdum pa 'byung ba bzhags//
383b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ lA yaM pU drA b+hI sa mya yu bAr+yA tI s+ya bA ro d+hu nA mA/ bod skad du/ lU yi ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba dpal ldan g+hA yau ba la phyug
383b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// bA rA rlung dang me dag gis/ deng po chen po'i 'khor lo hI// gong gis zhu byer bA rA hi// de la 'khor ba gnas par 'dud// 'di mdo'i ston pa 'gro bu dag dang gnyis mang bdag/ shes rab ma
383b3(rgyud 'grel): yis khams ldan bde ba chen po'i bdag/ shes rab thugs rje dbyer med na mkha' lta bu'i bdag/ de nyid sgrub thabs de bsgom byed pa badrug gis bshad// dang por rI skyil la stsogs par// lho phyogs kha bstan
383b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor par// skra grol ro la 'dug nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga po khar bcug l+ya// shr-I he ru kA zhes yig don/ bsam zhing sdom pa'i tshul du bsgyur// A li kA li'i 'od zer gyis// bag/ gso bsregs tshungs
383b5(rgyud 'grel): bri'i gnas bzhi bsgom// gzugs la rgya lnga ba nam snang mdzad// tshwa r+ye ba rdo rje nyi mer bsgom// 'bu shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje rgyal po 'du byed la// rnam zhes phyung po rdo rje can+da// thams cad stong
383b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid he ru ka'o// rim par dpral bai lte ba mgrin// rkang pa snying dang spyi bor ro// gti mug rdo rje mig dag la// zhe sdang dag byed snyan gnyis la// sna l-i ser sna gsod byed mo// kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ste//
384a1(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog rdo rje lus dpral ba la// byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sbyin// skye mched rnams kyi rang snying la'o// sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma// chu yi khams ni gsod byed ma// me yi kham
384a2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gugs byed ma// rlung khams gar gyi dbang phyug ma// na mkha'i rang bzhin phrad 'brar ma// 'di rnams rim pas lte ba snying // mgrin pa dang dpral ba gsang gnas su// yang na gzugs la sogs pa rnams//
384a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du bsam// de nas g.yon pa'i mthab mdzub kyis// se gol gtog pa sngon btang nas// sum b+ha la sogs sngags bzhi po// rtse gcig rnal 'byor brjod pa yis// nag po ljang khu dum
384a4(rgyud 'grel): po sbyar// shwaR+Sha la sogs pa'i phyogasu dgod// sa 'og tshangs pa'i gnas par du// khyab pa'i lus chen 'bar ba rnams// sum b+ha la sogs 'od zer gyis// ra ba bzhi po de bzhin bsam// hUM byung de mtshan rdo rje yis//
384a5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa// 'og khyab rdo rje'i 'od rnams kyis// rdo rje rtsa lngar gyur pa yis// rab rnams steng mda' dra ba// da yi 'og tu rdo rje'i gur// de 'og rdo rje'i bla re ma// rang rang sngags kyis bsam par bya// khwa gdong
384a6(rgyud 'grel): mi la sogs pa bzhi// gsang sngags bzhi las byung ba dang // gnyis gnyis phyogs 'od las byung ba// gshin rje brtan ma la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis de rnams brgyad// lte ba man chad phur po'i gzugs//
384b1(rgyud 'grel): de rnams g.yon na phur bu nAM// de dang de yi ngang tshul can// g.yas pa'i lag pa rnams na mi/ rdo rje'i tho ba chen po 'dzin// 'phros te song bas phyogs bcu na// gnas pa'i bgegs rnams rab bkug nas// hUM rings
384b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod 'byung phyogs brgyad kyi// khron par de rnams rab bcug nas// gdab pa'i sngags kyis phur bus gdag/ brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdung byo ste// gdab dang brdung ba dag gis ni// de bzhin nyid du ro gcig 'gyur//
384b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi lhag ma rnams bskrad nas// ra bA la thim lha mo rnams// chu lha chu ni 'bab pa bzhin// mtshams kyis bcings pa'i phyir byung ba/ rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo yos// ra ba rnams kyang bsam par bya// gsang sngags rnam
384b4(rgyud 'grel): nI bdi lta ste// oM suM b+hA ni suM b+hU hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM huM phaT/ oM gIh+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM huM phaT/ oM A na yA hoHb+ha go wAn/ badz+ra rA dza hUM hU~M phaT/ oM g+ha g+haHg+ha ta g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAna~M hUM phaT/ kI la yu
384b5(rgyud 'grel): kI la yaM sarba pA paM hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+ha re I dzI pA ya tI sarba ba~M gr-I kA ya pa~M kId+d+ha bAdz+ra kI lA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mung+ga ra bidz+raM kI la ye I kau TA sa hU~M phaT/ de nas snying gar a la sa~M zla ba'i dkyil ga
384b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ de yi steng du hUM yi go 'od zer ldan pa bsam byas nas// de'i 'od kyis bkug nas mdun du dkyil 'khor lo// phyag 'tshal lo sogs bdun dang bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ he ru ka zhes spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru// rim pa
385a1(rgyud 'grel): bltas te stong pa nyid bsgom gsang sngags brjod// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA shud+d+ho ho// sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis rang sems oM sogs gyur// de las 'ong dang 'khor lo'i 'phro dang 'du bya
385a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de nas rang sems de yang rab tu snang ba tsam// de yang gsang bsngags parjod cing stong pa nyid du bsgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ stong pa'i ngang las yangs te yaM yig las byung ba// / de la rlung gi 'khor
385a3(rgyud 'grel): lo rnam par bsgom bya ste/ sngo skya gzhu yi dbyibs can mtha' ma ba ngan mtshan// de'i steng du raM yig las byung me'i dkyil 'khore// rtse mo bdun ldan dmar po gru gsum raM gyis mtshan// de stangs paM yig las byung chu yi dkyil 'khor
385a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkur po shin tu zlum po bu pas mtshan pa'o// de stengs la yig las byung sa yi dkyil 'khor te// ser po gru gsum rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan ma'o// de stengs suM yig las byung ri rab lhun po ste// lcog brgyad ldan pa
385a5(rgyud 'grel): glagling la sogs pas bskor ba dang // grwa ba ni ngos bzhi rin tshan bani yi rang bzhin can/ de stengs pad+ma'i steng du hU~M byung sna tshogs dzor// de steng paM yig las byung sna tshogs pad+ma ste// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar lte ba dang ldan
385a6(rgyud 'grel): pal// de stang a laM ka li las byung nyi zla'o// zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ro// de la hUM yig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ring po min cem/ rang gi 'od zer 'phres pas 'khar l-i lnga po yis/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin byas rdul
385b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byur mA ma/ bcas pa'i 'khor l-i slar yang bsdus te bsgom par bya/ zhes bya ba rje su rnal 'byor ro// tsU la sogs pa las bskyed nyi ma 'khor lor gnas/ he ru ka pal namangal bzhin du rang bzhin med/
385b2(rgyud 'grel): g+ho ba'i dbang phyug chang ba'i u ma de wI la// brkyad btum g.yas g.yon nas gnas pa zha lo kun spyan gsum ldan// 'khor lo dur khrod dang ldan gzhal yas khong gi nang / mthing nag ljang gu dmar po se
385b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i kha dog can// zhal bzhi dbu la rdo rje phreng ldan phyag bcu gnyis// rdo rje dril bu gnyis bcas phyag gis yum la 'khyud/ gti mug dgu phyir glang po'i pags pa phyag gnyis bsdams// g.yas pas rim
385b4(rgyud 'grel): pas Da ma ru dang dgra lta gri gug rtse gsum 'dzi ni/ g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams// dbu la zla ba phyed pa thod pa'i phreng ba sna tshogs rdo rje can/ mche ba rab tu gtsigs
385b5(rgyud 'grel): shIng zhalnga 'gyur rol pa'i thor tshugs ngag dang ldan// blo ldan bsam gtan sbyor bas nyams kun dang ldan pa// nyon mongs dri ma dag phyir stag gi pags pa bsnams// A li la sogs lnga bcu rnam par dag pa
385b6(rgyud 'grel): yis// mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal dang ldan pa/ mgul rgyan snyan cha godub kor spyi gtsug nor bu dang // tshangs skud dang ldan thal bas byugs pa du ba'i midog/ phag mo mgon po'i mdun gnas nyi ma lha
386a1(rgyud 'grel): bur ni// mdog dmar thod pa skam po lted+mo shal can// zhal gcig ma dang spyan gsum phyag gnyis dang ldan ma/ gcer bu bang ba'i ngang tshul skra grol rab dgyes ma// thod pa'i dum bu las byas skra
386a2(rgyud 'grel): rags dang ldan ma/ g.yon pa bdud khrag bkang ba'i thong po bsnams pa ste// g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa rnams 'joms byed// bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid che// khrag la
386a3(rgyud 'grel): dgyes shing khrag 'dzag ma// byar+Ya gnyis la ni rab tu 'khyud// bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid can// mkha 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // khA Na Da ro haM gzugs can mau// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar dgod// de rnams dngos
386a4(rgyud 'grel): grub thams cad bsrub// nag mo ljang gu dmar mo sa ri// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa bsnams// g.yon pa thod pe kha T+wAM ga/ Da ma r+yA dang gri gus g.yas// spyan gsum la sgra grol ba// gcer bu brkyang bskum gnas pa
386a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// phyogs mtshams rnams bum steng du// byang chub sems sogs snod rnams so// dang por thugs 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa// mthong nag rdo rje phreng bas bskor// de shar pul+lI ra ma la ru// rab gtum khaN Da ka pA lA//
386a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyang dzA lin+d+ha ra ru// mahA kaM ka gi t+yo mig cemo/ nub kyi o Di yA na ru/ kaM ka la dang 'od ldan ma// lho phyogs arbu dwe ru me/ sna chen mche ba rnam par gtsigs// me mtshams go nga a pa rir// su ra thi hriM
386b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' blo tsam// badren bral nA me shU rA ru// 'od dpag myed dang mi thung mA// di bi kro Ta rlung mtshams su// lang+tha'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'ong // dbang ldan mtsham su m+b+ha la bAr// rdo rje'i sku dang shIng grib ma/ gsung gi
386b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dmar po ste/ pad+ma dmer po'i phreng bas bskor/ sha re ngos rtsibs kyi kA me rur// oM gu rI dang ai ra ba/ byang du o drar 'jigase byed che// de dang rdo rje'i ral ba can// nub kyi tri sha ku ne ru/ dpa'
386b3(rgyud 'grel): bo che dang rlung shugs ma// lho yI ko sa la ru ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad chang 'thung ma'o// me yi mtshams kyi kA ling kar// sh+yA ma dwe bI rab tu bzang / bden bral mtsham su lum+ba bA kar// rdor bzang shin tu bzung
386b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'o// rlung gi mtshams kyi kAny+tsi ru ka 'jigs byed che dang dza r+d+ha mA// de bzhin dbang ldan hi mA lar// mig mi bzang dang kha ga na'o// sku yi 'khor lo dkar po ste// 'khor lo'i phreng ba dkar pos bskor// shar rtsi bra
386b5(rgyud 'grel): pre ta pu rI ru// stobs chen 'khor lho'i shugs tson ma// byang ga gr-i hA dwe pa tA ra// rIn+ti chen rdo rje dum skyes ma/ nub kyi rtsibs la so nAb+hai ra// rta mgrin dang mi ShiN+Do ni/ lho ru war+Na dwI pa ru// 'khor lo'i go tsha nam
386b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i snying // me yi mtshams kyi na ge rar// he ru ka dpal su bI ri// lho nub siM d+hur pad+me gar// dbang phyug dang ni stobs tshan me// rlung mtshams ma rur nam snang mdzad// dpa' mo 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// dbang
387a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan mtshams kyi ku tA ra// rdo rje sems dpa' brtson chen mo// dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas 'khyud// g.yas dang g.yon na Da ma ru dang kha
387a2(rgyud 'grel): T+wAM ga/ dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan spyan gsum ldan// rab gtum la sogs lha mo rnams// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// skrod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gis 'ikhyud// gdug pa 'jigs byed gri gug bsnams//
387a3(rgyud 'grel): geris med sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug/ dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo bzhi ni// khru 'ug khyi phag gdong can ma/ mkha' 'gro sogs bzhin phyogs bzhi ru/ mtshamasu gshin rje brtan ma sogs// gzugs
387a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ldan po'o lha mo brgyad// de rnams zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa// brkyang bskum ro yi gdan la gnas// g.yon na thod pa T+wAM ga/ Da ma ru dang gri gug g.yas// thams cad spyan gsum drag mo ste// skra grol
387a5(rgyud 'grel): gcer bu de rnams so// mgul brgya na gdu bu dpung brgyan dang // rna brgyan dang ni tshangs skud dang // thams cad phyag rgya lha dang ldan// dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng ba dkris// thong po'i 'phreng byas mgrin par brgyan//
387a6(rgyud 'grel): skye rags sil sil sgra sgregs pa'o// sher deng dbong ldan dbu byas te// thams cad phyogs dang mtshams rnams su// dur khrod rnal 'byor ma dgongs la// g.yon dang g.ya su bskor bar bye// shar gyi
387b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod gtum drag na// shi ri Sha yi stong chen dang // brgya byin rab brtan la bcibs pa// gser mdog rdo rje thad pa bsnams// nor rgyas klu yi rgyal po yang // mdog dkar ut+pal sngon pos mtshan// thal
387b2(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyar bar byas pa yis// mdud cing mgon po'i mdun nau gnas// byang du tshang ching a shwad tha// lus ngan mi li zhon pa ste// ne'u le tshon sdug pa dang // thod pa 'chang baM sku mdog ser/ klu yi
387b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshong pa sku mdog skyer// klu yi dbang phyug tak+ShA kA/ banau du ka yI ma to gau wAR+Shi/ gangs kA duM pal gyi be'us mtshan/ mgos btud tha li mya sbyar bA'o// nub tu 'bar bas khyab pe ru// a sho kA yI sdong
387b4(rgyud 'grel): chen la/ dkar po gdengs bdun pa ru Na// chu srin la gnas thong zhags 'dzin// lto 'phye'i dbang phyug kairno Ta// suM Tu sngon po lta bu'i mdo// ri mo gsum ni mgrin par gnas// 'dud nas spyi bor thil
387b5(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyar// lho ru 'jigs rung la a mAr// gshin rje mya he zhon pa ste// nag po mig dmor lus sdom po// drag po be can thong pa 'dzin// gdengs ldan dbang phyug pad+me zhes// ston pa yi nai bka' sdod cing //
387b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po bral mo sbyar byas pa// dbu la thig le mang pos mtshan// ha ha rgong pa dbang ldan du/ n+ya gro d+ha yi sdong tshan po/ dbang phyug rtsa gsum thod pa thogs// dkar po glang zhon stag sham cen//
388a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma chen po klu yi rgyag/ zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i mdog/ gdengs ka la ni rtsa gsum mtshan// mgo la thal mo sbyar bas gnas// me mtshams dpal nags ka raM dza ra// me lha
388a2(rgyud 'grel): bongs thu ra skyes bcibs// skra mdog ngamar po thong pa 'dzin// phreng ba spyi blugs bcas pa bsnams// mtha' yas rma bya'i mgrin pa bzhin// mgo la pad+mas mtshan pa ste// spyi bor thal mo sbyar gyur nas//
388a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud cing mgon po'i zhabs drung gnas/ badren byal mun pa mi bzed par/ srin po gcer bu sngon po'i mdog/ ro gnas rol gri thod pa 'dzin// mi mgo'i phreng ba'i cod pan ca no// klu rgyal dung mdog rigs
388a4(rgyud 'grel): wAn ni// gdengs ka zla ba phyed pos mtshan// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas de/ la ta dza Di'i shing la gnas// rlung mtshams ar+dz+dza na yi shing / rlung lca du mdog shu ba bcibs// ba dan ser po thod pa 'chang // tsa tse
388a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs par gnas pa'o// dung skyong ser po thig lces mtshan// thol sbyar gus dang bcas pa'o// brgyad po klu rgyal sprin la gnas// dkar po rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// brgya byin la sogs phyogs bdag brgyad// yu
388a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa/ gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba ste// lhag mi dag ni phyag mtshan bsnamaso// sprin rnams rgyal bzang dpal sdug dang // de bzhin char dang shin tu mthug/ myur du dbyangs ldan gtum pa
388b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // char pa rnyed pa tsam krol lo// de brgyud dur khrod brgyud rnams na// gnas pa'i sprin nI 'jigs byed ldan// glog dang 'brug ni sku rab sgrogs// gang+gA yang rung ba'i char rgyun 'bebs// rang rang phyogs bdag bzhon
388b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdong // srin po rnams ni rang bzhin 'khrug/ mi rnams kyi ni rang sha zla zhing // khrag 'thung zhing rnams la gnas pa/ 'di rnams shing sdong brgyad pa yi// ngos dang ngos kyi phyogs kun du// nye ba ro bzang po'i shing
388b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnas// me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// seng ge ce spyang khyi sgra sgrogs// sta ga dang wa dang pa ga rnams dang // bye la rkyang dang pri ke sprul// khwa dang 'ug pa la sogs bya// gsal shing bskyen dang mdung
388b4(rgyud 'grel): gis phug/ keng rus phyed mgo rus pa rnams// thab tu tshig dang phyed tshig pa// sha za dang ni ro sgrub byed// grub thob gtor ma sbyar ba dang // rna la 'byor ma tshogs mchong pa dang // gri gug thod pa kha D+haM
388b5(rgyud 'grel): ga/ rje chung kha zus dpog med snong // mchod rten dkar po'i rI la glonas// grub chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// rnam shes brgyad kyi dag pa yang // ston pa 'di yi dur khrod rnams// de nas byang chug phyogs rnams
388b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // sku yi 'khor lo'i phyogs bshad bya/ gnas sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'o// pu dza o oM go pA de mA/ kA o tr-i ko ka la ka hi// pre gr-i sau su na si ma ku zhes byi ba'o// snying
389a1(rgyud 'grel): la mkha' 'gro lus rjes dram/ tsher dran mgo bor lA ma ste/ chos dran mgrin pa'i dum skyes ma/ lte ba'i sems dran gzugs can pa'o// mgo bo pul+lI ra ma lam 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab gtu mo/ spyi gtsug
389a2(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer dzA lan+d+ha ra// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul gtum pa'i mig/ o D+yan g.yas pa'i rna ba la/ dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'od ldan ma// mgo yi rgyab kyi arbu dang // sems kyi rdzu 'phrul sna chen mo// gnas twe s+ya rab dga'
389a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// go dI bi rI g.yon pa'i rnar// dod pa'i dbang po dpa' b+h+yo ma// Da me sh+tsa ri smin mtshams// brtson 'grus dbang po mi zung me// de bi ko Tar mig dag la// lang ka'i dbang phyug dran dbang po// mA lA bar ni sdong grib ma/
389a4(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin dbang po dri med pa// phrag pa dag ste nye ba'i gnas/ mkha' spyod thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// e r-I byA te kA ma rAng// shes rab dbang po mtshan khung gnyis// nu ma gnyis lnga ngang pa'i stobs// 'jigs byud chen mo o
389a5(rgyud 'grel): tre ru kA zhing dang sa gsum 'od byed ma// brtson 'grus stobs ni rlung shugs mya// lte ba tri sha ku ne ru// dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma// kro sa lar ni sna rtse ste// sa 'od 'phro ba nye bar zhing // ti nge 'dzin stobs kha ru ni/ shrA ma de bi

394b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam// 'chi ba de nyid kho nar med/ 'jig rten rnam rtog yin phyir ro// 'pho ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sna tshogs mchod pa lag thogs te// 'ong gsal gnas su
395a1(rgyud 'grel): su khrid bar byed// phun yon no// yaM dang r-I las byung bya'i rlung dang me bsams te// mgo gsum thab la a las byung ba'i pang snod du// zan sogs sngags kyis bin brlabs smon
395a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lha dang naM/ bdud rtsi lja mos rlung g.yos mes zhu dmar ba'i mdog/ oM traM aM khaM hUM laM myaM paM traM baM/ hUM byung bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin thur bstan kha T+wAM gIs// blugs pas de yang zhu nas kha ba lta bur bas
395a3(rgyud 'grel): A l-I kA li las byung yi ge gsum las 'thon// 'khor lo gsum gyis sngar bzhin skye bo'i don byas nis// rgyo mtshe la sogs gnas nas bdud rtsi bkug byas te/ snyoms par zhugs pas zhu nas
395a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor l-i gsum gyi lha// rim bzhin yi ge gsum la rab tu zhugs// oM sogs rim thim yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya pi sngags kyi// mdun du 'khori lo spyan drangs na//

395b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam// yang na lag par bsgoms nas me/ lha mo rnams ni tshang ma dam tshig tshad ma dang / de gsung tshig rnams kyang ni mchog tu tshang mu ste// bden pa 'di dag gi sa ni lha mo 'di rnams kyis pa'adag la rjes

395b4(rgyud 'grel): d+hus yaHk+Sho b+hA ya k+Sho b+hA yA/ hU~M hr-i/ \u0f7fpho pheM/ phAT+ra phaT/ da hwA dA hA/ ba tsa pa tsa/ b+hUk+Sha b+hik+Shi/ bA sa ru d+hi rAn+tau sA lAM ba lAm+b+he naM/ gauts+tsha gr-ih+na/ s+yAp+tA pyA tA lA gai taM b+h+r-i dzau ga sarbaMn+yAM tAr+dz+dza ya
395b5(rgyud 'grel): taiter+Na yA/ A kaD+D+h+ya An+taM h+yaMny+Ni/ dz+nyo d+h+waM/ g+h+r-ik+ShaM/ hUM hUM/ hI hrIM/ tsUn+na/ ki lI kI li/ si li si r+b+r-i/ hiM li hi li/ d+hu l+r-i d+hI 'ihUM hU phaT phaT/ badz+ra ai ral+li sogs kyis// rnam pa du myar nga ba
395b6(rgyud 'grel): la// oM badz+ra a l+le hoHdza hUM baM hoHdzadz+haiM k+Sha~M ki nI sa ma ye sgra dr-i sh+ya hoHpi wang sogs kyi mchod byin nas/ zhal bsil la sogs byas ma su// srid dang zhi ba mnyam par sbyor gyur kun rtog rlabs bcos
396a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ku na mkha'i rang bzhin dngos po mtha' dag de nyid kho nar gzigs// shin tu phul byung thugs rje'i chu rgyas sems kyi chu bo'i mgon// lha mo rnams kyis bdag la shin tu brtse bar mdzod cig

396a3(rgyud 'grel): n+do dA pasma ra DA ki n+yA da ya i maM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarba siMd+d+haM pra yats+tshan+tu/ la thai baM ya theSh+Ta b+hUny+dza thA pi pa tha dzi g+ha tha mA ti kra ma tha/ mo ma sarba kA ra ta ya sar+b+ba khaM bi shud+d+ha ye swA hA/ yi ke b+ha ban+d+ha/

396b1(rgyud 'grel): mama'i de kho na nyid do// snga dro yang dag las las phyogs gtsang ma ru// suM b+ha la sogs gsang sngags brjod cing rnal 'byor pas// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byugs nasu// pU dza la sogs brjod
396b2(rgyud 'grel): cing rim pa yis// au bI tha u pa pI thA// k+She tr-i u pa k+She tA/ tshan do ha u pa tshan do ha/ me lA pA ka u pa me lA pA kau/ sh+ma shA na u pa sh+ma shrA na/ de nas skad cig 'byung ba ni ri rab pad+me la// hUM gzhag de yi

396b5(rgyud 'grel): su g+haya su bskor zhing phyogs/ glo yon du bskor// de nas lag par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs gsol la// oM ha la sogs sngags kyis me tog phul nas ni// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyi g.yon po'i

397a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon rim bzhin no// gzhan pa rnams kyis mtshon char brjod// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje ra ni// ral gri gzhan kun Da ma ru'o// dril bu thob bcas khA TaM ga/ g.yas dang g.yon du go rim bzhin// lag thil pad+ma

397b1(rgyud 'grel): mgo gr-i gug g.yas// ya mau ni dang rmongs byed ma// skyong byed ma dang skrag byed ma// gtum mo mthing ga dkur ser mo// ljang gu ngu ba'i mdag nAn rnams// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // na mkha'i khams

398a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis ni blugs pa gang // lte ba'i pad+ma rab tu 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ru// de ni bza' ba'i dus kyi nang gi sbyin sreg go// oM AHuts+tshiSh+Ta badz+ra a d+hiSh+Tha badz+ra oM d+hiSh+Tha badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha i maM ba li hUM
398a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'dis zos pa'i lhag ma'i gtor ma bya'o// bdag nyid chen po'i khams kyi za ba me tog 'di thun mong rnams kyis gzhal bar mi nus te// de phyir 'di la kho bos kyang ni rab tu 'jug par
398a4(rgyud 'grel): nus par 'gyur ba ma yin med// 'on kyang rnal 'byor dbang phyug lo yi'i gsung tshig lcug gzung dka' bas goms phyir bzod ma gyur// de yi lam gyi rjes su 'gro bar 'dod pas 'di la gnas pa'i tshigs bcad

400b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshor ba gsum yang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin te/ dbang po drug po la brten pas 'di rnams bco brgyad du 'gyur te/ 'di yang drod la brten pa 'di'i gnas kyi

401a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa de rnams 'du shes so// yul mtha' yas pa yin te/ yul mtha' yas pa'i phyiraro// mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams kyi phal cher rtsa bar rtsa bar gyur pa mgrin pa yin pas der hrIHdmar
401a2(rgyud 'grel): po'o// rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa lnga dang / kun gzhi dang / yid dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / rnam par shes pa brgyad do// 'di la rnam par shes pa brgyad

401a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi klong mor gyi 'og yin te// de dag la gzugs brnyan ltar gnyisu gyur pa'i hoHljang gA'o// phung po lnga po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la spyi gtsug hrIHmthing ga'o// de bzhin du mig la sogs par byang chub sems dpa
401b1(rgyud 'grel): kun sa bon traM dkar po dang hUM mthing ga/ tAM ser po a dmar po/ haM ljang gu/ hUM dkar po lte ba la sogs par ltung byed mu la sogs pa'i lam ser po// maM mthi ga paM dmyur po// taM ljang gu/ baM dung mdog bsgom par bya'o//
401b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud gzhan las drangs pa'i mtshan la sogs pa tshigasu bcad pas bsnyed pa/ rnam snang rin chen 'byung gnas to// 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// rdo rje sems dang mi bskyod pa// 'di drug rgyal ba'i khyu mchog yin//
401b3(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bskum spyan gsum ldan pa rnams// dkar ser dmar po ljang gu dang // dkar mthing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dang po g.yas na 'khor lo 'phyar/ g.yon pa dril buM dkur brten pa// gsum po rin chen pad+ma dam/
401b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje 'phyar bsnga rol// g.yon rnams dril bu thugs kar bsnams// lnga pa thugs kar phyag g.yas na// rdo g.yon pas dril bu dkur// brtan pa'o de bzhin g.yon pa gzhan/ mI bskyod pa ni phyag g.yis
401b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// sa gnon phyag rgya ste rdo rje 'dzin// sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug dang // sgrib pa thums cad rnam sel ba// kun tu bzang po rgyal sras rnams// dkar po mthing gi ser ba dmar// sngon po
401b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar rnams go rims bzhin// dang po g.yas pas 'khor lo 'phyar// g.yon pas thugs kar dril bu bsnams// phyag rdor thugs kar rdo rje g.yas// giyon gyis dril bu dkur brten pa// gzhan gsum g.yas pas rin
402a1(rgyud 'grel): chen dang // pad+ma dmar dang rdo rje 'phyar// g.yon+d+ra pa dril bu dgur brten pa'o// rang rang sa bon las byung ba'i// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o// ltung byed mA la sogs pa yang // ser
402a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mthing nag dmar ljang gu// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa rnams kyi// 'khor lo rdo rje dpal ral gri// g.yas pa'i gzhan na gri gug go/ g.yon rnamaso thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ lnga paM du ba'i mdog can ste// zhal
402a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum du mdog dkar dang dmar// phyag drug dri yi g.yon pa la// thod pa kha T+wAM zhags pa 'dzin// g.yas kyi lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo/ gri gug rnams ni rim pas 'dzin// gcer bu skra grol lha mo rnams//
402a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad spyan gsum pa// zhabs gnyis brgya bskum yang dgra gnas// phyag rgya lha yis rnam par brgyan// ltung byed ma la sogs pa rnams ni// lhas dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming can te/ sangs rgyas
402a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan mA ma kI// gos dkar mo dang // sgrol ma chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje mu'i rang bzhi no// ltung byed mas ni bdud thams cad ltung byed byas pas zhi bar byed pa'o// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma ni/ las kha tshar ba
